SA20bsa034_u:174_5: evaṃ prakārataḥ / sarvalokadhātavaḥ sarvasattvadhātavaścāsya prabhāvaviṣayañca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:174_6: evaṃ dhātutaḥ / śrāvakasya tu saha sattvadhātunā dvisāhasro lokadhāturabhijñāviṣayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:174_8: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathā hi te ekasyaivātmano damāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:174_9: no tu sarvasattvānām / tasmātteṣāmeka eva dhātuḥ paramaprabhāvaviṣayo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:174_10: etānākārān sthāpayitvā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tadanyaḥ prabhāvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sādhāraṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:174_11: tadevaṃ sati śrāvakapratyekabuddhā eva tāvadbuddhabodhisattvaiḥ saha na tulyābhijñā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:175_0: yaścāpi prātihāryaprabhāvo buddhabodhisattvānāmṛddhyādeśanānuśāsti-saṃgṛhītaḥ so 'pyabhijñāprabhāva eva yathāyogaṃ praviṣṭo veditavyaḥ ṛddhiviṣayacetasaḥ paryāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñāprabhāveṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:177_0: tatra paripākaḥ katamaḥ / paripākaḥ samāsataḥ ṣaḍbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:177_1: svabhāvato 'pi paripācya pudgalato 'pi paripākaprakārabhedato 'pi paripākopāyato 'pi paripācakapudgalato 'pi paripakvapudgala-lakṣaṇato 'pi ca /
SA20bsa034_u:178_0: tatrāyaṃ paripākasvabhāvaḥ / kuśaladharmavīje sati kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād yā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśuddhyanukūlā kāyacittakarmaṇyatā kalyatā samyak prayoganiṣṭhā yatra sthitāḥ śāstāraṃ vā āgamyānāgamya vā śāstāraṃ bhavyo bhavati pratibalo 'nantaraṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ vā sākṣātkartuṃ jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:178_1: tadyathā vraṇo yadā paripāṭanāya niṣṭhāgato bhavatyanantaraṃ pāṭanārhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:178_2: saḥ paripakva ityucyate / ghaṭaghaṭīśarāvādi ca mṛnmayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgataṃ bhavati anantaraṃ paribhogārha tadā parikvamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:178_3: phalāni vā āmrapanasādīni yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgatāni bhavantyanantaraṃ paribhogārhāṇi tadā paripakvānītyucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:178_4: evameva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād asau samyak prayoganiṣṭhā anantaraṃ viśuddhye saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:179_4: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatām ityete catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ eṣu caturṣu vastuṣu paripācayitavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:181_0: tatrendriyaparipākaḥ / yā āryurvarṇakulaiśvaryasampadādeyavacanatā maheśākhyatāmanuṣyatvaṃ [Dutt_56] mahotsāhatā yāmāśrayaparipākaphalasaṃpadamāgamya bhavyo bhavatyātaptānuprayogāyāparikhinnamānasaśca bhavati sarvavidyāsthānasamudāgamābhiyogeṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:182_0: kuśalamūlaparipākaḥ katamaḥ / yā prakṛtyā mandarajaskatāyāmāgamya prakṛtyaivāsya pāpakeṣvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:182_1: cittaṃ na krāmati mandanivaraṇaśca bhavati mandavitarka ṛjupradakṣiṇagrāhī /
SA20bsa034_u:183_0: jñānaparipākaḥ katamaḥ / smṛtimān bhavati meghāvī pratibalaśca bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇāmarthasya ājñānāyodgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya prativedhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:183_1: sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati yāṃ prajñāmāgamya bhavyo bhavati pratibalaḥ sarvato 'tyantaṃ sarvakleśāccittaṃ vimocayitum /
SA20bsa034_u:184_0: mṛduparipākaḥ katamaḥ / dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ mṛduḥ paripāko bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:185_0: tatra paripākopāyaḥ katamaḥ / sa saptaviṃśatividho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:185_1: dhātupuṣṭayā vartaṃmānapratyayopasaṃhārataḥ avatārato ratigrahaṇataḥ ādiprasthānataḥ anādiprasthānataḥ śuddhidūrataḥ śuddhyāsannataḥ prayogataḥ āśayataḥ āmiṣopasaṃhārataḥ dharmopasaṃhārataḥ ṛddhyāvarjanatayā dharmadeśanayā guhyadharmākhyānataḥ vivṛtadharmākhyānataḥ mṛduprayogato madhyaprayogataḥ adhimātraprayogataḥ śravaṇataḥ cintanato bhāvanataḥ saṃgrahaṇato nigrahaṇataḥ svayaṃkṛtataḥ parādhyeṣaṇataḥ tadubhayataśca /
SA20bsa034_u:186_0: tatra dhātupuṣṭiḥ katamā / yā prakṛtyā kuśaladharmabījasaṃpadaṃ niśritya pūrvakuśaladharmābhyāsāduttarottarāṇāṃ kuśaladharmabījānāṃ paripuṣṭatarā paripuṣṭatamā utpattiḥ sthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:187_4: tatra dhātupuṣṭeḥ pūrvakeṇa hetunā vartamānaḥ paripāko nivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:187_5: vartamānapratyayopasaṃhārato vartamāna evaṃ heturvartamānaḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:188_0: tatrāvatāraḥ katamaḥ / śraddhāpratilambhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āgārikasya duścaritavivekaśikṣāpadasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:189_0: ratigrāhaḥ katamaḥ / yā sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīñca pratipadaṃ kāmasukhātmaklamathānta-vivarjitāñca sukhāṃ pratipadamāgamya svākhyāte dharmavinaye śāsanābhiratiḥ
SA20bsa034_u:190_0: tatrādiprasthānaṃ katamat / ya eva tatprathamataḥ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegamāgamya nyāyārthapratipādane cānuśaṃsāṃ viditvā 'vatāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:191_0: anādiprasthānaṃ katamat / yā avatīrṇasya pudgalasya paripācyamānatāyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvebhyo buddhebhyaścānadhyupekṣāmāgamya vivṛtānāñca sthānānāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ uttānakriyāmāgamya uttarottaraparipākagamanatā /
SA20bsa034_u:192_0: tatra viśuddhidūratā katamā / yat kausīdyaṃ vā āgamya pratyayavaidhuryaṃ vā mahatā dīrgheṇa kālena prabhūtairjanmāntarāparivartaiḥ kalpaparivartairvā bhavyo bhavati viśuddhaye /
SA20bsa034_u:193_0: tatra prayogaḥ katamaḥ / yā svārthaprāptau tīvracchandatāmāgamya vinipātabhayaṃ vā 'mutra dṛṣṭe vā dharme parato 'yaśobhayamāgamya śikṣāpadeṣvanupālanā sātatyakāritā satkṛtyakāritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:194_0: tatrāśayaḥ katamaḥ / dharmeṣu ca yā samyak santīraṇā-kṣāntimāgamyāsmāddharmavinayādasaṃhāryatāyai pareṣāñcādhigame 'bhisaṃpratyaya guṇasaṃbhāvanāmāgamya yā triṣu ratneṣu svārthaprāptau cāvicalā śraddhadhānatā /
SA20bsa034_u:195_1: ābhiṣopasaṃhāraḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ bhojanapānādivikalānāṃ bhojanapānādyupasaṃhāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:196_0: tatra dharmopasaṃhāraḥ katamaḥ / yaduddeśato vā dharmāṇāmanupradānaṃ samyagarthavivaraṇato vā /
SA20bsa034_u:197_0: ṛddhyāvarjanatā katamā / yā ṛddhimata ṛddhiprātihāryavidarśanā sattvānukampayā sattvānāmāśayaviśuddhiṃ vādhipatiṃ kṛtvā prayogaviśuddhiṃ vā ete sattvāḥ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā śāsane pratilapsyante prayokṣyante samyagiti /
SA20bsa034_u:197_1: te ca tena prātihāryeṇāvarjitamānasā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā pratilabhante prayujyante vā samyak /
SA20bsa034_u:198_0: tatra deśanā katamā / svayaṃ svārthaprāptāvaśaktasya saddharmadeśanā samyak pratipattisahāyabhūtā /
SA20bsa034_u:201_0: tatra mṛduḥ prayogaḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ sātatyaprayogavivarjitaḥ satkṛtyaprayogavivarjitaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:202_0: madhyaḥ prayogaḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ sātatyaprayogavivarjito vā satkṛtyaprayogavivarjito vā /
SA20bsa034_u:203_0: adhimātraḥ prayogaḥ katamaḥ / yastadubhayaprayogasaṃyuktaḥ sātatyaprayogasaṃyuktaḥ satkṛtyaprayogasaṃyuktaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:204_0: tatra śrutaṃ katamat / yo bauddhapravacanādhimuktasya sūtrādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śravaṇodgrahaṇa-dhāraṇasvādhyāyābhiyogaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:207_1: pṛthagvidhā ca paricaryā tadyathā glānopasthānaparicaryā dharmyacīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyaparicaryā śokakaukṛtyaprativinodanaparicaryā kleśaprativinodanaparicaryā /
SA20bsa034_u:208_0: nigrahaḥ katamaḥ / ātmagatāṃ saṃkleśārakṣāṃ saṃvidhāya skhalitacodanā mṛdau vyatikrame /
SA20bsa034_u:208_3: tatra yā ca codanā yā cāvasādanā sā teṣāmeva hitasukhārthaṃ tadanyeṣāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:208_4: yā punaḥ pravāsanā punaḥ pratisaṃharaṇāya sāpi teṣāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca hitasukhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:208_5: yā punarapratisaṃhāryā pravāsanā sā pareṣāmeva hitasukhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:209_0: kathaṃ svayaṃ paripācayati / ānulomikañca dharmaṃ deśayati akuśalāt sthānādyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
SA20bsa034_u:209_3: yenainaṃ pare naivamāha / tvameva tāvat svayaṃ nākuśalātsthānādyutthitaḥ kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhitaḥ kasmāttvaṃ tatra paraṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ codayitavyaṃ smārayitavyaṃ manyase /
SA20bsa034_u:210_0: kathaṃ paramadhyeṣate / yasyāntike sattvānāmadhimātraśca premagauravaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:212_0: ityanena saptaviṃśatividhena paripākopāyena sā ṣaḍvidhā paripākaprabheda saṃpadveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:212_1: indriyaparipākasya kuśalamūlaparipākasya jñānaparipākasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya ca paripākasya /
SA20bsa034_u:213_1: samāsataḥ ṣaṭ bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu vyavasthitāḥ sattvān paripācayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:213_8: tatrāgotrasthānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sugatigamanāya paripākaḥ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāvartyo bhavati punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:213_9: gotrasthānāṃ punaḥ paripāko na pratyāvartyo bhavati na punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:214_1: śrāvakaḥ pūrvakuśalābhyāsād yadāmṛdupākavyavasthito bhavati sa mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaścāpāyānapi gacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvāti /
SA20bsa034_u:214_2: yadā tu madhyapākavyavasthito bhavati sa madhyacchandaśca bhavati madhyaprayogo na cāpāyān gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:214_5: adhimātre paripāke sthitaḥ adhimātracchando bhavati adhimātraprayogaśca na cāpāyān gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:215_3: paścime bhave paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe 'nācāyakaṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśāt saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:216_3: tatra mṛdupākavyavasthito bodhisattvo mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaḥ apāyāṃśca gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:216_5: uttaptairacalaiḥ suviśuddhaiśca bodhipakṣyaiḥ kuśalaidharmaiḥ sarvaireva visaṃyukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:217_0: tatra yaścāmiṣakṛtaḥ paripāko yaśca ṛddhyāvarjanajo yaśca guhyadharmākhyānajo yaśca mṛduprāyogiko yaśca śrutamātrakṛtaḥ paripāka ityeṣa pañcavidhaḥ paripākaḥ dīrghakālābhyāsādapyeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mṛduka eva bhavati prāgevettakakālābhyāsāt /
SA20bsa034_u:217_1: tadanyaistu sarvaiḥ paripākasya kāraṇaiḥ paripākasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:217_2: mṛdukenābhyāsena mṛduko madhyena madhyaḥ adhimātreṇādhimātraḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:217_3: tasya ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya paripākasyaikaikasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:217_7: ityevaṃ bhāgīyottarottaraprabhedanayenāpramāṇaḥ paripākaprabhedaḥ sattvānāṃ buddhabodhisattvakṛto veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:218_0: tatra bodhisattvaḥ ebhiḥ paripākakāraṇairyathānirdiṣṭairātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāyendriyaparipākaṃ kuśalamūlaparipākaṃ jñānaparipākañca mṛdumadhyādhimātrañca samudānayati parasattvānāñca parapudgalānāṃ yānatrayaniryāṇāya /
SA20bsa034_u:221_0: tatra bodhiḥ katamā / samāsato dvividhañca prahāṇaṃ dvividhañca jñānaṃ bodhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:222_1: dvividhaṃ punarjñānaṃ yat kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇācca nirmalaṃ sarvakleśaniranubandhajñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:223_2: tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sarvataścātyantañca prahāṇādyad jñānaṃ tacchuddhamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:223_3: sarvadhātuṣu sarvavastuṣu sarvaprakāreṣu sarvakāleṣu yadjñānamavyāhataṃ pravartate tatsarvajñānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:223_4: tatra dvau vā dhātū / lokadhātuḥ sattvadhātuśca / tatra dvividhaṃ vastu / saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtañca / tasyaiva ca saṃkṛtāsaṃskṛtasya vastuno 'pramāṇaḥ prakārabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇottarajātiprabhedena sāmānyalakṣaṇaprabhedena hetuphalaprabhedena dhātugatikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtādiprabhedena /
SA20bsa034_u:223_6: ityetatsarvadhātukaṃ sarvavastukaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvakālaṃ jñānaṃ sarvajñānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:223_7: tatrāsaṅgajñānaṃ yadābhogamātrādeva sarvatrādhiṣṭhitaṃ tvaritamasaktaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:223_8: na punaḥ punarābhogaṃ kurvato nānyatraikābhogapratibaddhameva tajjñānaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:224_0: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ yā ca tathāgatasyāraṇā praṇidhijñānaṃ pratisaṃvidaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:225_1: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṃṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣyāṇi mahākaruṇā 'sammoṣadharmatā [Dutt_63] vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvākāravarajñānañca /
SA20bsa034_u:226_0: tatreyaṃ paramā bodhiḥ saptabhiḥ paramatābhiryuktā yeneyaṃ sarvabodhīnāṃ parametyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:227_0: sapta paramatāḥ katamāḥ āśrayaparamatā pratipattiparamatā sampattiparamatā jñānaparamatā prabhāvaparamatā prahāṇaparamatā vihāraparamatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:227_3: yattathāgata ātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya [bahujanasukhāya] lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pratipannaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:227_5: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ śīlasaṃpattyā dṛṣṭisaṃpattyā ācārasaṃpattyā ājīvasaṃpattyā [pratipannaḥ] /
SA20bsa034_u:227_7: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ dharmapratisaṃvidā 'rthapratisaṃvidā niruktipratisaṃvidapratibhānapratisaṃvidā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:227_9: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiḥ ṣaḍbhirabhijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭābhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:227_11: yattathāgataḥ savāsanasarvakleśaprahāṇena niruttareṇāpratisamena jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇena ca samanvāgataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:227_21: brāhmādvihārātkaruṇāvihāro yena tathāgatastriskṛto rātrau triskṛtvo divase ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivena buddhacakṣaṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate [Dutt_64] ko vardhate kasyānutpannāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayāmi kvaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgraphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:229_0: teṣāñca punastathāgatānāṃ daśabhirākārairguṇābhidhānañca bhavati guṇānusmaraṇatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:229_1: katamairdaśabhiḥ / ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti /
SA20bsa034_u:229_8: paramacittadamopāyajñatayā ekasyaiva loke puruṣabhūtasya ca prādurbhāvāt anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:229_9: cakṣurbhūtatvājjñānārthadharmatattva bhūtatvād vyaktasyārthasya nirṇetṛtvāt sarvārthapratisaraṇatvādavyutpannasyārthasya vyutpādakatvā dutpannasya saṃśayasyocchedakatvāt gambhīrāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ vivaraṇāt paryavadāpakatvāttanmūlatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ tannetṛkatvāttatpratisaraṇatvāt sarvaduḥkhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ śāsti vyapadiśati samyagdevamanuṣyāṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:229_11: arthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeranarthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśernnaivārthopasaṃhitasya nānārthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeḥ sakalasarvākārābhisaṃbodhād buddha ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:230_1: tatra prabhūtairapi kalpairekasyāpi buddhasya prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:230_2: ekasminneva ca kalpe prabhūtānāṃ buddhānāmutpādo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:230_3: teṣu teṣu ca daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣvaprameyāṇāmeva buddhānāmutpādo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:230_4: tatkasya hetoḥ / santi daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvā ye tulyakālakṛtapraṇidhānāstulyasaṃbhārasamudāgatāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:230_5: yasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare ekena bodhisattvena bodhau cittaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare sarvaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:230_6: yathā caika utsahito ghaṭito vyāyacchitaśca tathā sarve /
SA20bsa034_u:230_7: tathāhi dṛśyante 'sminneva lokadhātāvanekāni bodhisattvaśatāni yāni tulyakālapraṇidhānāni tulyatyāgāni tulyakṣāntikāni tulyavīryāṇi tulyadhyānāni tulyaprajñānāni /
SA20bsa034_u:230_10: na ca tulyasaṃbhārasamudāgatayordvayostāvadbodhisattvayorekasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetre yugapadutpattyavakāśo 'sti prāgevāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānām /
SA20bsa034_u:230_13: tasmāddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu yathā pariśodhiteṣu tathāgataśūnyeṣu te tulyasaṃbhārā bodhisattvā anyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūtpadyanta iti veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:230_14: tadanena paryāyeṇa bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabāhulyameva yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:230_16: tatkasya hetoḥ / dīrgharātraṃ khalu bodhisattvenaivaṃ praṇidhānamanubṛṃhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:230_17: yathāhameko 'pariṇāyake loke pariṇāyakaḥ syāṃ sattvānāṃ vinetā sarvaduḥkhebhyo vimocayitā parinirvāpayiteti /
SA20bsa034_u:230_18: yasyaivaṃ dīrgharātraṃ praṇidhānamanubṛṃhayataḥ samyak pratipattiparigṛhītamṛdhyatyeva tat /
SA20bsa034_u:230_19: punaśca śakta ekastathāgatastrisāhasramahāsāhasre ekasmin buddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakārya kartum /
SA20bsa034_u:230_20: ato dvitīyasya tathāgatasya vyartha evotpādaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:230_21: bhūyaścaikasya tathāgatasya loke utpādātsattvānām evārthakaraṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā /
SA20bsa034_u:230_22: tatkasya hetoḥ / teṣāmevaṃ bhavatyayameva kṛtsne jagatyekastathāgato na dvitīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:230_23: asmiñjanapadacārikāṃ vā viprakānte parinirvṛte vā nāsti sa kaścid dvitīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:230_24: [Dutt_66] yasyāsmābhirantike brahmacaryaṃ caritavyaṃ syāt dharmo vā śrotavya iti viditvā 'titvarante ghanatareṇa chandavyāyāmena brahmacaryavāsāya saddharmaśravaṇāya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:230_26: evameṣāmekasya buddhasyotpādātsvārthe karaṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā ca bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:231_0: tatra sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvaṃ samasamaṃ bhavati nirviśiṣṭaṃ sthāpayitvā catvāri sthānāni-āyurnāma kulaṃ kāyañca /
SA20bsa034_u:231_2: na tvanyena kenacit / na ca strī anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimasaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:231_3: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ prathamasyaiva kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayāt /
SA20bsa034_u:231_4: strībhāvaṃ vijahāti / bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanamupādāya na punarjātu strī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:231_5: prakṛtyā ca bahukleśo duṣprajñaśca bhavati sarvo mātṛgrāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:231_6: na ca prakṛtyā bahukleśasantānena duṣprajñasantānena ca śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:232_0: evamiyamanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ svabhāvato 'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:232_1: paramato 'pi guṇanirdeśānusmaraṇato 'pi saṃbhavato 'pi viśeṣato 'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:232_2: api tvacintyaiva sarvatarkamārgasamatikrāntatvādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyaguṇasamuditatvādanuttaraiva ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaśrāvaka-pratyekabuddhatathāgatānābhi nirvṛttaye bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:235_0: nirdiṣṭaṃ tāvadyatra bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam / yathā punaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ tadvakṣyāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:238_0: ihādita eva bodhisattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣitukāmenādhimuktibahulena bhavitavyaṃ dharmeparyeṣakeṇa dharmadeśakena dharmānudharmapratipannena samyagavavādānuśāsakena samyagavavādānuśāsanyāñca sthitena upāyaparigṛhītakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇā ca bhavitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:239_1: iha bodhisattvo 'ṣṭavidhe 'dhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne śraddhāprasādapūrvaṃkeṇa niścayena rucyā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:239_2: triṣu ratneṣu buddhadharmaṃsaṃghaguṇeṣu buddhabodhisattvaprabhāve ca yathānirdiṣṭe tattvārthe ca yathānirdiṣṭe hetau ca phale ca vicitre yathāyogapatite aviparīte prāptavye cārthe samartho 'haṃ prāptumiti /
SA20bsa034_u:239_3: yathā prāptavye arthe evaṃ prāptyupāye astyayaṃ prāptyupāyaḥ prāptavyasyārthasyeti /
SA20bsa034_u:239_6: tathā subhāṣite sulapite supravyāhṛte 'dhimuktistadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇādiṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:241_0: tatra dharmaṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ kiṃ paryeṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:241_3: vāhyakāni ca śāstrāṇi laukikāni ca śilpakarmapasthānāni paryeṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:242_7: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā vyādhicikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:242_8: itīmāni pañca vidyāsthānāni yāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:244_1: daśeme hetavaḥ aviparītaṃ hetuvyavasthānaṃ sarvahetusaṃgrahe veditavyāḥ saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā laukināmapi ca teṣāṃ sasyādīnāmavyākṛtānāṃ pravṛttaye /
SA20bsa034_u:244_3: anuvyavahārahetuḥ / apekṣāhetuḥ / ākṣepahetuḥ / parigrahahetuḥ / abhinirvṛttihetuḥ / āvāhakahetuḥ pratiniyamahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:245_0: tatra sarvadharmāṇāṃ yannāma nāmapūrvikā ca saṃjñā saṃjñāpūrvakaścābhilāpaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:245_2: tatra yadapekṣaṃ yaddhetukaṃ yasmin vastunyarthitvamupādānañca bhavatyayamasyocyate 'pekṣāhetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:245_11: tatpunarbījanirvṛttaṃ phalamuttarasya bījākṣiptasya phalasyāvāhakahetuḥ nānāvijātīya-vibhinnakāraṇatvaṃ pratiniyamahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:245_12: yaścāpekṣāhetuḥ yaścākṣepahetuḥ yaśca parigrahaheturyaśca nirvṛttiheturyaścāvāhakaheturyaśca pratiniyamaheturityetān sarvān hetūn ekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sahakāriheturityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:246_1: vāgvirodhaḥ / tadyathā śāsrāṇi pūrvāparaviruddhāni bhavanti tadekatyānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānām yuktivirodhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:246_4: sahavasthāna virodhaḥ / tadyathā ālokatamaso rāgadveṣayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:246_7: tadyathā 'śubhabhāvanā-kāmarāgayoḥ maitrībhāvanā-vyāpādayoḥ karuṇābhāvanāvihiṃsayoḥ bodhyaṅgāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāḥ sarvakleśānāñca traidhātukāvacarāṇām asmiṃstvarthe utpattivirodha evābhipretaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:247_0: punaḥ sarveṣāmeṣāṃ hetūnāṃ dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:248_0: catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ ālambanapratyayaḥ adhipatipratyayaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:248_1: tatra yo janako hetuḥ saḥ hetupratyayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:248_4: tathā hi cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prāgutpannāvakāśadānaparigṛhītā ālambanaparigṛhītāśca prādurbhavanti pravartante ca /
SA20bsa034_u:249_1: kathañca saṃkleśo bhavati / kathañca vyavadānam / yānīmāni vividhāni sasyāni dhānyasaṃkhyātāni loke yairayaṃ loko jīvikāṃ kalpayati teṣāṃ tāvadyadidaṃ nāma saṃjñā vyāgvyāhāro vividhastad yathā yavaśāligodhūmatilamudgamāṣakulatthādikaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:249_2: ayameṣāmanuvyavahārahetuḥ yavā ānīyantāṃ dīyantāṃ piṣyantāṃ sthāpyantāmityevamādikasya vyavahārasya yathā yavā evamavaśiṣṭheṣvapi veditavyam jighatsāpipāsādaurbalyaṃ kāyasthityapekṣaṃ kavaḍīkārāhārāsvādāpekṣañca /
SA20bsa034_u:249_4: ayameṣāmapekṣāhetuḥ / yato yataḥ svabījād yasya [yasya] sasyasya prādurbhāvo bhavati tadbījaṃ tasyākṣepahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:249_7: yavabījācca yavāṅkurasya yavasasyasya ca prādurbhāvo bhavati nānyasya /
SA20bsa034_u:249_9: ayameṣāṃ pratiniyamahetuḥ / sarve caite apekṣāhetumupādāya pratiniyamahetvantāheta vaḥ sasyasyābhiniṣpattaye sahakārihetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:249_14: evamete daśa hetavastadanyeṣvapi laukikeṣu bhāveṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_1: tatra sarvasya pratītyasamutpādasya yadidaṃ nāmasaṃjñā-vāgvyāhāraḥ tadyathā avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃvistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_3: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityevamādikasya anuvyavahārasya viṣayāsvādāpekṣā caiṣu bhavāṅgeṣu pravṛtiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_5: avidyādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme yāni bījāni jātasya bhūtasyeha tānyanyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyākṣepahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_8: te punaravidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā uttarottarāvāhanapāraṃparyeṇa tasyānyajānmikasya jātijarāmaraṇasyāvāhakahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_9: anye saha svavīryairavidyādayo bhavaparyavasānā narakopapattaye saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:250_12: apekṣāhetumādiṃ kṛtvā sarva ete hetavaḥ pratiniyamahetuparyavasānāḥ sahakāriheturityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:250_13: tasya punaḥ saṃkleśasya virodhahetuḥ gotrasaṃpad buddhānāmutpādaḥ saddharmasya deśanā satpuruṣasaṃsevā saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāro dharmānudharmapratipattiḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_16: tatra yaḥ sarveṣu vyavadānapakṣyeṣu dharmeṃṣu nirodhe ca nirvāṇe nāmasaṃjñāvāgvyāhāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_18: itīmāni smṛtyupasthānāni samyak prahāṇāni yāvadāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaṃḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_20: tatra yā saṃskārādīnavāpekṣā vyavadānaparyeṣaṇā vyavadānaparigraho vyavadānapariniṣpattiḥ ayamasyāpekṣāhetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_21: yā gotrasthasya pudgalasya gotrasaṃpat sopadhiśeṣa [nirūpadhiśeṣa] nirvāṇādhigamāya pūrvaṅgamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:250_24: tāni gotrasaṃgṛhītānyanāsravabodhipakṣyadharmabījāni teṣāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttihetuḥ te punaḥ svabījānnirvṛttā bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sopadhiśeṣa-nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātvoḥ krameṇāvāhakahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_25: [Dutt_72] tatra yacchrāvakagotraṃ śrāvakayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate pratyekabuddhagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate mahāyānagotraṃ mahāyānena parinirvāṇāya saṃvartate ayaṃ vyavadānasya pratiniyamahetuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_29: tatra yaḥ saṃkleśapakṣyo virodhahetuḥ sa vyavadānaheturdraṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:250_31: evaṃ ebhirdaśabhirhetubhiḥ saṃkleśo daśabhireva vyavadānaṃ bhavatyatīte 'pyadhvanyabhūdanāgate 'pyadhvani bhaviṣyati saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā na ebhya uttari na ebhyo bhūyānanyo heturvidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:251_0: tatra phalaṃ katamat / samāsataḥ pañca phalāni / vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalamadhipatiphalañca /
SA20bsa034_u:252_1: kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ sugatau / tadvipākaphalam / yatpunarakuśalābhyāsādakuśalārāmatā saṃtiṣṭhate akuśalabahulatā kuśalābhyāsātkuśalārāmatā kuśalabahulatā pūrvakarmasādṛśyena vā paścātphalānuvartanatā tanniṣyandaphalam /
SA20bsa034_u:252_3: yaḥ punalaukikena mārgeṇa kleśanirodhaḥ sa nātyantamanuvartate pṛthagjanānām /
SA20bsa034_u:252_5: yatpunarekatyadṛṣṭe dharme 'nyatamānyatamena śilpakarmasthānasanniśritena puruṣakāreṇa yadi vā kṛṣyā yadi vā vaṇijyayā yadi vā rājapauruṣṭeṇa lipi-gaṇana-nyasana-saṃkhyā-mudrayā sasyādikaṃ lābhādikañca phalamabhinirvartayati idamucyate puruṣakāraphalam /
SA20bsa034_u:252_9: iti sarveṣāmindriyasya / iti sarveṣāmindriyāṇāṃ dvāviṃśatīnāṃ svena svenādhipatyena yatphalaṃ nirvartate tadadhipatiphalaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:252_12: [Dutt_73] evaṃ hi bodhisattvo buddhavacanaṃ samyaghetuphalaparidīpanākāraṃ viditvā sthānāsthānajñānabalagotramāsevanānvayāt krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:253_1: na ca svayaṃ kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kalpaśatairapi praṇāśo bhavati phaladānaṃ prati /
SA20bsa034_u:253_2: evamakṛtānabhyāgamakṛtāvipraṇāśaṃ buddhavacanaṃ paridīpitaṃ bodhisattvo yathābhūtaṃ jñātvā karma-svakatā-jñānabalagotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:254_1: iha bodhisattvastīvraṃ gauravamupasthāpya subhāṣite sulapite dharma paryeṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:254_3: yadasau bodhisattva ekasubhāṣitaśravaṇahetorapi taptāṃ jvalitāmapyayomayīṃ bhūmiṃ pareṇa prāmodyenādareṇa praviśedyadyanyathā subhāṣitaśravaṇaṃ na labheta prāgeva prabhūtasya subhāṣitasyārthe /
SA20bsa034_u:254_4: yacca bodhisattvasya sve ātmabhāve samucchraye premagauravaṃ prāgevānyeṣu sarvakāyapariṣkāreṣu bhojanapānādiṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:254_5: yacca subhāṣitaśravaṇe pūrvakaṃ premagauravaṃ paścimaṃ premagauravamupanidhāya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopaiti sa tathā subhāṣite gauravajātaḥ subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvannakhinnaśca bhavattyatṛptaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:254_7: saguṇa kāmatayā dharmakāmatayā dharmabhāṇakamupasaṃkrāmati nopārambhābhiprāyeṇa sagauravatayā na mānastambhena kiṃkuśalagaveṣaṇatayā na ātmodbhāvanārtham ātmānañca parāṃśca kuśalamūle saṃniyojayiṣyāmīti na lābhasatkārahetoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:258_1: dharme gauravamupasthāpya dharmabhāṇake pudgale gauravamupasthāpya dharmamaparibhavan dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalamaparibhavan ebhiścaturbhirākārairavamanyanāsaṃkleśavigataḥ śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:259_1: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asaṃkliṣṭo dharma śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:260_0: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ avikṣipto dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:260_1: pañcabhirākāraiḥ / ājñācitta ekāgracittaḥ avihitaśrotraḥ samāvarjitamānasaḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:261_3: hetuvidyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate tasyaiva śāstrasya durbhāṣitadurlapitatāyā yathābhūta parijñānārthaṃ paravādanigrahārthaṃ cāprasannānāmasmiṃcchāsane prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
SA20bsa034_u:261_6: cikitsāśāstraṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate sattvānāṃ nānāprakāravyādhivyupaśamanārthaṃ mahājanakāyasyānugrahārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:261_7: laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'lpakṛcchreṇa bhogasaṃharaṇārthaṃ sattvānāmarthāya sattvānāñca bahumānotpādanārthaṃ śilpajñānasaṃvibhāgena cānugrahasaṃgrahārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:261_8: sarvāṇi ca etāni pañcavidyāsthānāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhermahājñānasambhāraparipūṇārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:261_9: na hi sarvatraivamaśikṣamāṇaḥ krameṇa sarvajñajñānamanāvaraṇaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:261_10: yattāvadvodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate yathā ca paryeṣate yadarthañca paryeṣate tannirdiṣṭam /
SA20bsa034_u:262_1: kathañca deśayati / kimarthañca deśayati / tatra yadeva paryeṣate tadeva deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:262_4: anulomāṃ ca kathāṃ kathayati pariśuddhāṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:262_7: na uccatarake āsane niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya nodgunṭhikākṛtāya na purato gacchate vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:262_11: sarveṣāṃ ca deśayati / nirantaraṃ sarvaṃ ca deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:262_16: saṃdarśayitavyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayitavyāṃ samādāpayati samuttejayitavyāṃ samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayitavyāṃ saṃpraharṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:262_18: sugatigamanānukūlāmapi avyākulāmapi supraveśāṃna gahanāṃ caturāryasatyapratisaṃyuktāmapi sarvāsāñca pariṣadāṃ yā pariṣad yā kathā yathārhati tāṃ tathāsyai kathaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:263_0: punaśca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu [sattveṣu] maitracittatāmupasthāpya kathāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:263_2: sukhitaduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu pramatteṣu dīneṣu hitasukhānukampācittatāmupasthāpya kathāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:263_4: na parān paṃsayati / nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittenāpratikāṃkṣamāṇo lābhasatkāraślokaṃ pareṣāṃ dharmān deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:264_2: kālena satkṛtyānupūrvamanusandhyanusahitaṃ harṣayatā roca[yatā] toṣayatā utsāhayatā anavasādayatā yuktā sahitā 'vyavakīrṇānudhārmikī yathā pariṣat maitracittena hitacittenānukampācittenāniśritena lābhasatkāraśloke ātmānamanutkarṣayatā parāṃścāpaṃsayatā /
SA20bsa034_u:265_3: teṣāmeva [yathā] paryeṣitānāṃ yathodgṛhītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kāyena vācā manasā cānuvartanā samyak cintanā bhāvanā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:266_0: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhagavatā kāyena vācā manasā kriyā niṣiddhā yeṣāñcābhyanujñātā kāyena vācā manasā kriyā tasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇastathaiva parivarjanaṃ pratiniṣevaṇā samudānayatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:267_1: iha bodhisattva ekākī rahogato yathāśrutāṃ dharmāṃścintayitukāmastulayitukāma upaparīkṣitukāma ādita evācintyāni sthānāni vivarjayitvā dharmāṃścintayitumārabhate pratatañca cintayati /
SA20bsa034_u:267_4: kiñcidadhimucyata eva / arthapratisaraṇaśca bhavati cintayanna vyañjanapratisaraṇaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:267_8: aciṃntyaṃ varjayan bodhisattvaḥ sammohaṃ ciṃttāvikṣepaṃ nādhigacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:267_11: yuktyā punaḥ kiñcit pravi[cinvan] praviśayan vicārayan na parapratyayo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:267_12: teṣu yuktiparīkṣiteṣu dharmeṣu kiñcitpunaradhimucyamāno ye 'pyasya dharmeṣu gambhīreṣu buddhirnāvagāhate tathāgatagocarā ete dharmā nāsmadbuddhigocarā ityevamapratikṣipaṃstān dharmānātmānamakṣatañcānupahatañca pariharatyanavadyam /
SA20bsa034_u:267_13: arthaṃ pratisaran bodhisattvo na vyañjanaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvasandhyāya-vacanānyanupraviśati /
SA20bsa034_u:267_14: kālāpadeśamahāpadeśakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ tattvārthānna vicalayituṃ na vikampayituṃ kenacit kathaṃcicchakyate /
SA20bsa034_u:267_16: tāmeva punaḥ pratilabdhāṃ [Dutt_77] kṣāntiṃ sāratāmupanayan bodhisattvaḥ bhāvanāma nupraviśati /
SA20bsa034_u:269_0: tatra śamathaḥ katamaḥ / yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ aṣṭākārāyāśvintāyāḥ susamāptatvānnirabhilāpye vastumātre 'rthamātre ālambane cittamupanibadhya sarvaprapañcāpagatena sarvacittapariplavāpagatena saṃjñā-manasikāreṇa sarvālambanānyadhimucyamānaḥ adhyātmasamādhinirmitteṣu cittaṃ saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati vistareṇa yāvadekotīkaroti samādhatte /
SA20bsa034_u:270_0: vipaśyanā katamā tenaiva punaḥ śamathaparibhāvitena manaskāreṇa yathā cintitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nimittamanasikriyā vicayaḥ pravicayo dharmapravicayaḥ vistareṇa yāvatpāṇḍityaṃ prajñācāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:271_0: śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ śamathavipaśyanāyāñca sātatyaprayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayogaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:273_0: tatra bodhisattvo yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhyāsaṃ karoti tathā tathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:273_1: yathā yathā śamathavipaśyanābhiratiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate tathā tathā śamatho vipaśyanā ca pariśudhyataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:273_2: yathā yathā śamatho viśudhyati tathā tathā kāyaprasrabdhiścittaprasrabdhiḥ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:273_3: yathā yathā vipaśyanā viśudhyati tathā tathā jñānadarśanaṃ pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:273_5: yadutāśrayagatañca dauṣṭhulyamanapanetavyaṃ sarvatra ca jñeye jñānadarśanaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:273_6: caitatsarvaṃ bhāvanākarmānayā caturākārayā bhāvanayā bodhisattvasya saṃpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:274_2: yathāpi tadvodhisattvaḥ samādhisanniśrayeṇa vā saṃvāsānvayādvā yeṣāmavavaditukāmo bhavati yo vā punaranyo bodhisattvo 'smai avavadati tathāgato vā sa ādita eva cittaṃ paryeṣate jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:274_7: yadi vā 'śubhayā yadi vā maitryā yadi vā idaṃpratyayatā-pratītyasamutpādena yadi vā dhātubhedena yadi vā ānāpānasmṛtyā yathāyogaṃ yathārhamavaratāramukheṣvavatārya śāśvatāntāsadgrāha pratipakṣeṇa madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:275_0: so 'yamaṣṭavidho 'vavādaḥ punaḥ samāsatastribhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:275_1: trīṇi sthānāni katamāni / asthitasya cittasyādito 'vasthitaye samyagālambanopanibandhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:275_4: tatra cittendriyāśayānuśayajñānena yathāyogamavatāramukhāvatāraṇatayā ca cittasthitaye samyagālambanopanibandho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:275_5: tatra śāśvatocchedāntāsadgrāhapratipakṣeṇa madhyamayā pratipadā sthitacittasya svārthaprāptaye samyagupāyamārgadeśanā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:276_0: eva mevāvavādaṃ parato vā labhamāno bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vānuprayacchannaṣṭānāṃ balānāṃ gotraṃ krameṇa viśodhayati vivardhayati dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalasyendriyaparāparajñānabalasya nānādhimuktijñānabalasya nānādhātujñānabalasya sarvatra gāminī pratipaj jñānabalasya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalasya cyutyupapattijñānabalasya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:277_1: tatrānuśāsanaṃ katamat / tatpañcavidhaṃ veditavyam / sāvadyasamudācārapratiṣedhaḥ anavadyasamudācārābhyanujñā pratiṣiddhābhyanujñāteṣu dharmeṣu skhalitasamācāra-saṃcodanā punaḥ punaranādarajātasya skhalataḥ avasādanayā smṛtikaraṇānupradānamakaluṣeṇāvipariṇatena snigdhenāśayena /
SA20bsa034_u:277_2: samyak pratipannasya ca pratiṣiddhābhyanujñāteṣu dharmeṣu bhūtaguṇapriyākhyānatayā saṃpraharṣaṇā /
SA20bsa034_u:278_2: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā catuḥsaṃgrahavastusaṃgṛhītenopāyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo bodhisattva ityucyata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:278_3: kena punaḥ kāraṇena catvāri saṃgrahavastūnyupāya ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:278_8: tathā hi vicitreṇāmiṣadānenānugṛhyamāṇāḥ sattvāḥ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ manyate /
SA20bsa034_u:278_9: tadanantaraṃ bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ tatsammohāśeṣāpanayāya yuktiṃ grāhayati sandarśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:278_11: tathā ca yuktyā grāhitān sandarśitānsattvān akuśalātsthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:278_13: evañca bodhisattvaḥ tānsarvānavatārya tatsabhāgavṛttasamācāreṇānuvartate yenāsya na bhavanti vineyā vaktāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:278_14: tvaṃ tāvadātmanā na śraddhāsampannaḥ śīlasampannastyāgasampannaḥ prajñāsampannaḥ kasmādbhavān parānatra samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:278_15: tena ca codayati smārayatīti tasmātsamānarthatā bodhisattvasya caturtho 'nuvartaka upāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:279_0: ityebhiścaturbhirupāyaryatparigṛhītaṃ samastairvyastairvā bodhisattvasya kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
SA20bsa034_u:284_0: iha bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:285_2: svabhāvadānaṃ sarvadānaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ dānaṃ satpuruṣadānaṃ sarvākāradānaṃ vighātārthikadānamihāmutrasukhaṃ dānaṃ viśuddhadānaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:286_0: kaśca dānasya svabhāvaḥ / yā cetanā sarvapariṣkāra-svadehanirapekṣasya bodhisattvasya kevalādhyātmikavastuparityāgāya kāyavākkarmānavadyaśca sarvadeyavastuparityāgaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:286_1: saṃvarasthāyinaḥ āgamadṛṣṭeḥ phaladarśino yo yenārthī tasya ca tadvastupratipādanā bodhisattvasya dānasvabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:287_0: tatra sarvadānaṃ katamat / sarvamucyate samāsato dvividhaṃ deyavastu /
SA20bsa034_u:287_1: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyañca / tatra ā majjñaḥ svadehaparityāgo bodhisattvasya kevalādhyātmikavastuparityāga ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:287_2: yatpunarbodhisattvo vāntāśināṃ sattvānāmarthe bhuktvā bhuktvā 'nnapānaṃ vamati /
SA20bsa034_u:287_5: tatra bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dehārthināṃ samāsato dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ svadehamanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:287_8: evameva nirāmiṣacitto bodhisattvaḥ paramabodhikāmaḥ parahitasukhakāmo dānapāramittāṃ paripūrayitukāmo yathākaraṇīyaṃ pareṣāṃ vaśyaṃ paravidheyamātmānaṃ pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:287_10: dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvo bāhyaṃ vastu sattvebhyaḥ parityajati /
SA20bsa034_u:287_12: tadvaśitvāya vā sarveṇa sarva nirmuktena cittenānuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:287_13: na ca punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvamādhyātmikabāhyaṃ vastvaviśeṣeṇaiva sarvathā ca sattvānāṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:287_15: kathaṃ na dadāti / yadasmādādhyātmikabāhyādvastunaḥ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ sukhāyaiva syānna tu hitāya naiva vāsukhāya nāpi hitāya tadbodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ na dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:287_16: yatpunarhitāya syānnāvaśyaṃ sukhāyā-sukhāya vā punarhitāya ca tadvodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:288_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ parotpīḍanāya [paravadhāya] paravañcanāya cāyogavihitena copanimantritamātmānaṃ paravaśyaṃ paravidheyaṃ na dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:288_2: apyeva nāma bodhisattvaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ svajīvitaparityāgamapi pareṣāmantikādabhyupagacchet /
SA20bsa034_u:288_3: natveva rājñayā parārādhanārthaṃ parotpīḍanāṃ paravadhaṃ paravañcanāṃ vā kuryāt /
SA20bsa034_u:288_4: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśayo bhavati dānamārabhya so 'pi sattvakārye prabhūte karaṇīye pratyupasthite svadehāṅgapratyaṅgayācanake ca pratyupasthite na svadehāṅgapratyaṅgānyanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:288_5: tatkasya hetoḥ / na hyasya bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya śuddhāśayasya punaḥ kenacitparyāyeṇedaṃ dātavyamasmai dātanyamiti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:288_6: tasmādasau bodhisattvo yadāśayaśuddhyarthaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadyāt so 'syāśayaḥ śuddha iti na [Dutt_82] pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:288_7: na ca mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhābhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:288_8: mā haiva teṣāmadhimātrā kṣatiścopahatiśca bhaviṣyatīti yathā mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:288_12: nārthino mṛgayante / nānyatra vipralāpaḥ / sa teṣāmasvatantratvāccetasaḥ tasmānna dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:288_13: etānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayāt svadehaṃ tāvadbodhisattvaḥ paravidheyatayā vā 'ṅgapratyaṅgavibhāgaśo vārthibhyaḥ parityajati /
SA20bsa034_u:289_0: bāhyātpunarvastuno bodhisattvo yāni viṣāgniśastramadyāni sattvānāmupaghātāya tāni nānuprayacchatyarthibhyaḥ ātmopaghātāya vā yācitānyarthināṃ paropaghātāya [vā] /
SA20bsa034_u:289_1: yāni punarviṣāgniśasramadyānyanugrahāya sattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvo dadātyarthibhya ātmano vā 'nugrahāya yācitānyarthināṃ parānugrahāya vā /
SA20bsa034_u:289_2: punarna ca bodhisattvaḥ parakīyaṃ draviṇamaviśvāsyaṃ parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:289_3: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sāñcaritreṇa paradāramupasaṃhṛtya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:289_5: yadapi [rati]krīḍopasaṃhitamanarthopasaṃhitaṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvasya deyaṃ vastu tadapi bodhisattvo 'rthibhyo na dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:289_6: tatkasya hetoḥ / yadyapi tadvastu teṣāṃ cittaprasādamātrakamutpādayed bodhisattvasyāntike /
SA20bsa034_u:289_7: apitu vipulataramasya taddānamanarthaṃ kuryādyaddhetorasau madaṃ pramādaṃ duścaritamadhyāpadyamānaḥ kāyasya bhedādapāyeṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:289_8: sa cetpunastadratikrīḍādikaṃ va tu nāpāyagamanāya bhavennāpi cākuśalamūlopacayāya kāmaṃ tadbodhisattvastādṛśaṃ ratikrīḍādikaṃ vasta cittaprasādahetoranupracchedarthibhyastenāpi vastunā saṃgrahāya paripākāya /
SA20bsa034_u:289_9: kīdṛśaṃ punā ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:290_0: kidṛśaṃ dadāti / tadyathā mṛgavadhaśikṣāṃ bodhisattvo na dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_1: kṣudrayajñeṣu ca mahārambheṣu yeṣu bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃghātamāpadya jīvitādvyaparopyante /
SA20bsa034_u:290_2: tadrūpān yajñānna svayaṃ yajati na parairyājayati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_4: na ca prabhūtaprāṇyāśritān [deśān] jalajairvā [sthalajairvā] prāṇibhiradhyuṣitāṃsteṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_5: [Dutt_83] na jālāni na yantrāṇi na jālayantraśikṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_6: nāpyākrośāya vadhāya bandhāya daṇḍanāya kāraṇāya śatrūṇāṃ śatrumanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_7: samāsato bodhisattvo yatkiñcit parasattvotpīḍayā parasattvabādhāya sattvānāṃ ratikrīḍāvastu tatsarvaṃbodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:290_8: yāni punarimāni vicitrāṇi hastyaśvarathayānavāhanāni vastrālaṅkārāṇi praṇītāni ca pānabhojanāni nṛttagītavāditaśikṣā nṛttagītavāditabhājanāni ca gandhamālyavilepanaṃ vicitraśca bhāṇḍopaskara udyānāni ca gṛhāṇi striyaśca paricaryāyai vividheṣu ca śilpakarmasthāneṣu śikṣā ityevaṃrūpaṃ ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvaścittaprasādahetorarthibhyo 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_9: na ca bodhisattvaḥ amātrayā 'pathyaṃ vā glānāyārthine 'pi pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_10: na tṛpteṣu lolupajātīyeṣu sattveṣu praṇītaṃ pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_11: nāpi ca śokārtānāṃ sattvānāmātmodbandhanāya vā tāḍnāya vā viṣabhakṣaṇāya vā prapātapatanāya vā kāmakāraṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_12: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitaraṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃmarthibhyo 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_13: tathāhi bodhisattvasya mātāpitaraṃ paramaguru-sthānīyamāpāyakaṃ poṣakaṃ saṃvardhakaṃ tadbodhisattvena dīrgharātraṃ śirasodvahatā na khedamāpattavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:290_14: tayoścādhamanabandhaka sthāpanavikraye ātmā vaśyo vidheyo dātavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:290_15: tatkathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parebhyo 'nupradātumutsaheta kutaḥ punaḥ pradadyāt /
SA20bsa034_u:290_16: nāpi bodhisattvo rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivīmaṇḍale sattvānāṃ saparigrahāṇāṃ parakīyaṃ putradāraṃ pareṣāmantikādācchidya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_17: nānyatra kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā bhogamanuprayacchet /
SA20bsa034_u:290_19: na ca bodhisattvaḥ svaṃ putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparigrahaṃ samyagasaṃjñaptamakāmakaṃ vimanaskaṃ pareṣāmarthināmanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_20: samyak saṃjñaptamapi ca sumanaskaṃ chandajātaṃ nāmitreṣu na yakṣarākṣaseṣu na raudrakarmasu pratipādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_21: nāpi ca dāsabhāvāya pratipādayati putradāraṃ sukumāraṃ kulaputraṃ janam /
SA20bsa034_u:290_22: na ca bodhisattvo 'dhimātraparapīḍāpravṛtteṣu raudrakarmasu yācanakeṣu rājyapradānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_23: rājyādapi ca tāṃstathāvidhān pudgalāṃścyāvayati sa cet pratibalo bhavati cyāvayitum /
SA20bsa034_u:290_24: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitrorantikādbhogānācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_26: nāpi ca [Dutt_84] mātāpitaraṃ bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvatkarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ bādhitvā parebhyo yācanakebhyo deyavastu parityajati /
SA20bsa034_u:290_27: dharmaṇa cāsāhasena bodhisattvo bhogān saṃhṛtya dānaṃ dadāti nādharmeṇa sāhasena /
SA20bsa034_u:290_28: na paramutpīḍyopahatya na ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane bodhisattvo vyavasthitaḥ śikṣāṃ vyatikramya kathañcit dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_29: dānañca dadad bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto dadāti dakṣiṇīyabuddhimupasthāpya mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣasatsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu ca /
SA20bsa034_u:290_30: na ca bodhisattvo yathoktādyathāpratijñātādyācanakāya nyūnaṃ dāna dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_32: na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītaṃ vastu pratijñāya lūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_33: nānyatralūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ pratijñāya praṇītaṃ dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte /
SA20bsa034_u:290_34: na ca bodhisattvo vimanasko na kruddhaḥ kṣubhitamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_35: nāpi ca dānaṃ dattvā nindayati punaḥ punaḥ parikīrtanatayā evaṃ caivañca tvaṃ mayā dānenānugṛhītaḥ savardhito 'bhyuddhṛto veti /
SA20bsa034_u:290_36: na ca bodhisattvo nihīnapuruṣasyāpi dānaṃ dadadapaviddhamasatkṛtyānuprayacchati prāgeva guṇavataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:292_0: yācanakānāmākrośakānāṃ roṣakāṇāṃ paribhāṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattyā khinnamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:292_1: nānyatra teṣāmevāntike bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśāveśaprakṛtitāmavagamyānukampācittamupasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:292_3: tadyathā mahāraudrayajñeṣu na hiṃsādānena dharmaṃ pratyeti /
SA20bsa034_u:292_5: nāpi suviśuddhenāpi sarvākāreṇa dānamātrakeṇa laukikalokottarāṃ vairāgyaviśuddhiṃ pratyeti nānyatra /
SA20bsa034_u:292_7: na ca phaladarśī dadāti / sarvañca dānamanuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau pariṇāmayati /
SA20bsa034_u:292_8: sarvaprakārasya dānasya sarvaṃ prakāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ phalaṃ vipāke 'bhisaṃpratyayajāto bodhisattvo 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyo dānaṃ dadāti tadyathā 'nnado balavān bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:292_9: vastrado varṇavān yānadaḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpada ityevamādi vistareṇa veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:292_10: na ca bodhisattvo dāridryabhayabhīto dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:292_12: na ca bodhisattvo yācanakānāmapratirūpaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:292_13: tadyathā yatīnāmucchiṣṭaṃ vā pānabhojanamuccāraprasrāvakheṭaśiṃghāṇakavāntaviriktapūyarudhiṃrasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ [Dutt_85] vā abhidūṣitaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:293_2: tathā 'pratirūpe karmaṇi viniyojya bodhisattvo na pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:293_4: na ca punarbodhisattvo yācanakaṃ punaḥ punaryācanatayā gatapratyāgatikatayā sevāvṛttasaṃvidhānena parikliśya dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:293_5: nānyatra yācitamātra eva / na ca bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaślokamiśritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:293_7: na ca pareṣāṃ kuhanārthaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:293_8: kaccinmāṃ pare rājāno vā rājamahāmātyā vā naigamajanapadā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhā dātāraṃ dānapatiṃ viditvā satkuryurgurūkuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuriti /
SA20bsa034_u:293_9: na ca kārpaṇyadānaṃ dadāti / alpādapi viśadaṃ dadāti prāgeva prabhūtāt /
SA20bsa034_u:293_10: na ca pareṣāṃ vipralambhāya dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_0: anena dānena vilobhya viśrambhayitvā paścādenaṃ vipravādayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_1: na ca vibhedāya parataḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_2: tadyathā dānena grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā vibhedya svāmināmantikādācchetsyāmyākramiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_3: dakṣaśca bodhisattvo bhavatyanalasaśca utthānasampannaḥ svayaṃ ca sannaddhaḥ parikare pūrvaṅgamo deyavastu parityāge svayañca dadāti paraiśca dāpayati na svayaṃ kausīdyaṃ prāviṣkṛtya parānājñāpayati dānāya /
SA20bsa034_u:294_4: mahāntamapi gaṇasannipātamarthināṃ śīlavadduḥśīlānāṃ sanniṣaṇṇaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā vṛddhāntamupādāya yāvannavakāntaṃ tatsarvaṃ deyavastu gatapratyāgatikatayā punaḥ punaranukrameṇa pratipādayati na ca bodhisattvaḥ prabhūteṣu vipuleṣu vistīrṇeṣu bhogeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu mitaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_5: na ca paraviheṭhanāya pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_7: pūrvameva ca dānād bodhisattvaḥ sumanā bhavati dadaccittaṃ prasādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:294_9: na ca śāṭhyāddānaṃ dadāti maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāvaidūryapravāḍādipratirūpakāṇi tadāśāvatāṃ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:294_10: na ca bodhisattvena kiñcidalpaṃ [vā prabhūtaṃ vā] deyavastu yanna prāgeva cetasā sarvasattvānāṃ [Dutt_86] nirmuktaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:294_12: kālena ca bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadāti nākālena /
SA20bsa034_u:294_14: ācāreṇa nānācāreṇa / avikṣiptena ca cetasā na vikṣiptena /
SA20bsa034_u:294_17: na bhṛkuṭīkṛto bhavati / uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitapūrvaṃṅgamaḥ pūrvābhibhāṣī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:294_18: na ca vilambitaṃ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:294_19: ayācito 'pi bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pravārayitvā parān yo yenārthī bhavati tasya taddadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu pūrvameva yācanakābhyāgamanādevaṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_2: sa cenme dvau yācanakāvāgacchetāṃ sukhitaścākṛpaṇo 'varākaḥ sanāthaḥ sapratisaraṇaḥ duḥkhitaśca kṛpaṇo varākaḥ anāthaḥ apratisaraṇaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:295_3: tena mayā sacenme bhogānāṃ dvayorapi santarpaṇāyecchāparipūraye tadā saṃbhavo 'sti ubhau santarpayitavyau /
SA20bsa034_u:295_5: sa cenna tāvadbhogasaṃbhavaḥ syādahaṃ dvayoḥ santarpayeyaṃ yadicchāparipūriñca kuryāṃ sukhitamapahāya duḥkhitāya dānaṃ deyam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_6: akṛpaṇamavarākaṃ sanāthaṃ sapratisaraṇamapahāya kṛpaṇāya varākāya anāthāyāpratisaraṇāya dānaṃ deyamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_7: sa evaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya yathābhisaṃskārameva karmaṇā saṃpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_8: sa cetpunaḥ sukhitasya yācanakasyecchāṃ na śaknoti paripūrayituṃ sa tameva pūrvakaṃ svacittābhisaṃskārakalpamupādāya taṃ yācakamevaṃ saṃjñapya preṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_9: asya mayā duḥkhitasya pūrvanisṛṣṭaṃ pūrvapratijñātametaddeyavastu ato mayā 'syaiva pratipāditam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_12: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yāni tāni matsarikulāni bhavanti paramamatsarikulānyāgṛhītapariṣkārāṇi kuṭakuñcakāni yeṣu na jātu śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu deyadharme prajāyate tāni bodhisattvaḥ kulānyupasaṃkramya pratisaṃmodya praṇayañca saṃvidhāyaivamāha /
SA20bsa034_u:295_13: aṅga tāvatte bhavantaḥ akośakṣayeṇa mahatā upakāreṇa pratyavasthitā bhavantu /
SA20bsa034_u:295_14: mama gṛhe vipulā bhogā vipulā deyadharmāḥ [Dutt_87] saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:295_16: sa cedyūyaṃ yācanakamārāgayatha mā nirākṛtya visarjayiṣyatha madīyaṃ dhanaṃ deyadharmamādāya tebhyo vā visṛjata yathāsukhameva /
SA20bsa034_u:295_17: athavā taṃ yācanakamasmākamupasaṃharatha dīyamānañca mayā dānamanumodatha /
SA20bsa034_u:295_18: te ca tasya pratiśrutyākośakṣayeṇa priyeṇāyaṃ kulaputro 'smākamārādhitacitto bhavatīti tathā kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_19: evaṃ hi tena bodhisattvena yeṣāmāyatyāṃ mātsaryamalavinayāya bījamavaropitaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_20: krameṇa ca tenābhyāsena tena prajñāpūrvakeṇopāyakauśalyena svakamapi parīttaṃ parebhyo dhanamanuprayacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_23: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo ye 'sya bhavantyācāryopādhyāyāḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsinaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaśca lobhaprakṛtayo lubdhajātīyā ye ca na lubdhajātīyā api tu deyadharmavaikalyādicchāvighātavantastatra bodhisattvo buddhāvaropitaṃ vā dharmā[varopitaṃ vā] saṃghāvaropitaṃ vā dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kartukāmasteṣāmevotsṛjati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_24: tān deya dharmāṃstaiḥ kārayati na svayaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_25: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena svayañca bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_29: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yācanakamākūṭananimittamātrakeṇaiva jñātvā yathākāmaṃ deyadharmaiḥ pratipādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_31: tasyāpi bhāvamājñāya tadduścaritamanyeṣāmapi tāvacchādayati prāgeva tasyaiva /
SA20bsa034_u:295_32: icchāñcāsya paripūrayati yenāsāvamaṅkurudagro viśāradaḥ saumanasyajāto viprakrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_33: yenāpi ca bodhisattvaḥ kūṭa-kapaṭena vañcito bhavati na cānena sā vañcanā pūrvaṃ pratividdhā bhavati paścācca pratividhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_34: pratividhya na ca tena vastunā punastaṃ vyaṃsakaṃ pudgalañcodayati smārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_36: ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_37: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ asatsu asaṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu kṛtāvī bodhisattvasteṣu teṣu śilpakarmasthāneṣu sa tadrūpaṃ śilpakarmasthānamāmukhīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_39: pareṣāñcitrakatho madhurakathaḥ kalyāṇapratibhāno bodhisattvāstathā dharmadeśanāṃ pravartayati yathā daridrāṇāmapi sattvānāṃ dātukāmatā santiṣṭhate prāgevāḍhyānām /
SA20bsa034_u:295_41: yāni vā punastāni śrāddhakulāni yeṣvaharahaḥ pravṛtā eva deyadharmā vistīrṇabhogatayā teṣu kuleṣu āgatāgatān yācanakānupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_42: svayameva vā gatvā dāneṣu dīyamāneṣu puṇyeṣu kriyamāṇeṣu dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasampannaścittamabhiprasādya kāyena vācā yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_44: evaṃ hi taddānam / yadupasthāpaka-vaiguṇyād duṣpratipāditaṃ syāt pakṣapatitaṃ vā anādarato vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣato vā tanna bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_45: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asatsvasaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu prājñadānasya dātā bhavati yāvadāśayaśuddhi nādhigacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:295_46: śuddhāśayastu bodhisattvo yathaivāpāsamatikramaṃ pratilabhate tathaivākṣayabhogatāṃ janmani pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:295_47: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo na tīrthikāya randhraprekṣiṇe dharmaṃ mukhoddeśato vā pustakagataṃ vā dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_48: nāpi lobhaprakṛtaye pustakaṃ vikretukāmāya sannidhiṃ vā kartukāmāya /
SA20bsa034_u:295_50: punaḥ sa cetkṛtārthaḥ pustakena bhavati svayaṃ dadātyasmai yathāsukhameva /
SA20bsa034_u:295_51: sa cedakṛtārtho bhavati yasyārthe tena tatpustakamanvāvartitam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_52: evamasau bodhisattvaḥ ādarśamanyaṃ dṛṣṭvā lekhayitvā vānyaddadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:295_53: sa cennaivādarśaṃ paśyati nāpi lekhayituṃ śaknoti tenādita evaṃ svacittaṃ pratyavekṣitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_55: mā haivāhamāśayata eva na dātukāmo 'bhilikhitaṃ dharmam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_56: sa cetsa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyādasti me dharmamātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya dātavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_57: evaṃ dharmadānaṃ syāt / yadyahamanena dharmadānena mūka evaṃ syāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme tathāpi mayā 'nadhivāsya kleśaṃ dātavyameva syāddharmadānam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_59: sa cetpunaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyānnāsti me [dharma] mātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:295_60: aham [ātmanaḥ] kleśanirghātanārthaṃ vā etaddharmadānaṃ dadyāṃ jñānasaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ vā sattva [Dutt_89] priyatāyaiva vā /
SA20bsa034_u:295_64: ananuprayacchaṃścāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya jñānaṃ samudānaya tasya ca sattvasya tadanyeṣāñca sarvasattvānāṃ priyakārī bhavāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:295_65: anupracchannasyaivaikasya sattvasya priyakārī iti viditvā yathābhūtaṃ sa cedbodhisattvo na dadātyanavadyo bhavatyavipratisārī /
SA20bsa034_u:296_0: kathañca punarna dadāti / na khalu punarbodhisattvaḥ utsahate yācanakaṃ niṣṭhurayā vācā pratikṣeptum /
SA20bsa034_u:296_2: tatredamupāyakauśalyam / prāgeva bodhisattvena sarvapariṣkārāḥ sarvadeyadharmā daśasu dikṣu viśaddhenāśayena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti vikalpitāstadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā upādhyāyāya vā cīvaraṃ vikalpayet /
SA20bsa034_u:296_7: yadi yācanakaṃ paśyati yuktarūpaścāsmin yathepsitaṃ deyadharmapratipādanaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:296_8: sa nāsti tat kiñcid buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yatsattveṣu aparityaktamiti viditvā yācanakasyecchāṃ paripūrayati /
SA20bsa034_u:296_9: no cedyuktarūpaṃ samanupaśyati sa tameva kalpamupādāya parakīyametad bhadramukha na caitadyuṣmākamanujñātaṃ dātumiti ślakṣnena vacasā saṃjñapyainaṃ preṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:296_10: anyadvā tad dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ dānamānasatkāraṃ kṛtvānupreṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:296_11: yenāsau jānīte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo lobhātmakatayā 'smākaṃ na dātukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:296_12: api tu nūnamasvatantra evaṃ tasmin pustakadharmadāne yena na dadātīti /
SA20bsa034_u:296_14: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadānāni dharmāmiṣābhaya[dānā]ni praryāyato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pi nirvacanato 'pi hetuphalaprabhedato 'pi yathābhūtaṃ prajānannanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:296_16: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitryāśayo dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:296_17: duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāśayaḥ / guṇavatsu muditāśayaḥ / [Dutt_90] upakāriṣu mitreṣu suhṛtsūpekṣāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:297_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo dānavibandhanamapi dānavibandhapratipakṣamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:297_3: agre manorame ca vastuni gṛddhiḥ āyatyāñca bhogasampatti phaladarśanābhinandanatā /
SA20bsa034_u:297_4: yataśca bodhisattvasya deyadharmeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu yācanake ca samyagupasthite dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:297_5: so 'nabhyāsakṛto me 'yaṃ doṣa iti laghu ladhveva prajñayā pratisidhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:297_6: evañca punaḥ pratividhyati / nūnaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ dānaṃ na dattaṃ yena me etarhi samyak saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu samyak pratyupasthite ca yācanake dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:297_7: sa cedetarhina pratisaṃkhyāya dāsyāmi punarapi me āyatyāṃ dānavidveṣo bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:297_8: sa eva pratibidhya dānapratibandhapratipakṣa niśṛtya pratisaṃkhyāya dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:297_10: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa cedyad yācanake samyak pratyupasthite parīttabhogatayā dāne cittaṃ na krāmati sa ta vighātakṛta dānavipratibandhahetuṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā pratividhya tadvighātakṛtaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayan pratisaṃkhyāya kāruṇyāddānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:297_11: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / pūrvakarmadoṣeṇa vā paravineyatayā vā mayā bahūni pragāḍhāni kṣut pipāsādikāni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni bhave vinā parānugraham /
SA20bsa034_u:297_12: yadi ca me maraṇāya kālakriyāyai savarteta etaddānakṛta parānugrahahetuka dṛṣṭe dharme duḥkha tathāpi me dānameva śreyo na tu yācanakanirākaraṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:297_13: prāgeva yaḥ kaścidyena kenacicchākapatreṇa jīvati ityevaṃ bodhisattvastadvighātakṛtaṃ dukhamadhivāsya dāna dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:297_14: panarapara bodhisattvasya samyag yācake pratyupasthite sa cedadhimātramanāpatvādagryatvāddeyavastuno dāne citta na krāmati ta bodhisattvo gardhakṛt doṣa laghu-laghveva pratijñayā pratividhya duḥkhe me eṣa sukhasaṃjñāviparyāsaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanaka iti viparyāsaparijñānāttañca prahāya prati saṃkhyāya tadvastu dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:297_15: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa ceddānaṃ dattvā dānaphale [Dutt_91] mahābhogatāyāmanuśaṃsadarśanamutpadyate nānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taṃ bodhisattvo mithyāphaladṛṣṭikṛtaṃ doṣaṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā pratividhya sarvasaṃskārāṇāmasāratāṃ yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:297_17: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ phaladarśanaṃ prahāya yatkiñciddānaṃ dadāti sarvaṃ tanmahābodhi-pariṇāmitameva dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:298_0: tadidaṃ bodhisattvasya caturvidhasya dānavibandhasya caturvidhaṃ dānaprativandhapratipakṣajñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:298_2: tatra trividhena bodhisattvaḥ pratipakṣajñānena pūrvakeṇa niyataṃ samyak ca dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:298_3: ekena paścimena pratipakṣajñānena samyak puṇyaphalaparigrahaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:299_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ adhyātmyaṃ rahogataḥ śuddhenāśayena ghanarasena prasādena saṃkalpairvicitrānudārānaprameyān deyadharmānadhimucya sattveṣu dānāya pratipāditāyābhilaṣati yena bodhisattvaḥ alpakṛcchreṇāprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
SA20bsa034_u:299_3: evaṃ samāsataḥ saṃvidyamāneṣvasaṃvimādeṣu cāmiṣadānasaṃgṛhīteṣu deyadharmeṣu tathā dharmadānamupādāya pratisaṃvidamupādāyādhyāśayadānamupādāya dānavipratibandhapratipakṣajñānamupādāyāśayādhimuktidānañcopādāya bodhisattvasyaivāveṇikaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:300_0: ata ūrdhvamasmādeva sarvadānaprabhedāttadanyaḥ sarvo duṣkarādidānaprabhedo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:301_1: yadbodhisattvaḥ parīttaṃ deyavastu saṃvidyamānamātmānaṃ bādhitvā duḥkhamadhivāsya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:301_3: yadbodhisattvaḥ iṣṭañca vastu prakṛtisnehādvā dīrghakāla saṃstavādvā 'dhimātropakārādvā 'gryañca pravaraṃ deyavastugardhaṃ prativinodya parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:301_4: [Dutt_92] idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīyaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ yadbodhisattvaḥ kṛcchatārjitān deyadharmān parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:302_1: yadbodhisattvaḥ svakaṃ vā paraṃ vā samādāpya deyavastu svabhṛtyeṣu vā mātāpitṛputradāradāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyamitrāmātyajñātisālohiteṣvanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:304_1: yadbodhisattvaḥ śraddhayā dānaṃ dadāti satkṛtya svahastena kālena parānanupahatya idaṃ bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:305_1: aniścitadānatā / viśadadānatā / pramuditadānatā / abhīkṣṇadānatā / pātradānatā / apātradānatā sarvadānatā / sarvatradānatā / sarvakāladānatā / anavadyadānatā sarvavastudānatā /
SA20bsa034_u:305_2: deśavastudānatā / dhanadhānyavastudānatā / itīda trayodaśākāraṃ dānaṃ bodhisattvasya sarvākāramityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:306_1: iha bodhisattvo bhojanena pānena vighātiṣvarthikeṣu bhojanapānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:306_2: yānārthikeṣu yānaṃ vastrārthikeṣu vastramalaṅkārārthikeṣu alaṃkāraṃ vicitrabhāṇḍopaskārārthikeṣu vicitrabhāṇḍopaskāraṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:307_1: āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānamabhayadānañca samāsataḥ ihāmutrasukhaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:307_7: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya navākāraṃ bodhisattvasya dānaṃ sattvānābhihāmutrasukhaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:309_0: tatrāsaktaṃ dānaṃ katamat / iha bodhisattvo yācanake samyak pratyupasthite tvaritamavilambitaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:309_1: na yācanakasya tathā lābhamāramya tvarā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya /
SA20bsa034_u:310_0: aparāmṛṣṭaṃ dānaṃ katamat / na hi bodhisattvo dṛṣṭyā evaṃ dānaṃ parāmṛśati /
SA20bsa034_u:311_0: asaṃbhṛtaṃ dānaṃ katamat / na khalu bodhisattvaḥ saṃbhṛtya dīrghakālikaṃ deyadharmasannicarya kṛtvā paścāt sakṛddānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:311_1: tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu samyak pratyupasthitasya yācanakasya nirākaraṇamutsahate nāpi pratirūpaṃ paśyati yena tannirākaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:311_3: na ca saṃbhṛtadānena bodhisattvaḥ puṇyasyāyadvāramadhikaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:311_4: samaṃ deyavastu tulyeṣu vyastasamasteṣu yācanakeṣu krameṇa vā sakṛdvā dīyamānaṃ kena kāraṇena puṇyaviśeṣatāṃ parigṛhṇīyāditi sampaśyannapi ca bodhisattvaḥ sāvadyameva saṃbhṛtadānaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:311_6: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathāhi saṃbhṛtadātā 'rthito yācanakairyācanakaśatāni pūrvaṃ nirākṛtya teṣāmāghātamakṣamapratyayaṃ janayitvā paścādanarthito 'pi tadekatyānāṃ saṃbhṛtadānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:312_1: anunnatadānaṃ katamat / yācanakāya nīcacitto bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:312_2: na ca paraspardhayā dadāti / na ca dānaṃ dattvā tena dānena manyate ahamasmi dātā dānapatiranye ca na tatheti /
SA20bsa034_u:313_0: aniścitadānaṃ katamat / na hi bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaghoṣaślokaṃ niśritya dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:314_0: alīnaṃ dānaṃ katamat / iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva dānāt sumanā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:314_2: vipulāni ca paramodārāṇi bodhisattvānāṃ dānāni śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavan saṃkocamāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:315_0: adīnaṃ dānaṃ katamat / vicintya vicintya bodhisattvo yatnena deyadharmebhyo yānyagrāṇi pravarāṇi bhojanapānayānavastrādīni tānyanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:316_0: avimukhaṃ dānaṃ katamat / samacitto bodhisattvaḥ apakṣapatito mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu samakāruṇyo dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:317_1: kāruṇyacitto 'nukampācitto bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadanna parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
SA20bsa034_u:317_2: sukhakāmāṃ tṛṣṇādāhena dahyamānāmapratibalāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitāṃ janatāṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA20bsa034_u:318_1: na bodhisattvo dānaṃ dattvā dānasyāyatyāṃ bhogasampadaṃ vā ātmabhāvasampadaṃ vā phalavipākaṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
SA20bsa034_u:320_0: evaṃ hi bodhisattva etannavākāraṃ dānaṃ niśritya dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitvā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:325_2: svabhāva śīlaṃ sarvaśīlaṃ duṣkaraśīlaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ śīlaṃ satpuruṣaśīlaṃ sarvākāraśīlaṃ vighātārthikaśīlaṃ ihāmutrasukhaṃ śīlaṃ viśuddhaśīlañca /
SA20bsa034_u:326_0: tatra svabhāvaśīlaṃ katamat / caturbhirguṇairyuktaṃ samāsato bodhisattvānāṃ svabhāvaśīlaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:326_1: katamaiścaturbhiḥ / parataḥ samyaksamādānataḥ suviśuddhāśayatayā vyatikrāntaiḥ pratyāpattyā 'vyatikramāya cādarajātasyopasthitasmṛtitayā /
SA20bsa034_u:326_2: tatra parataḥ śīlasamādānādbodhisattvasya paramupanidhāya śikṣāvyatikrame vyapatrāpyamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:326_4: śikṣāpadānāṃ vyatikrama-pratyāpattyā ādarajātasya cādita evāvyatikramādbodhisattvo dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ niṣkaukṛtyo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:326_8: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca viśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ itīmau dvau dhamauṃ yā ca vyatikramapratyāpattiryaścādaraḥ avyatikrame 'nayordvayordharmayorāvāhakau /
SA20bsa034_u:326_9: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca suviśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ yaścāvyatikramāyādarajāta ityebhistribhirdharmairavipattirbodhisattvaśīlasya veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:326_11: tatpunaretaccaturbhiguṇairyuktaṃ svabhāvaśīlaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ [Dutt_96] kalyāṇaṃ veditavyamātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai cārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ samādānato 'nuśikṣaṇataśca /
SA20bsa034_u:327_1: samāsato bodhisattvasya gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca śīlaṃ sarvaśīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:330_0: tatra kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ yatkiñcidbodhisattvaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānādūrdhvaṃ mahābodhāya kuśalamācinoti kāyena vācā manasā sarvaṃ tatsamāsataḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:330_1: tatpunaḥ katamat / iha bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śrute yogaṃ karoti cintāyāṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāmekārāmatāyām /
SA20bsa034_u:330_2: tathā gurūṇāmabhivādana-vandana pratyutthānāñjalikarmaṇaḥ kālena kālaṃ kartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_3: tathā kālena kālaṃ teṣāmeva gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasya kartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_4: glānānāṃ satkṛtya kāruṇyena glānopasthānasya kartā bhavati tathā subhāṣite sādhukārasya dātā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_6: tathā sarvasattvānāṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvapuṇyasyāśayena prasannacittamutpādya vācaṃ bhāṣāmāṇo 'numoditā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_7: tathā sarvaṃ vyatikramaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya pareṣāṃ kṣamitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_8: tathā sarvaṃ kāyena vācā manasā kṛtaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_9: kālena ca kālaṃ vicitrāṇāṃ samyak praṇidhānānāṃ triratnapūjāyāśca sarvākārāyā udārāyāḥ kartā [Dutt_97] bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_11: apramādavihārī kāyena vācā / śikṣāpadānāṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyacārikayā cārakṣakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:330_12: indriyaiśca guptadvāro bhojane mātrajñaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktaḥ satpuruṣasevī kalyāṇamitrasanniśritaḥ ātmaskhalitānāñca parijñātā bhavati doṣadarśī /
SA20bsa034_u:330_13: parijñāya ca doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃhartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:330_15: evaṃbhāgīyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇavivardhanāya yacchīlaṃ [tad] bodhisattvasya kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:331_10: ālapanasaṃlapanapratisammodanaiḥ kālenopasaṃkramaṇatayā parato bhojanapānādi [prati]grahato laukikārthānuvyavahārataḥ āhūtasyāgamanagamanataḥ samāsataḥ sarvānarthopasaṃhitāmanāpasamudācāraparivarjanaiścittānuvartanatā /
SA20bsa034_u:331_13: snigdhena hitādhyāśayānugatenāntargatamānasena nigrahakriyā avasādanā vā daṇḍakarmānupradānaṃ va pravāsanā vā yāvadevākuśalāsthānāt vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne sanniyojanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:331_14: ṛddhibalena ca narakādigatipratyakṣaṃ sandarśanatayā 'kuśalādudvejanā buddhaśāsanāvatārāya cāvarjanā toṣaṇā vismāpanā /
SA20bsa034_u:332_0: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīle sthitaḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhake śīle sthitaḥ sattvārthakriyāśīle ca sthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī ca bhavati susaṃgṛhītakuśalaśīlī ca [Dutt_98] sarvākārasattvārthakriyāśīlī ca /
SA20bsa034_u:332_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaravyavasthitaḥ sa ceccakravartirājyamapyutsṛjya pravrajito bhavati sa tasmiṃścakravartirājye evaṃ nirapekṣo bhavati tadyathā tṛṇe vā 'medhye vā /
SA20bsa034_u:332_2: nihīnapuruṣasya jīvikābhiprāyasya pravrajitasya pratyavarān kāmānapahāya na tathā teṣu pratyavareṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasyāśayaviśuddhatāmupādāya pravrajitasya sarvamānuṣyakakāmapravareṣu cakravartikāmeṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:332_3: anāgateṣvapi mārabhavanaparyāpanneṣvapi kāmeṣu bodhisattvo nābhinandī bhavati nāpi ca teṣāmarthāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati mahāvicitrapratibhayagahanapraveśamiva tān kāmān yathābhūtaṃ saṃpaśyan prāgeva tadanyeṣu divyeṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:332_4: vartamāne 'pyadhvani pravrajito bodhisattva udārebhyaḥ sattvebhya udāramapi lābhasatkāraṃ vāntāśanamiva samyak prajñayā paśyan nāsvādayati prāgeva pratyavarebhyaḥ [sattvebhyaḥ] pratyavaram /
SA20bsa034_u:332_5: pravivekābhirataśca bhavati ekākī saṃvamadhye vā sarvakālaṃ cittavyapakṛṣṭavihārī /
SA20bsa034_u:332_7: api tu śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya ye te 'prameyā bodhisattvasamādhayasteṣāmabhinirhārāya vaśitāprāptaye vyāyacchate /
SA20bsa034_u:332_8: saḥ saṃsargato 'pyaṇukām apyasatsaṃkathā masadvācaṃ nādhivāsayati pravivekagataścāṇukamapyasadvitarkam /
SA20bsa034_u:332_9: pramuṣitayā ca smṛtyā tatsamudācārahetoḥ kālena kālaṃ tīvraṃ vipratisāramādīnavadarśanamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_12: yena pratisaṃharati / pratisaṃharaṇābhyāsataśca krameṇa tadyathā pūrvaṃ tatsamudācāra-ratirabhūt tathā etaharyasamudācāra-ratiḥ santiṣṭhate samudācāraprātikūlyañca /
SA20bsa034_u:332_13: sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni cāsya mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrutvā udārāṇyaprameyāṇyacintyāni dīrghakālikāni paramaduśkarāṇi na bhavati cetasa uttāso vā layaḥ saṃkoco vā nānyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_15: vayamapi manuṣyabhūtāḥ krameṇa ca śikṣamāṇāḥ asaṃśayamanuprāpsyāmastāṃ kāyavāksaṃvarasampattimiti /
SA20bsa034_u:332_16: ātmadoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī ca bodhisattvo bhavati śīlasaṃvare vyavasthito na paradoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī /
SA20bsa034_u:332_17: sarvaraudraduḥśīlānāñca [Dutt_99] sattvānāmantike nāghātacitto bhavati na pratighacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:332_18: dharmamahākaruṇatāmupādāyādhimātrameva teṣāmantike bodhisattvānāmanukampācittañca kartukāmatācittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_19: saṃvaraśīlavyasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrasaṃsparśairapi pareṣāmantike cittamapi na pradūṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_20: kutaḥ punaḥ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayiṣyati pratihaniṣyati vā prāgeva punaḥ ākrośaroṣaṇaparibhāṣaṇaistanukaduḥkhasparśajairapakāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:332_21: saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pañcāṅgaparigṛhītenāpramādena samanvāgato bhavati pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca /
SA20bsa034_u:332_22: bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ atītamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpannaḥ sā 'nena yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_29: kaccidahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ yathā yathā caran yathā yathā viharan āpattiṃ nāpadyeyam /
SA20bsa034_u:332_31: sa pūrvakālakaraṇīyamevāpramādaṃ niśritya tathā tathā carati tathā tathā viharati yathā yathāsya carato viharato vā āpattirnottiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:332_33: saṃvaraśīla-vyavasthito bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati vivṛtapāpaḥ alpecchaḥ santuṣṭaḥ duḥkhasahiṣṇuraparitasanajātīyaḥ anuddhataśca acapalaśca praśānteryāpathaḥ kuhanādisarvamithyājīvakarakadharmavivarjitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:332_34: ebhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:332_35: yadutātīteṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatayā anāgateṣvanabhinandanatayā pratyutpa-nneṣvanadhyavasānatayā pravivekavāsābhiratyā vāgvitarkapariśodhanatayā ātmano 'paribhavanatayā sauratyena kṣāntyā 'pramādena ācārājīvaviśuddhyā ceti /
SA20bsa034_u:333_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ kuśala[dharma]saṃgrāhakaśīle vyavasthitaḥ uttpannāṃ kāyabhogāpekṣāṃ svalpāmapi nādhivāsayati prāgeva prabhūtām /
SA20bsa034_u:333_7: kuśalahetuṃ kuśalahetuphale viparyāsamaviparyāsañca kuśalasaṃgrahāya cāntarāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:333_9: kuśalasaṃgrahāya viparyāsañcāviparyāsañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ prāpya kuśalaphalaṃ nānitye nityadarśī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:333_10: na duḥkhe sukhadarśī / nāśucau śacidarśī / nānātmanyātmadarśī / antarāyañca prajānan kuśalasaṃgrahāya parivarjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:333_11: tasyaibhirdaśabhirākāraiḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlavyavasthitasya kṣiprameva kuśalasaṃgraho bhavati sarvākāra[saṃgraha]śca yaduta dānopaniṣadāśīlopaniṣadā kṣāntyupaniṣadā vīryopaniṣadā dhyānopaniṣadā pañcākārayā ca [pra]jñayā /
SA20bsa034_u:334_2: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan kṛtyacintāyāṃ kṛtyasamarthane sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati adhvagamanāgamane samyakkarmāntaprayoge bhogānāmārakṣaṇe vibhinnānyo 'nyapratisandhāne utsave puṇyakriyāyāñca duḥkheṣu vā /
SA20bsa034_u:334_3: punarbodhisattvaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan vyādhitān sattvān paricarati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_6: vyaṅgān śirasā vā yānena vā vahati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_10: yathākāmavitarkam evaṃ vyāpādahiṃsājñātijanapadāpara vitarkāvamanyanāpratisaṃyuktaḥ kulodaya pratisaṃyuktaśca vitarko veditavyaḥ pariparibhavaparājayaduḥkhena duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ paraparibhavaparājayaduḥkhaṃ [Dutt_101] prativinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_12: punarbodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ nyāyaṃ vyapadiśan duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati yuktaiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ sahitairānulomikairānucchavikairaupayikaiḥ pratirūpaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ nipakasyāṅgasaṃbhāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:334_13: upāyakauśalyaṃ vā punarvyapadiśati yathā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya evaṃ matsāriṇāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mātsaryaprahāṇāya dṛṣṭe vā dharme samyagalpakṛcchreṇa bhogānāmarjanāya rakṣaṇāya ca śāsane 'smin pratihatānāṃ śraddhāpratilambhāya darśanapratilambhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:334_14: darśanaviśuddhyā 'pāyasamatikramāya sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānāt sarvaduḥkhasamatikramāya punarbodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtajñatāṃ prāviṣkurvan dṛṣṭvā satkṛtyālapati [saṃlapati] pratisammodayati-ehi svāgatavāditayā /
SA20bsa034_u:334_16: tulyādhikena cāsya pratilābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati na nyūnena /
SA20bsa034_u:334_17: sa kṛtyeṣvasyāyācito 'pi sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati prāgeva yācitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:334_18: yathā kṛtyeṣu evaṃ duḥkheṣu nayopadeśe bhayaparitrāṇe vyasanasthaśokaprativinodane upakaraṇopasaṃhāre sanniśrayadāne cittānuvartane bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃpraharṣaṇe snigdhena cāntarbhāvena vinigrahe ṛddhyā cottāsanāvarjaneneti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_20: kṣudramṛgabhayādapi sattvān rakṣati āvartagrāhabhayādapi rājabhayādapi corabhayādapi pratyarthikabhayādapi svāmyadhipatibhayādapi anājīvikabhayādapyaślokabhayātpariṣacchāradyabhayādapi amanuṣyavetāḍabhayādapi /
SA20bsa034_u:334_21: punarbodhisattvo vyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāṃ śokaprativinodanaṃ jñātivyasanamārabhya mātāpitṛmaraṇe 'pi śokaṃ [prati]vinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_23: bhoga vyasanaṃ vā punarārabhya sa cedbhogā rājñā vā pareṣāmapahṛtā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_25: caurairvā 'pahṛtā bhavanti / agninā vā dagdhā udakena vā apahṛtāḥ kunihitā vā nidhayaḥ pranaṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_29: yena te bhogā anayena vyasanamāpāditā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_30: tannidānamapi śokamutpannaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātraṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ samyak prativinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_31: punarupakaraṇārthinām upakaraṇopasaṃhāraṃ kurvan bodhisattvo bhojanaṃ bhojanārthibhyo dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_32: pānaṃ pānārthibhyaḥ / yānaṃ yānārthibhyaḥ / vastraṃ vastrārthibhyaḥ / alaṅkāramalaṅkārārthibhyaḥ / bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ bhāṇḍopaskarārthibhyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:334_35: ālokamālokārthibhyo dadāti / punaḥ parigrahaśīlena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ gaṇaparikarṣaṇayogena parigrahaṃ kurvan pūrvantāvat niśrayaṃ dadāti nirāmiṣeṇa cittenānukampācittenānukampācittameva [saṃ]puraṣkṛtya /
SA20bsa034_u:334_37: dhārmikaiśca dharmalabdhaiḥ svaiścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayānāsanaglāna pratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavatyapratiguptabhojī /
SA20bsa034_u:334_41: punarbodhisattvaścittānuvartanaśīlena sattvānāṃ cittamanuvartamānaḥ ādita evaṃ sattvānāṃ bhāvaṃ ca jānāti prakṛtiñca /
SA20bsa034_u:334_42: bhāvañca jñātvā prakṛtiñca yathā yaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvastavyaṃ bhavati tathā [taiḥ] saṃvasati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_43: yathā yeṣu sattveṣu pratipattavyaṃ bhavati tathā teṣu pratipadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:334_44: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaścittamanuvartitukāmo bhavati tasya ca cetpaśyatyevaṃrūpeṇāsya vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena duḥkhadaurmasyamutpatsyete /
SA20bsa034_u:334_45: taccaduḥkhadaurmanasyamasya nākuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya saṃvartiṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:334_46: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvastaṃ kāyikavācikaṃ vastasamudācāraṃ yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_47: sa cetpunastad duḥkhadaurmanasyamasyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya [Dutt_103] kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya paśyati nānuvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:334_48: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ paracittaṃ yaduta parānukampāmevopādāya yena ca pareṣāṃ vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikenānyeṣāmutpadyate duḥkhadaurmanasyam tacca pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāmakuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhā[pa]nāya [na] saṃvartate pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃharati bodhisattvastatkāyavāk [karma]samudācāraṃ tadanyeṣāṃ cittānurakṣayā /
SA20bsa034_u:334_49: sa cetpunaḥ paśyati pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ vā tadubhayorvā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati bodhisattvastaṃ kāyavāksamudācāram /
SA20bsa034_u:334_51: yena ca bodhisattva ātmano vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati sa ca kāyavāksamudācāro na śikṣāpadaparigṛhīto bhavati na puṇyajñānasambhārānugataḥ tacca duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pareṣāṃ nākuśalāt sthānāditi pūrvavadveditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:334_54: yathā duḥkhadaurmanasyamevaṃ sukhasaumanasyaṃ yathāyogaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:334_55: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodhaparyavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukhamavigate krodhaparyavasthāne varṇamapi bhāṣate prāgevāvarṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:334_57: punaḥ paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramanālapantamapyālapati [prati]sammodayati prāgevālapantaṃ pratisammodayantam /
SA20bsa034_u:334_58: [na ca] paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kṣubhyati nānyatrāvasādayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:334_60: na ca paricittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramavahasati nāvaspaṇḍayati na maḍkubhāvamasyopasaṃharati nāpyasparśavihārāya kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_63: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmasevī bhavati nāpyatisevī nāpyakālasevī nāpi teṣāṃ purastātpriyavigarhako bhavati nāpyapriyapraśaṃsakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:334_68: [Dutt_104] punarbodhisattvo bhūtaguṇasaṃharṣaṇaśīlena sattvān saṃpraharṣayan śraddhāguṇasampannān śraddhāguṇasaṃkathayā saṃpraharṣayati śīlaguṇasampannān śīlaguṇasaṃkathayā śrutaguṇasaṃpannān śrutaguṇasaṅkathayā tyāgaguṇasampannāṃstyāgaguṇasaṅkathayā prajñāguṇasampannān prajñāguṇasaṃkathayā saṃpraharṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_69: punarbodhisattvaḥ nigrahaśīlena sattvānnigṛhṇan mṛdvaparādhaṃ mṛduvyatikramaṃ snigdhenāntarbhāvenāvipannena mṛdvyā 'vasādanikayā avasādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_72: mṛdumadhyāparādhaṃ mṛdumadhyavyatikramaṃ bodhisattvastāvatkālikayogena punarādānāya pravāsayati teṣāmeva cānyeṣāñca samanuśāsanārthamanukampācittatayā adhimātrāparādhaṃ [adhimātravyatikramaṃ] punarasaṃvāsāyāsaṃbhogāya yāvajjīvenāpyapunaḥpratigrahaṇāya pravāsayati teṣāmeva cānukampayā /
SA20bsa034_u:334_75: punarbodhisattvaḥ ṛddhibalena sattvānuttrāsāyitukāmaḥ āvarjayitukāmo vā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritavipākaphalamapāyānnarakānmahānarakān śītalanarakān pratyekanarakānupanīyopanīya darśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_76: paśyantu bhavanto duścaritasya [kṛtopacitasya] manuṣyabhūtairidamīdṛśaṃ raudraṃ paramakaṭukamaniṣṭaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhūyamānamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_77: te ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā uttrasyanti saṃvegamāpadyante duścaritātprativiramanti /
SA20bsa034_u:334_78: tadekatyāṃśca sattvān bodhisattvasya mahatyāṃ pariṣadi sannisannasya praśnasaṃpādenānādeyaṃ vacanaṃ kartukāmān bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiṃ vā 'nyatamaṃ vā udāravarṇamahākāyaṃ [mahābalaṃ] yakṣamabhinirmimīya bhīṣayatyuttrāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_80: tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tena praśnavyākaraṇena vinayanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:334_81: vicitreṇa vā punaḥ ṛdvyabhisaṃskāreṇa tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavan bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavan tiraḥ kuḍayaṃ tiraḥ
SA20bsa034_u:334_82: śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajjamānena kāyena gacchanvistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayan yamakānyapi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayastejodhātumapi samāpadyamānaḥ śrāvakāsādhāraṇaṃ vā punarṛddhimupadarśayannāvarjayan toṣayitvā saṃpraharṣya aśraddhaṃ [Dutt_105] śraddhāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_83: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi alpaśrutaṃ śrutasaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:334_84: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvākāreṇa sattvārthakriyāśīlena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:335_0: ta ete bhavanti trayo bodhisattvasya śīlaskandhāḥ aprameyāḥ puṇyaskandhāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:336_0: tatra bodhisattvenāsmin trividhe 'pi śīlaskandhe bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmikasya bodhisattvasya kṛtapraṇidhānasya vijñasya pratibalasya vāgvijñaptyarthagrahaṇāvabodhāya ityevaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya pūrvaṃ pādayornipatyādhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā yathā tavāhaṃ kulaputrāntikādbodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamākāṃkṣāmyādātuṃ tadarhasyanuparodhena muhūrtamasmākamanukampayā dātuṃ śrotuñca /
SA20bsa034_u:336_1: ityevaṃ samyagadhyeṣyaikāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ daśamu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca mahājñānaprabhāvaprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā guṇāṃśca teṣāṃmāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ prasādaṃ cetasaḥ sañjanayya parīttaṃ vā yasya [vā] yācati śaktirhetubalañca /
SA20bsa034_u:336_2: sa vijño bodhisattvo nīcairjānu-maṇḍalanipatitena vā utkuṭu[ka]sthitena vā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā saṃpūraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:336_3: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_4: ityuktvā ekāgrāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya cittapraśādamevānupabṛṃhayatā na cirasyedānīṃ me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti etamevārthamanucintayatā tūṣṇīṃ bhavitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_5: tena punarvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ avikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā āsane idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:336_6: śruṇu evaṃnāman kulaputra dharmabhrātariti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
