SA20bsa034_u:336_9: pratīcchasi tvamevaṃnāman [Dutt_106] kulaputra mamāntikāt sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
SA20bsa034_u:336_12: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:336_17: evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tena ca vijñena bodhisattvena vaktavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_18: tena ca mamādāyakena bodhisattvena yāvat trirapi pratijñātavyaṃ pṛṣṭena /
SA20bsa034_u:336_19: evaṃ hi tena vijñena bodhisattvena tasya pratigrāhakasya bodhisattvasya yāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāna dattvā pratijñāñca pratigṛhyāvyutthita eva tasmin pratigrāhake bodhisattve tasyā eva tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornipatya sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_20: pratigṛhītamanena evanāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikādyāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_21: so 'hamevanāmātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtamasyaitannāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvasattvāviparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmyasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādanam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_23: evañca punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmaparisamāptyanantaraṃ dharmatā khalveṣā yadvā daśasu dikṣvanantāparnyateṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca bodhisattvānāñca tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ tadrūpaṃ nimittaṃ pradurbhāvati /
SA20bsa034_u:336_24: yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati / bodhisattvena bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ samāptamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:336_28: yathā evaṃnānmā bodhisattvena amuṣmin lokadhātāvevaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt samyagbodhisattvaśīla saṃbarasamādānaṃ gṛhītamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:336_29: te cāsya sarve putrasyaiva bhrāturivakalyāṇairmanobhiḥ pratyanukampante /
SA20bsa034_u:336_30: evaṃ kalyāṇamanaḥpratyanukampitasya [tasya] bodhisattvasya [Dutt_107] bhūyasyā mātrayā vṛddhiḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:336_32: parisamāptau ca tasmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmaṇyubhābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ bodhisattvābhyāṃ daśasu dikṣu teṣāmanantāparyantalokadhātugatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā pādayornipatyotthātavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_33: idaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvaśīla-saṃvarasamādānaprativiśiṣṭaṃ bhavati niruttaramaprameyapuṇyaskandhasamanvāgataṃ paramakalyāṇacittāśayasamutthāpitaṃ sarvasattveṣu sarvākāraduścaritapratipakṣabhūtam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_34: yasya śīlasaṃvarasamādānasya sarvaprātimokṣasaṃvarasamādānāni śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayanti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupamāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopayanti yaduta puṇyaparigrahamupādāya /
SA20bsa034_u:336_35: tena punarbodhisattvenaivaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānavyavasthitena svayaṃ cābhyuhyābhyuhyedaṃ bodhisattvasya pratirūpaṃ kartum idamapratirūpaṃ kartumiti tathaiva tata ūrdhvaṃ karmaṇā saṃpādayitavyaṃ śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:336_36: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakādvā yatnataḥ śrutvā 'smābodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkānibandhāt śrutvā tathaiva śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:336_39: yastatprathamata etadevaṃvidhaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ nādhimucyeta nāvatarennāvakalpayennalubdhasya na lobhābhibhūtasya mahecchasyāsantuṣṭasya na śīlavipannasya śikṣāsvanādarakāriṇaḥ śaithilikasya na krodhanasyopanāhinaḥ akṣāntibahulasya parato vyatikramāsahiṣṇoḥ nālasasya kusīdasya yadbhūyasā rātrindivaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ śayanasukhañca svīkurvataḥ saṅgaṇikayā cātināmayataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:336_41: na mandasya na momuhajātīyasyātyarthaṃ saṃlīnacittasya bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāmapavadamānasya /
SA20bsa034_u:336_42: na ca punaretat saṃvarasamādānavidhānaṃ bodhisattvenodgṛhya paryavāpyāpi bodhisattvapiṭaka pratihatānāmaśrāddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ sahasaivārocayitavya pravedayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:336_43: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathāhi śrutvā '[na]dhimucyamānā mahatājñānāvaraṇenāvṛtā [Dutt_108] apavaderan /
SA20bsa034_u:336_44: yaścainamapavadate sa yāvadapramāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgataḥ saṃvarasthāyī bodhisattvo bhavati tāvadapramāṇenaiva so 'puṇyaskandhenānuṣakto bhavati yāvattāṃ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pāpakān sakalpān sarveṇa sarva notsṛjati /
SA20bsa034_u:337_0: śīlasaṃvarasamādānañca kartukāmasya bodhisattvasya purato 'syāṃ bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ yāni bodhisattvasya śikṣāpadānyāpattisthānāni cākhyātāni tānyanuśrāvayitavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:337_2: na parasamādāpanikayā nāpi paraspardhayā [sa]dhīro bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:337_3: tena ca pratigṛhītavyaṃ tasya ca dātavyametena vidhinā etacchīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:338_0: evañca śīlasaṃvaravyavasthitasya bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ pārājayikasthānīyadharmā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:338_1: katame catvāraḥ / lābhasatkārādhyavasitasyātmotkarṣaṇā parapaṃsanā bodhisattvasya pārājāyikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:338_2: satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu lobhaprakṛtitvāt duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvanātheṣvapratiśaraṇeṣvasamyagayācakeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu nairvṛṇyādāmiṣāvisargaḥ dharmamātsaryāccārthināṃ samyakpratyupasthitānāṃ dharmāṇāmasaṃvibhāgakriyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:338_3: yadapi bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ krodhaparyavasthānamanuvṛṃhayati yena tato na vākpāruṣyaniścāraṇamātrakeṇa nivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:338_4: krodhābhibhūtaḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa sattvāṃstāḍayati vihiṃsayati viheṭhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:338_5: krodhāśayameva ca tīvramantarākṛtvā pareṣāmantikādvyatikramasajñapti na pratigṛhaṇāti na kṣamate nāśayaṃ vimuñcati /
SA20bsa034_u:338_8: svayaṃ vā saddharmapratirūpakādhimuktasya pareṣāṃ cā 'nuvṛttyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:338_10: yeṣāṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatamānyatamaṃ dharmamadhyāpadya prāgeva sarvānabhavyo bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme vipulasya bodhisattvasaṃbhārasyopacayāya parigrahāya /
SA20bsa034_u:338_11: abhavyo bhavati ca dṛṣṭe [Dutt_109] dharme āśayaviśuddheḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:339_2: yataśca bodhisattvaḥ eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhīkṣṇa-samudācārāt parīttamapi hrībyapatrāpyaṃ notpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:339_3: tena ca prīyate / tena ca ramate / tatraiva guṇadarśī bhavati / iyamadhimātratā paryavasthānasya veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:339_4: na tu bodhisattvaḥ sakṛdeva pārājayikasthānīyadharmasamudācārāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:339_6: parityaktasamādāno 'pi ca bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme bhavyaḥ punarādānāya bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya bhavati nābhavya eva tadyathā pārājayikādhyāpannaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastho bhikṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:339_7: samāsataśca dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya tyāgo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:339_9: na ca parivṛttajanmāpi bodhisattvaḥ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:339_10: adha urdhvaṃ tiryaksarvatropapadyamāno yena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ na tyaktaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:339_11: nāpi ca pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmadhimātraṃ paryavasthānaṃ samudācaritaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:339_12: muṣitasmṛtistu parivṛttajanmā bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrasamparkamāgamya smṛtyudbodhanārthaṃ punaḥ punarādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:340_2: evaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthito bodhisattvaḥ pratidivasaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatamuddiśya caitye dharmasya vā dharmamuddiśya pustakagate 'pi bodhisattvasūtrapiṭake [Dutt_110] [bodhisattvasūtrapiṭaka]mātṛkāyāṃ vā saṃghasya vā yo 'sau daśasu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaḥ kiñcidevālpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūjādhikārikamakṛtvā 'ntata ekapraṇāmamapi kāyena antato guṇānārabhya buddhadharmasaṃghānāmekacatuṣpadāyā api gāthāyāḥ pravyāhāraṃ vācā antata ekaprasādamapi buddhadharmasaṃghaguṇānusmaraṇapūrvakañcetasā rātriṃdivamatināmayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:340_6: tathāhi śuddhāśayo bodhisattvaḥ tadyathā avetyaprasādalābhī bhikṣarnityakālameva dharmatayā śāstāraṃ paricarati paramayā ca pūjayā pūjayati dharmasaṃghañca /
SA20bsa034_u:341_0: bodhisattvo mahecchatāmasantuṣṭiṃ lābhasatkāragardhamutpannamadhivāsayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:341_1: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vīryamārabhata statpratipakṣaparigraheṇa tatpratibandhāvasthitasya prakṛtyā tīvrakleśatayābhibhūya punaḥ punaḥ samudācārāṇāt /
SA20bsa034_u:342_0: bodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇavantaṃ satkārārhaṃ sahadhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhinigrahītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā utthāyāsanaṃ nānuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:342_1: paraiścālapyamānaḥ pratisammodyamānaḥ paripṛṣṭaśca na yuktarūpeṇa vāk pratyudāhāreṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate mānābhinigṛhīta eva āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:342_2: no cenmānābhinigṛhīto nāghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā api tvālasyakausīdyādavyākṛtacitto vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣād [vā] sāpattika eva bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:342_4: anāpattiḥ [suptaḥ] syādayañca prativibuddhasaṃjñī upaśliṣyed ālapet saṃlapet pratisammodayet paripṛcchet /
SA20bsa034_u:342_5: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ prayuktasya sāṃkathyaviniścaye vā /
SA20bsa034_u:342_7: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāmavahitaśrotrasya śṛṇvataḥ sāṃkathyaṃviniścayaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:342_9: [Dutt_111] anāpattistenopāyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damayato vinayataḥ akuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthānepratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:343_0: bodhisattvaḥ parairupanimantryamāṇo gṛhe vā vihārāntare vā gṛhāntare vā bhojanapānavastrādibhiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā na gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:343_1: na nimantraṇāṃ svīkaroti / sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:343_5: anāpattistenopāyenāsya damayitukāmaḥ syāt vinetukāmo 'kuśalātsthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:344_0: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikājajātarūpajatamaṇimuktāvaidūryādikāni ca dhanajātāni vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni pravarāṇi labhamāno 'nudadhyamānaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto na pratigṛhṇāti pratikṣipati /
SA20bsa034_u:344_3: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:344_4: anāpattiḥ kṣiptacittasya / anāpattistasmin pratigrahe ratiṃ cetasaḥ paśyataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:344_9: anāpattiḥ parāhṛtamanena saṃbhāvayataḥ yato nidānamasyotpadyeta vadho vā bandho vā daṇḍo vā jyā-nirgarhaṇā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:345_1: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dharmārthināmāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ īrṣyāviprakṛto vā dharmaṃ nānuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:345_3: ālasyakausīdyānna dadāti sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro na kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:345_6: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:345_9: anāpattirmṛdvindriyasyodārayā dharmadeśanayā dharmaparyāptyā uttrāsaṃ mithyādarśanaṃ mithyābhiniveśaṃ kṣatiñcopahatiñca saṃbhāvayet /
SA20bsa034_u:345_10: anāpattistaddhastagatasya parebhyaḥ abhājanabhūtebhyo visāraṃ dharmasya saṃbhāvayet /
SA20bsa034_u:346_0: bodhisattvo raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu ca sattveṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ upekṣate viceṣṭate vā raudratāṃ duḥśīlatāmeva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:346_3: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:346_4: tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi bodhisattvasya śīlavataḥ śānteḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapracāre tathānukampācittañca kartukāmatā ca pratyupasthitā bhavati yathā raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu sattveṣu duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:346_5: anāpattiḥ kṣiptacittasya / anāpattistenopāyenāsya damayitukāmaḥ syādvistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:347_0: bodhisattvo yadbhagavatā prātimokṣe vinaye pratikṣepaṇa-sāvadyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ paracittānurakṣāmupādāyāprasannānāṃ sattvānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
SA20bsa034_u:347_1: tatra tulyāṃ śrāvakaiḥ śikṣāṃ karoti nirnirākaraṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:347_3: te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante /
SA20bsa034_u:348_1: yatpunaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyamalpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavatā vyavasthāpitāṃ tatra bodhisattvo na tulyāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakaiḥ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:348_2: tatkasya hetoḥ / śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca /
SA20bsa034_u:348_3: na tu bodhisattvaḥ parārthaparamaḥ śobhate parārthamārabhyālpārtho 'lpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca tathāhi bodhisattvena pareṣāmarthe cīvaraśatāni sahastrāṇyajñātikānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikātparyeṣitavyāni pravāritena /
SA20bsa034_u:348_4: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:348_10: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthaḥ sattvārthamārabhya āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ alpārtho bhavati alpakṛtyaḥ alpotsukavihārī /
SA20bsa034_u:349_0: asti kiñcitprakṛtisāvadyamapi [yad] bodhisattvastadrūpeṇopāyakauśalyena samudācarati yenānāpattikaśca bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
SA20bsa034_u:349_1: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaścauraṃ taskaraṃ prabhūtānāṃ prāṇiśatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ vadhāyodyatamāmiṣakiñcitkahetoḥ prabhūtānantaryakarmakriyāprayuktaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:349_3: yadyapyahamenaṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopya narakeṣūpapadyeyaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu me narakopapattiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:349_4: eṣa ca sattva ānantaryakarma kṛtvā mā bhūnnarakaparāyaṇa iti /
SA20bsa034_u:349_5: evamāśayo bodhisattvastaṃ prāṇinaṃ kuśalacitto 'vyākṛtacitto vā viditvā ṛtīyamānaḥ [Dutt_114] anukampācittamevāyatyāmupādāya jīvitādvyaparopayati /
SA20bsa034_u:349_6: anāpattiko bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
SA20bsa034_u:350_0: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā rājāno vā bhavanti rājamahāmātrā vā adhimātraraudrāḥ sattveṣu nirdayā ekāntaparapīḍāpravṛttāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:350_1: tāṃ satyāṃ śaktau tasmādrājyaiśvaryādhipatyāccyāvayati yatra sthitāste tannidānaṃ bahvapuṇyaṃ prasavanti anukampācitto hitasukhāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:351_0: ye ca paradravyāpahāriṇaścaurāstaskarāḥ sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ hṛtvā svīkṛtyopabhoktukāmāsteṣāmantikāttad dravyaṃ bodhisattva ācchinatti /
SA20bsa034_u:351_1: mā haiva teṣāṃ sa dravyaparibhogo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya bhaviṣyati iti /
SA20bsa034_u:351_2: evameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ācchidya sādhikaṃ saṃdhe niryātayati staipikaṃ stūpe /
SA20bsa034_u:351_3: ye ca vaiyāvṛtyakarā vā ārāmikā vā sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ vipratipādayantyanayena /
SA20bsa034_u:351_5: tān bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya mā haiva tatkarma /
SA20bsa034_u:351_7: tasmādādhipatyāccyāvayati / tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvaḥ adattamādadāno 'pyanāpattiko bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:352_0: yathāpi tadgṛhī bodhisattvaḥ abrahmacaryeṣaṇārtaṃ tatpratibaddhacittamaparaparigṛhītaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ maithunena dharmeṇa niṣevate /
SA20bsa034_u:352_2: yathepsitakuśalamūlasanniyoge ca vaśyā bhaviṣyatyakuśala[mūla]parityāge cetyanukampācittamevopasthāpya abrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ [dharmaṃ] pratiṣevamāno 'pyanāpattiko bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:352_3: bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate / pravrajitasya punarbodhisattvasya śrāvakaśāsanabhedamanurakṣamāṇasya sarvathā na kalpate 'brahmacaryaniṣevaṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:353_0: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvita-vipramokṣārthaṃ bandhanavipramokṣārthaṃ hastapādanāsākarṇaccheda-cakṣurvikalībhāva-paritrāṇārthaṃ yāṃ bodhisattva [Dutt_115] svajīvitahetorapi samprajānan mṛṣāvācaṃ na bhāṣeta /
SA20bsa034_u:353_2: iti samāsato yena yena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmarthameva paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:353_3: nānarthaṃ paśyati / svayaṃ ca nirāmiṣacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:353_4: kevala-sattvahitakāmatānidānaṃ ca vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ samprajānan anyathā-vācaṃ bhāṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:354_0: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā akalyāṇamitra parigṛhītā bhavanti teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ akalyāṇamitrebhyo yathāśakti yathābalaṃ byagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:354_2: anukampācittamevopādāya mā bhūdeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpamitrasaṃsargo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāyeti /
SA20bsa034_u:354_3: anena paryāyeṇa mitrabhedamapi kurvan bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:355_0: yathāpi tad bodhisattvaḥ utpathacāriṇo 'nyāyacāriṇaḥ sattvān paruṣayā vācā tīkṣṇayāvasādayati yāvadeva tenopāyenākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:356_0: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo nṛttagītavāditādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ rājacaurānnapāna-veśyā-vīthī-kathādyadhimuktānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ nṛttagītavāditena vicitrābhiśca sambhinnapralāpa-pratisaṃyuktābhiḥ saṃkathābhiranukampāśayena toṣayitvāvarjya vaśyatāṃ vidheyatāṃ copanīyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kṛśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:357_0: bodhisattvaḥ utpannāṃ kuhanāṃ lapanāṃ naimittikatāṃ naiṣpeṣikatāṃ lābhena lābhaṃ niścikīrṣutāṃ mithyājīvakarāṃ dharmānadhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:357_1: na tai ritīyate / na vinodayati / sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:357_2: anāpattistatprativinodanāya cchandajātasya yatnamārabhamāṇasya kleśapracuratayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
SA20bsa034_u:358_0: bodhisattvaḥ auddhatyābhinigṛhītena cetasā 'vyupaśāntaḥ avyayupaśamārāmaḥ uccaiḥ saṃñcagdhati saṃkrīḍate saṃkilikilāyate auddhatyaṃ dravaṃ prāviṣkaroti [Dutt_116] pareṣāṃ hāsayitukāmo ramayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:358_1: evameva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate smṛtisaṃpramoṣādakliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:358_5: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ tatprakṛtikānāṃtadārāmāṇāṃ saṃgrahāya vā praṇayānusaṃrakṣaṇāya vā tadanuvartanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:359_0: [yaḥ] punarbodhisattva evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena nirvāṇārāmeṇa vihartavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:359_2: na ca kleśopakleśebhyo bhetavyam na caikāntena tebhyaścittaṃ vivecayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:359_3: tathā hi bodhisattvena trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni saṃsāre saṃsaratā bodhiḥ samudānetavyeti /
SA20bsa034_u:359_5: tatkasya hetoḥ / yathā khalu śrāvakeṇa nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cittamudvejayitavyaṃ tataḥ śatasahasrakoṭiguṇena bodhisattvena nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cetasa udvego bhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:359_6: tathā hi śrāvako 'syātmano 'rthāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya prayuktaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:359_7: tena tathā cittāsaṃkleśābhyāsaḥ samudānetavyo yathāyamanarhannapi tatprativiśiṣṭenāsaṃkleśena samanvāgataḥ sāstrave vastuni anuvicaret /
SA20bsa034_u:360_0: bodhisattvo 'nādeyavacanakaramapaśabdamātmanaḥ ayaśo 'kīrti na rakṣati na pariharati bhūtavastukām /
SA20bsa034_u:361_0: bodhisattvo yena kaṭukaprayogeṇa tīkṣṇaprayogeṇa sattvānāmarthaṃ paśyati taṃ prayogaṃ daurmanasyārakṣayā na samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:361_2: anāpattiryat parīttamarthaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ paśyet prabhūtaśca tannidānaṃ daurmanasyam /
SA20bsa034_u:362_1: roṣitaḥ pratiroṣayati / tāḍitaḥ pratitāḍayati / bhaṇḍitaḥ pratibhaṇḍayati / sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraṃ kliṣṭāmāpattibhāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:363_0: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vyatikramaṃ kṛtvā vyatikrameṇa vā sambhāvitaḥ āghātacitto mānābhinigṛhītaḥ saṃjñaptimanurūpāṃ nānuprayacchatyupekṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:363_4: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:363_6: anāpattiḥ sa cet prakṛtyā kalahakārakaḥ syādādhikaraṇikaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:363_8: anāpattiḥ paraṃ kṣamaṇaśīlamanā-ghātaśīlaṃ ca saṃbhāvayet parato vyatikramamārabhya saṃjñaptilābhenātyarthaṃ ritīyamānam /
SA20bsa034_u:364_0: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kasmiṃścidadhikaraṇe nisṛtānāṃ dharmeṇa samena saṃjñaptimanuprayacchatāmāghātacittaḥ paraviheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ saṃjñaptiṃ na pratigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:364_2: no cedāghātacitaḥ api tvakṣamaṇaśīlatayā na pratigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:364_3: kliṣṭāmāpatti māpadyate / anāpattistenopāyena paraṃ damayitukāmaḥ syāt pūrvavat sarvaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:366_1: bodhisattva upasthānaparicaryāparigardhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sāmiṣeṇa cittena gaṇaṃ parikarṣati /
SA20bsa034_u:367_0: bodhisattva utpannamālasyakausīdyaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhañcākāle amātrayā svīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:368_3: akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate / anāpattiḥ para udāharet / sa ca parānuvṛttyā muhūrtamupasthitasmṛtiḥ śṛṇuyāt /
SA20bsa034_u:368_4: anāpattiḥ kautukajātasya paripraśnamātre pṛṣṭasya ca pratyudāhāramātre /
SA20bsa034_u:369_0: bodhisattvaścittasthitimārabhyaṃ citaṃ samādhātukāma āghātacitto mānabhinigṛhīto nopasaṃkramyāvavādaṃ yācate /
SA20bsa034_u:370_2: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vyāyacchata stīvrakleśatayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
SA20bsa034_u:370_3: yathā kāmacchanda evaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:372_1: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:372_5: tathā hi bodhisattvena tīrthikaśāstreṣvapi tāvadyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ prāgeva buddhavacane /
SA20bsa034_u:373_0: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake sati bodhisattvapiṭake akṛtayogyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamadhyupekṣya śrāvakapiṭake yogyāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:373_2: bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:373_4: anāpattiradhimātramedhasaḥ āśūdgrahaṇa-samarthasya cireṇāpyavismaraṇa-samarthasya arthacintanāprativedhasamarthasya buddhavacane yuktyupaparīkṣāsahagatayā 'vicalayā buddhyā samanvāgatasya taddviguṇena pratyahaṃ buddhavacane yogyāṃ kurvataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:374_0: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:375_0: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno 'pavadate /
SA20bsa034_u:375_1: naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
SA20bsa034_u:376_0: bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:376_3: iti [evaṃ] sa bodhisattva ātmānañcājñaṃ vyavasthāpayati [Dutt_120] tathāgatameva ca teṣu buddhadharmeṣvaparokṣatāyāṃ samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:377_0: bodhisattvaḥ sāmiṣacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ pareṣāmantike ātmānamutkarṣayati parān paṃsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:377_3: anāpattistenopāyena tameva pudgalaṃ damayitukāmasya vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:378_0: bodhisattvo dharmaśravaṇa-dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayaṃ vā mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nopasaṃkrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:378_5: anāpattirdhārmakathikacitattānurakṣiṇaḥ anāpattiḥ punaḥ punaḥ [anu]śrutāmavadhṛtāṃ vijñātārthāṃ kathāṃ saṃjānataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:378_8: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamudgṛhṇataḥ dhandhaṃ dhārayataḥ dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:379_0: bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalaṃ saṃcintyāvamānayatyasatkarotyavahasatyavaspaṇṅyati vyañjanapratisaraṇaśca bhavati nārthapratisaraṇaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:380_0: saṃvarastho bodhisattvaḥ sattvakutyeṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ na gacchati yacca tatkutyasamarthe vā adhvagamanāgamane vā samyakkarmānta prayoge vā bhogarakṣaṇe vā bhinnapratisandhāne vā utsave vā puṇyakriyāyāṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:380_4: anāpattiḥ svayaṃ kartumasamarthaḥ syāt sapratisaraṇaśca yācakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:380_9: anāpattiḥ kuśalapakṣe nairantaryeṇa samyak prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:381_0: bodhisattvo glānaṃ vyādhitaṃ sattvamāsādya nopasthānaparicaryāṃ karoti āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:381_2: ālasyakausīdyānna karoti / akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate / anāpattiḥ svayameva glānaḥ syādapratibalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:381_7: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamuddiśato dhandhaṃ dhārayato dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:381_9: yathā glānasyopasthānam / evaṃ duḥkhitasya duḥkhāpanayāya sāhāyyaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:382_0: bodhisattvo dṛṣṭadhārmike sāṃparāyike cārthe anayaprayuktān [sattvān] dṛṣṭvā āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nyāyaṃ nayaṃ na vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:382_5: anāpattiḥ sa eva svayaṃ pratibalaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:382_8: anāpattiryasya nyāyopadeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sa āghātacittaḥsyāddurvaco viparītagrāhī vigatapremagauravaḥ khaṭuṅkajātīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:383_1: bodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāmakṛtajño bhavatyakṛtavedī āghātacitto na pratyupakāreṇānurūpeṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:384_0: bodhisattvo jñātibhogavyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāmāghātacittaḥ utpannaṃśokaṃ na vinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:385_0: bodhisattvo bhojanapānādinyupakaraṇajātāni bhojanapānādikārthibhyaḥ samyagyācito na prayacchatyāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:386_0: bodhisattvaḥ pariṣadamupasthāpya na kālena kālaṃ sabhyagavavadati samyaksamanuśāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:386_1: na ca teṣāmarthavighātināṃ śrāddhānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikāddharmeṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsana[glāna]pratyayamaiṣajyapariṣkārān paryeṣate āghātacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:386_3: [ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvavadati na samanuśāsti na paryeṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:387_7: anāpattistasyābhipretaṃ pathyañca syāt pareṣāṃ prabhūtatarakāṇāmanabhipretamapathyañca syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:388_0: bodhisattvaḥ āghātacittaḥ pareṣāṃ bhūtān guṇān nodbhāvayati bhūtaṃ varṇaṃ na bhāṣate subhāṣite sādhukāraṃ na dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:388_2: kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate / ālasyāt kausīdyāt pramādādvā na bhāṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:388_7: anāpattistato nidānaṃ saṃkleśaṃ madamunnatimanarthāya saṃbhāvayataḥ tasya ca parihārārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:389_1: avasādayati vā na ca daṇḍakarmaṇā samanuśāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:389_4: kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate / ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvasādāyati yāvanna pravāsayati akliṣṭāmāttimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:389_8: anāpattiste sattvā aśaṭhā bhaveyustrīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyena samanvāgatā laghu laghveva pratyāpadyeran /
SA20bsa034_u:390_0: bodhisattvo vicitrarddhivikurvitaprabhāvasamanvāgataḥ uttrāsanārhāṇāṃ sattvānāmuttrāsanāya āvarjanārhāṇāñca sattvānāmāvarjanāya śraddhādeyaparihārāya [ṛddhyā] [Dutt_124] nottrāsayati nāvarjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:390_2: anāpattiryatra sattvā yadbhūyasā pratiniviṣṭā bhaveyustīrthikā āryāpavādikayā mithyādṛṣṭ samanvāgatāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:391_0: itīmānyutpannavastukāni bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣāpadāni teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu vyagrāṇi bhagavatā ākhyātāni saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśalasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañcārabhya /
SA20bsa034_u:391_1: tānyasyāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ samagrāṇyākhyātāni yeṣu bodhisattvenāradajātena paramagauravamupasthāpya śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:391_2: parataḥ saṃvarasamādanaṃ kṛtvā suviśuddhena śikṣitukāmāśayena bodhyāśayena sattvārthāśayena ādita eva cāvyatikramāyādarajātena bhavitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:391_5: yasya kasyacicchrāvakayānīyasya vā mahāyānīyasya vā 'ntike deśayitavyā yastāṃ vāgvijñaptiṃ pratibalaḥ syādavaboddhaṃ pratigrahītum /
SA20bsa034_u:391_6: sa cedbodhisattvaḥ pārājayikasthānīyaṃ dharmamadhyāpanno bhavatyadhimātreṇa paryavasthānena tena tyaktaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:391_7: dvirapi punarādātavyaḥ / sa cenmadhyena paryavasthānenāpanno bhavati tena trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāmantike tato vā uttari duṣkṛtā deśayitavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:391_8: pūrva vastu parikīrtayitvā parato niṣadyedaṃ syādvacanīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:391_9: samanvāharatvāyupmannahamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva-vinayātisāriṇīṃ yathā parikīrtite vastuni dṛṣkṛtāmāpattimāpannaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:391_11: pārājayikasthānīyasya ca dharmasya mṛdunā paryavasthānena tadanyāsāñcāpattīnāmekasyaiva purato deśanā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:391_12: asati cānukūle pudgale yasya purato deśyetāśayato bodhisattvena punaranadhyācārāya cittamutpādayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:392_1: yadi tairguṇairyuṃktaḥ puṅgalo na sannihitaḥsyāttato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayameva bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:392_2: evañca punaḥ karaṇīyam / ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā [Dutt_125] dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya purato vā utkuṭukasthitena idaṃ syādvacanīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:392_3: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvāstathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:392_4: teṣāñca purataḥ sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvaṃ bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmaṃsaṃgrāhakaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca yatrātītāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ anāgatāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣiṣyante pratyutpannā daśasu dikṣu sarvabodhisattvā etarhi śikṣante /
SA20bsa034_u:392_6: uktvā utthātavyam / śiṣṭaṃ tu sarvaṃ pūrvavadveditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:393_1: yadapi coktaṃ bhagavatā yadbhūyasā bodhisattvasya dveṣasamutthitā āpattirjñātavyā na rāgasamutthiteti tatrāyamabhiprāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:393_2: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānunayaṃ sattvapremādhipatiṃ kṛtvā yatkiñcicceṣṭate sarvaṃ tadbodhisattvakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:393_3: nākṛtyaṃ na ca kṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ āpattiryujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:393_4: sattveṣu tu dviṣṭo bodhisattvo nātmano na pareṣāṃ hitamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:394_0: mṛdumadhyādhimātratā ca bodhisattvasyāpattīnāṃ veditavyā / tadyathā vastusaṃgrahaṇyām /
SA20bsa034_u:395_0: evañca punaḥ svavinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvastisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati prayogasampattyā āśayasampattyā pūrvahetusampattyā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:396_0: tatra prayogasampat katamā / yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ śīleṣvakhaṇḍacārī bhavati pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācāro nābhīkṣṇāpattiko vivṛtapāpaśca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:397_0: āśayasampat katamā / dharmābhiprāyaḥ pravrajito bhavati na jīvikābhiprāyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:397_3: sa evamarthī na kusīdo viharati [na] hīnavīryo [nāvīryo] na vyavakīrṇa pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarairduḥkhavipākairāyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:398_1: pūrvahetusaṃpat katamā / yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu kṛtapuṇyo bhavati kṛtakuśalamūlo yenaitarhi svayañca na vihanyate covarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:399_0: ābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgato vinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:399_1: etadviparyayāttisṛbhirvipattibhiḥ samanvāgato duḥkhaṃ saṃsparśaṃ viharatīti veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:400_0: idaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya samāsavyāsataḥ sarvaśīlamityucyate gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca /
SA20bsa034_u:400_1: asyaiva ca sarvaśīlasya pravibhāgastadanyānyapi duṣkaraśīlādīni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:401_0: tatra katamadbodhisattvasya duṣkaraśīlam / tat trividhaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:402_0: mahābhogasya bodhisattvasya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye vartamānasya prahāya bhogān prahāya mahadaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bodhisattvasya duṣkaraśīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:403_0: kṛcchrāpanno 'pi ca bodhisattvaḥ samāttaśīlaḥ āprāṇairvipadyamānastacchīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ na chidrīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:403_1: kutaḥ punarvipādayiṣyati / idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīya duṣkaraśīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:404_1: yathā yāvajjīvena [api] pratanukāmapyāpatiṃ nāpadyate na śīle ca skhalati kutaḥ punargurvīm /
SA20bsa034_u:406_0: tatra samāttaṃ śīlaṃ yena trividhamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati saṃvaraśīlasya kuśalasaṃgrāhaka[śīlasya] sattvārthakriyāśīlasya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:407_0: tatra prakṛtiśīlaṃ yadgotrasthasyaiva bodhisattvasya prakṛtibhadratayaiva santānasya pariśuddhaṃ kāyavākkarma pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:408_1: tatrābhyastaṃ śīlaṃ yena bodhisattvena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu trividhamapi yathānirdiṣṭaṃ śīlamabhyastaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:408_2: sa tena pūrvahetubalādhānena [na] sarveṇa sarvaṃ pāpasamacāreṇa ramate /
SA20bsa034_u:409_0: tatredamupāyayuktaṃ śīlaṃ yaccatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kuśalaṃ kāyavakkarma pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:410_1: tatpañcavidhaṃ veditavyam / iha bodhisattvaḥ svayañca śīlavān bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:410_2: parāṃśca śīle samādāpayati / śīlasya / ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate / sahadhārmikañca dṛṣṭvā sumanā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:411_1: tat ṣaḍvidhaṃ saptavidhaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:411_6: śīlālaṅkārasaṃyuktaṃ ca / śīlālaṅkāro veditavyastadyathā śrāvakabhūmau prāṇātipātādiviratyā /
SA20bsa034_u:411_10: adhicittavaipākyam / iṣṭa gativaipākyam / sattvārthakriyā vaipākyaṃ ceti /
SA20bsa034_u:412_3: adattamādadyāt kāmeṣu mithyācaret mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣeta paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ sabhinnapralāpaṃ kuryāt pāṇiloṣṭatāḍana saṃsparśaiścāniṣṭairvihiṃsāsaṃsparśaiḥ samudācarediti /
SA20bsa034_u:412_4: tasya me evamarthinaḥ sa cet pare viparyayeṇa samudācareyuḥ tena me syādvidhātastanme syādamanāpam /
SA20bsa034_u:412_5: paro 'pyarthino yathā 'smākaṃ pare na jīvitadvyaparopayeyurvistareṇa yāvanna vihiṃsāsasparśai samudācareyuriti /
SA20bsa034_u:412_6: [Dutt_128] teṣāmapyevamarthināṃ sa cedahaṃ viparyayeṇa samudācareyaṃ tena te syurvighātinastatteṣāṃ syādamanāpam /
SA20bsa034_u:412_7: iti yanmama pareṣāñcāmanāpaṃ so 'haṃ kiṃ tena parān samudācariṣyāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:412_8: iti pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvo jīvitahetorapi parānaṣṭavidhenāmanāpena na samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:413_1: tannavavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pratiśeddhavyāni sthānāni pratiṣedhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:413_7: punaranyaddānasahagataṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntisahagataṃ [vīryasahagataṃ] dhyānasahagataṃ prajñāsahagatañca pañcavidham /
SA20bsa034_u:413_9: tasya ca bodhisattvasya pareṣāñca dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyasukhāya saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:414_1: taddaśavidhaṃ veditavyam / ādita eva sugṛhīta bhavati śrāmaṇyasabodhikāmatayā na jīvikānimittam /
SA20bsa034_u:414_7: samyakpraṇihitaṃ bhavati lābhasatkāragardhavigamāt devatvāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryāvāsānābhyupagamācca /
SA20bsa034_u:415_0: ityeṣa bodhisattvasya mahān śīlaskandho mahābodhiphalodayo yamāśritya [Dutt_129] bodhisattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:415_1: yāvacca nābhisabudhyate tāvadayamasminnaprameye bodhisattvaśīlaskandhe śikṣamāṇaḥ pañcānuśaṃsān pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:415_3: kāyasya ca bhedāttatropapadyate yatrāsya samānādhikaśīlā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgāḥ sahadhārmikāḥ kalyāṇamitrabhūtā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:415_5: dṛṣṭe dharme samparāye 'pi prakṛtiśīlatāṃ śīlatanmayatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:416_0: sarvañcaitacchīlaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaśīlādikaṃ navākāraṃ trividhena śīlena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:416_2: tatpunastrividhaṃ śīlaṃ samāsato bodhisattvasya trīṇi kāryāṇi karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:416_10: etāvat bodhisattvaśīlakāryaṃ nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:416_12: anāgatā api śikṣiṣyante / vartamānā api daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantesu /
SA20bsa034_u:420_1: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] /
SA20bsa034_u:421_1: yā dvividhā draṣṭavyā / gṛhipakṣāśritā pravrajitapakṣāśritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:422_0: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:422_1: iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea 'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:422_2: svakarmāparādha eṣa me / yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:422_3: duḥkhena cāhamanarthī / iyañcākṣāntirāyatyāṃ puranapi me duḥkhahetusthānīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:422_7: na tathā pareṣām / svabhāvataśca duḥkhaprakṛtikā eveme sarvasaṃskārāḥ svaparasāntānikāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:422_8: tatpare tāvadajñāḥ ye asmākaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharanti /
SA20bsa034_u:422_9: asmākaṃ tu vijñānāṃ satāṃ na pratirūpaṃ syādyadvayamapi pareṣāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharemaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:422_10: bhūyo 'pi cātmārthe tāvatprayuktānāṃ śrāvakāṇāmakṣāntirna yuktarūpā syāt svapareṣāṃ duḥkhajanikā /
SA20bsa034_u:422_12: idaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya sa [Dutt_131] bodhisattvaḥ pañcākārāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan mitrāmitrodāsīnebhyaḥ hīnatulyaviśiṣṭebhyaḥ sukhitaduḥkhitebhyo guṇadoṣayuktebhyaśca sattvebhyaḥ sarvāpakārāṃstitikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:423_0: pañca saṃjñāḥ katamāḥ / pūrvajanmasuhṛtsaṃjñā / dharmamātrānusāriṇīsaṃjñā [anityasaṃjñā] duḥkhasaṃjñā /
SA20bsa034_u:424_2: nāsau sattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo me na dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā ācāryo vā upādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā /
SA20bsa034_u:424_3: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ pratyarthikasaṃjñā apakāriṣu sattveṣu antardhīyate suhṛtsaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:424_4: sa tāṃ suhṛtsaṃjñāṃ niśrityāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:425_0: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:425_3: nāstyatra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvāya ākrośedroṣayettāḍayed bhaṇḍayet paribhāṣeta vā yo vā punarākruśyeta vā roṣyeta vā tāḍayeta vā bhaṇḍayeta vā paribhāṣyeta vā /
SA20bsa034_u:425_6: sa tāṃ dharmamātrasaṃjñāniścitya pratiṣṭhāpya parataḥ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:426_2: ye kecit sattvā jātā bhūtāḥ sarve te anityā maraṇadharmāṇaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:426_3: eṣa ca paramaḥ pratyatakāro yaduta jīvitādvayaparopaṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:426_4: evañca prakṛttyā maraṇadharmakeṣvanityeṣu sattveṣu na pratirūpaṃ syādvijñapuruṣasya kaluṣamapi tāvaccittamutpādayituṃ prāgeva pāṇinā vā prahartuṃ loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā prāgeva sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayitum /
SA20bsa034_u:426_5: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ nityasārasajñā ca prahīyate /
SA20bsa034_u:426_7: sa tāmapi anityāsārasaṃjñāṃ niśritya sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:427_0: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:427_1: iha bodhisattvo ye tāvat sattvā mahatyāmapi sampadi vartante tānapi tisṛbhiḥ [Dutt_132] duḥkhatābhiranuṣaktān paśyati- saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā ca prāgeva vipattisthitān /
SA20bsa034_u:427_3: evaṃ sadā duḥkhānugatānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāyāsmābhirvyāyacchitavyaṃ na duḥkhopasaṃhārāya /
SA20bsa034_u:427_4: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ sukhasaṃjñā prahīyate duḥkhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:427_5: sa tāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:428_2: mayā khalu sarvasattvā bodhāya cittamutpādayatā kaḍatrabhāvena parigṛhītāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:428_4: tanna me pratirūpaṃ syādyadahamevaṃ sarvasattvānupādāyaiṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmītyanarthameva kuryāmapakāramamarṣayan /
SA20bsa034_u:428_5: tasyaiva yāniśo manasi kurvataḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu parasaṃjñā prahīyate /
SA20bsa034_u:428_7: sa tāṃ parigrahasajñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:429_0: kṣāntiḥ katamā / yanna kupyati na pratyapakāraṃ karoti / nāpyanuśayaṃ vahati / iyamucyate kṣāntiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:430_2: mayā khalu pūrva kāmacaryāsu vartamānena kāmānparyeṣatā pratisaṃkhyāya duḥkhahetutayā duḥkhātmakānāṃ kāmānāmarthe prabhūtāni tīvrāṇi duḥkhāni abhyupagatāni adhivāsitānyanubhūtāni kṛṣivaṇijyā rājapauruṣyaprayuktena /
SA20bsa034_u:430_3: evaṃ tadvayarthaṃ duḥkhasyaivārthe mayā mahad duḥkhamabhyupagataṃ pratisaṃkhyāyājñānadoṣeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:430_4: sāṃprataṃ tu mama sukhāhārake kuśale prayuktasya [pratisaṃkhyāya] tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇasya duḥkhasyādhivāsanābhyupagamaḥ pratirūpaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:430_5: prāgeva tato nyūnasya / evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan bodhāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvavastukaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:431_2: sanniśrayādhiṣṭhānaṃ lokadharmādhiṣṭhānam īryāpathādhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmaparigrahādhiṣṭhāna bhikṣākavṛttādhiṣṭhānam abhiyogaklamādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvārthakriyādhiṣṭhānam itikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhānañceti /
SA20bsa034_u:432_1: catvāraḥ sanniśrayāḥ / yānāśritya svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā-upasampadbhikṣubhāvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:432_3: tairbodhisattvo lūhaiḥ stokairasatkṛtya dhandhañca labdhairnotkaṇṭhyate na paritrasyati nāpi tato nidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:433_0: nava lokadharmāḥ / alābhaḥ ayaśo nindā duḥkhaṃnāśadharmakasya nāśaḥ kṣayadharmakasya kṣayaḥ jarādharmakasya jarā vyādhidharmakasya vyādhiḥ maraṇadharmakasya maraṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:433_1: eṣāṃ lokadharmāṇāṃ samastavyastānām āpatanāt sammukhībhāvāt yadduḥkhamutpadyate tallokadharmādhiṣṭhānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:433_2: tenāpi spṛṣṭo bodhisattvo na tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati pratisaṃkhyāyodvahate adhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:434_0: catvāra īryāpathāḥ / caṃkramaḥ sthānaṃ niṣadyā śayyā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:434_1: tatra bodhisattvaḥ caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ divārātrau vā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayaṃstana nidānaṃ pariśramajaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:434_2: na tvakāle pārśvamanuprayacchati mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā /
SA20bsa034_u:435_0: saptavidho dharmaparigrahaḥ / ratnatrayapūjopasthānaṃ gurupūjopasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇamudgṛhītānāṃ pareṣāṃ vistareṇa deśanā vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyakriyā ekākino rahogatasya samyak cintanā tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā yogamanasikārasaṃgṛhītā śamathavipaśyanā bhāvanā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:435_1: asmin saptākāre dharmaparigrahe bodhisattvasya vyāyacchamānasya yad duḥkhamutpadyate tadapyasāvadhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:436_9: ityevaṃ rūpaṃ kṛcchrasaṃbādhaṃ bhikṣākavṛttamāgamya yadduḥkhamutpadyate tadapi bodhisattvo 'dhivāsayati /
SA20bsa034_u:437_0: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktasyāpi ca bodhisattvasya [ye] pariśramanidānā utpadyante kāyikāḥ klamāḥ caitasikāḥ apyupāyāsā na bodhisattvastannidānaṃ vīryaṃ saṃstrayati /
SA20bsa034_u:439_4: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ sannanyatamena duḥkhena prayujyata evānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
SA20bsa034_u:439_5: na [na] prayujyate / prayuktaśca na vivartaṃte / avimanaskaścāsaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:440_1: iha bodhisattvasya samyagdharmapravicayasuvicāritayā buddhyā aṣṭavidhe adhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne adhimuktiḥ susanniviṣṭā bhavati ratnaguṇeṣu tattvārthe buddhabodhisattvānāṃ mahāprabhāve hetau phale prāptavye 'rthe ātmanastatprāptyupāye jñeyagocare ca /
SA20bsa034_u:441_1: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvo durbalānāṃ sattvānāmantikādapakāraṃ kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:442_2: sā caturvidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvo mitrādapyapakāraṃ kṣamate 'mitrādapyudāsīnādapi /
SA20bsa034_u:443_1: sā pañcavidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kṣāntāvanuśaṃsadarśī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:443_4: avipratisārī kālaṃ karoti / kāyasya ca bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:443_5: iti sa evamanuśaṃsadarśī / svayañca kṣamo bhavati / parañca kṣāntau samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:443_6: kṣamāyāśca varṇaṃ bhāṣate / kṣamiṇañca pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā sumanasko bhavatyānandījātaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:444_1: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:444_3: sattveṣu ca dayācittaḥ kāruṇyacitta [snigdhacittaḥ] snehādapi kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:444_4: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchandaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ kāraṇahetorapi kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:444_6: tadanenāpi paryāyeṇa na yuktarūpā samāttaśīlasya pravrajitasyākṣāntiriti dharmasamādānato 'pi kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:444_7: gotrasampadi pūrvake ca kṣāntyabhyāse vartamāno 'vasthitaḥ prakṛtyāpi kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:444_9: sarvañcāpakāraṃ kṣamate / sarvataśca kṣamate / sarvatra ca deśe kṣamate / rahasi vā mahājanasamakṣaṃ vā sarvakālañca kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:444_10: pūrvāhne 'pi madhyāhne 'pi sāyāhne 'pi rātrau ca divā vā 'tī tamapyanāgatamapi pratyutpannamapi glāno 'pi svastho 'pi patito 'pyutthito 'pi /
SA20bsa034_u:445_5: duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanāya vyāyacchataḥ dharmān paryeṣataḥ dharmasyānudharme pratipadyabhānasya tāneva dharmān pareṣāṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayataḥ sattvakṛtyeṣu [sattvakaraṇīyeṣu] ca samyaksahāyībhāvaṃ gacchato yā vyavasāyasahiṣṇutā /
SA20bsa034_u:445_7: yena ca sattvā vidhātinaḥ syuḥ tasya ca kṣāntyā parivarjanāt /
SA20bsa034_u:446_1: sā navavidhā dṛṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvaḥ apramatto viharan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu kṣamo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:446_2: śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāpipāsayoḥ daṃśasaṃsparśānāṃ [maśakasaṃsparśānāṃ vātātapayoḥ sarīsṛpasaṃsparśānāṃ] kṣamo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:446_4: saṃsārapatitajarāvyādhimaraṇādikānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ sattvānukampāmeva puraskṛtā ityevaṃ kṣamo bodhisattva ātmanā ca dṛṣṭe ca dharme sukhasaṃsparśaṃ viharatyavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:446_7: ] pareṣāmapi ca dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāya sukhāya pratipanno bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:447_1: sā daśavidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ vighātaṃ vyatikramaṃ labhamāno nāpi pratyapakāraṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:447_2: nāpi manasā kupyati / nāpi pratyarthikāśayaṃ vahati /
SA20bsa034_u:447_3: upakārāya cābhimukho bhavati yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścānnopakārakriyayā 'pakāramupekṣate apakāriṣu ca svayameva saṃjñaptimanuprayacchati na ca khedayitvā pareṣāmantikāt saṃjñaptiṃ pratigṛhaṇāti khedito bhavatviti /
SA20bsa034_u:447_4: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā akṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa [hrīvyapatrāpyena] samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:447_5: kṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa śāstari premagauraveṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:447_6: sattvāviheṭhanatāmārabhya tīvreṇa sattveṣu karuṇāśayena sanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:447_7: sarveṇa vā sarvamakṣāntidharmasahāyaṃ prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:448_1: ityetāṃ svabhāva-[kṣāntyādikaṃ viśuddha-]kṣāntiparyavasānāṃ kṣāntiṃ vipulāmapramāṇāṃ mahābodhiphalo[dayāṃ] niśritya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:449_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne ekādaśamaṃ kṣāntipaṭalaṃ samāptam /
SA20bsa034_u:454_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva vīryārambhaprayogādevaṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhapūrvakaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate /
SA20bsa034_u:454_2: sa cedahamekasattvasyāpi duḥkhavimokṣahetormahākalpasahasratulyai rātrindivasairnaṃrakavāsenaiva nānyagativāsena yāvatā kālena bodhisattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante tenaiva koṭīniyutaśatasahasraguṇitena kālenāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimāsādayeyam /
SA20bsa034_u:454_3: tathāpi cotsaheyam / na nānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherarthena prayujyeyam /
SA20bsa034_u:454_5: prāgeva nyūnatareṇa kālena tanutareṇa ca duḥkhena /
SA20bsa034_u:454_7: yo bodhisattvaḥ evarūpe bodhisattvānāṃ sannāhavīrye 'dhimuktimātrakaṃ prasādamātrakamapyutpādayet so 'pi tāvadbodhisattvo dhīro 'pramāṇasya bodhāya vīryārambhasya dhātuṃ paripoṣayet /
SA20bsa034_u:454_8: prāgeva yo bodhisattvaḥ īdṛśenaiva sannāhavīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ syāt na ca punastasya bodhisattvasya bodherarthe sattvānāmarthāya kiñcidasti duṣkaraṃ karaṇīyaṃ karma yatrāsya bodhisattvasya saṃkoco vā syāt cetaso duṣkaraṃ vā kartum /
SA20bsa034_u:455_10: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrahāya vīryārambhaprayogo bodhisattvānāṃ kṣipraṃ pāramitāparipūraye 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyadhigamāya saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:455_11: yataśca sarveṣāṃ bodhikarakāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmaṇāmevaṃ samudāgamāya vīryameva pradhānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na tathānyat /
SA20bsa034_u:456_1: tadyathā śīlapaṭale / yattatra śīlayuktaṃ tadiha vīryaṃ vaktavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:457_1: tat trividhaṃ draṣṭavyam / yadbodhisattvo nairantaryeṇa cīvarasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍapātasaṃjñāṃ śayanāsanasaṃjñāmapi ātmasaṃjñāmakurvan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāsātatyena prayukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:457_3: punarbodhisattvastena tathārūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa ā-nikāyasabhāganikṣepāt sarvakālaṃ prayukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:457_5: punarbodhisattvaḥ samatāprativedhaguṇayuktena nātilīnena nātyārabdhenāviparītenārthopasaṃhitena vīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:457_7: asya khalu bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkaravīryasya balaṃ sattveṣu karuṇā prajñā ca saṃgrahaheturveditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:458_1: taccaturvidha draṣṭavyam / kliṣṭadharmavivarjakaṃ śukladharmāvarjakaṃ karmapariśodhakaṃ jñānavivardhakañca /
SA20bsa034_u:458_3: tatra śukladharmāvarjakaṃ bodhisattvasya [Dutt_140] vīryaṃ yadanutpannānāñca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpattaye vīryam /
SA20bsa034_u:458_5: tatra karmapariśodhakaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yat trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ viśuddhaye saṃgrahāya kuśalasya kāyakarmaṇo vākkarmaṇo manaskarmaṇaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:458_7: yacchru tacintābhāvanāmayyāḥ prajñāyāḥ samudāgamāya parivṛddhaye saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:459_1: tatpañcavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / anirākṛtaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ chandaprayogānirākaraṇatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:460_7: idaṃ tāvat ṣaḍvidhaṃ sarvākāraṃ vīryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ ārabdhavīryaḥ sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:460_8: saptavidhaṃ punaḥ chandasahagataṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ punaḥ punaranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchanda praṇidhānānuvṛṃhaṇatayā sāmyayuktaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yadanyatamena kleśopakleśenāsaṃkliṣṭacetaso 'paryavasthitasya yena vīryeṇa bodhisattvaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tulyocittavihārī saṃbhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:460_9: vaiśeṣikaṃ vīryaṃ bodhisattvasyānyatamenopakleśenopakliṣṭacetasaḥ [paryavasitacetasaḥ] tasyopakleśasya prahāṇāya yadādīptaśiro nirvāṇopamaṃ vīryam /
SA20bsa034_u:460_11: śikṣāvīryaṃ bodhisattvasya teṣveva paryeṣiteṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogyaṃ yathārhaṃ dharmānudharmapratipattisaṃpādanatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:460_13: ātmanaḥ samyakprayogārakṣāyai [Dutt_141] skhalitasya ca yathādharmapratikaraṇatāyai vīryaṃ saptamaṃ bodhisattvasya /
SA20bsa034_u:461_0: vighātārthikavīryaṃ cehāmutrasukhañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntivad draṣṭavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:461_1: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / yā tatra kṣāntiḥ seha vīryamabhyutsāho vaktavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:462_2: anurūpamabhyastamaślathaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kālābhyāsa-prayuktaṃ nimittaprativedhayuktamalīnamavidhuraṃ samaṃ mahābodhipariṇamitañceti /
SA20bsa034_u:464_0: iha bodhisattvo na ādikarmika-tatprathamakarmikavīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:465_0: na cāpi bodhisattvaḥ abhyastaprayogo bhavati avavādānuśāsanyāṃ cittasthitimārabhya /
SA20bsa034_u:465_1: api tvādikarmika eva sa bodhisattvastasmin prayoge 'ślathaprayogo bhavati sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogitayā /
SA20bsa034_u:466_0: punarbodhisattvo guruṇāmantikāta svayameva vā bāhuśrutyabalādhānatayā 'viparītagrāhitayā cittasthitaye vīryamārabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:468_1: punarbodhisattvaḥ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittānāṃ samādhisthitivyutthānanimittānāṃ copalakṣaṇāsaṃpramoṣa-prativedhāya sātatyakārī bhavati satkṛtyakārī /
SA20bsa034_u:469_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramodārān paramagambhīrānacintyāprameyān bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambhanirdeśān śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavati na salīnacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:469_2: nottari na vyāyacchate / itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyālīnaṃ vīryamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:470_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ kālena kālamindriyairguptadvāratāṃ bhojane mātrajñatāṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktatāṃ saprajānan vihāritāmityevaṃbhāgīyān samādhisaṃbhārān samādāya vartate /
SA20bsa034_u:470_1: teṣu codyukto bhavati / aviparītañcārthopasaṃhitaṃ sarvatra yatnamārabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:470_4: sama yogavāhi sarveṣu cārambhakaraṇīyeṣu samaṃ satkṛtyakārī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:471_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvavīryārambhānabhisaṃskṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayatīdaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak pariṇamitaṃ vīryamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:472_0: ityetatsvabhāvavīryādikaṃ viśuddhavīryāvasānañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīrya mahābodhiphalaṃ yadāśritya bodhisattvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca /
SA20bsa034_u:473_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne dvādaśamaṃ vīryapaṭalaṃ samāptam /
SA20bsa034_u:476_1: bodhisattvapiṭakaśravaṇacintāpūrvakaṃ yallaukikaṃ lokottaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kuśalaṃ cittaikāgryañcittasthitiḥ śamathapakṣyā vā vipaśyanāpakṣyā vā yuganaddhavāhimārgaṃ tadubhayāpakṣyā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:477_1: tad dvividhaṃ draṣṭavyam / laukikaṃ lokottarañca / tatpunaryathāyogaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:477_2: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya dhyānaṃ bodhisattva-samādhiguṇanirhārāya dhyāna sattvārthakriyāyai dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:478_0: tatra yadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvavikalpāpagataṃ kāyikacaittasikaprasrabdhijanakaṃ paramapraśāntaṃ manyanāpagatamanāsvāditaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:479_1: yeṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api nāmāpi na prajānanti kutaḥ punaḥ samāpatsyante /
SA20bsa034_u:479_5: yaddhyānaṃ niśritya bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:479_11: cittamanuvartate / bhūtairguṇairharṣayati / samyak ca nigṛhṇāti / [Dutt_144] ṛddhyā cotrāsayatyāvarjayati ceti /
SA20bsa034_u:480_1: tat trividhaṃ draṣṭavyam / yadbadhisattvā udārairvicitraiḥ suparicitairdhyānavihārairabhinirhṛtairvihṛtya svecchayā tatparamaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ vyāvartya pratisaṃkhyāya sattvānukampā prabhūtāṃ sattvārthakriyāṃ sattvārthaparipākaṃ samanupaśyantaḥ kāmadhātāvupapadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:481_1: taccaturvidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / savitarkaṃ-savicāraṃ [vivekajaṃ samādhijaṃ] prītisahagataṃ sāta-sukhasahagatamupekṣāsahagata ca /
SA20bsa034_u:482_1: tatpañcavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / anākhāditaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ karuṇāsahagataṃ muditāsahagatamupekṣāsahagatañca /
SA20bsa034_u:483_2: kuśalaṃ dhyānamavyākṛtaṃ ca nirmitanirmāṇāya dhyānaṃ śamathapakṣyaṃ vipaśyanāpakṣyaṃ svaparārthasamyagupanidhyānāya dhyānaṃ abhijñāprabhāvaguṇarnirhārāya dhyānaṃ nāmālambanaṃmarthālambanaṃ śamathanimittālambanaṃ pragrahanimittālambanamupekṣānimittālambanaṃ [dṛṣṭadharmasukha]vihārāya parārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:484_1: tadaṣṭavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / viṣāśani viṣamajvarabhūtagrahādyupadravasaṃśamakānāṃ siddhaye mantrāṇāmadhiṣṭhāyakaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:484_4: vividhebhyo bhayebhyo [Dutt_145] manuṣyāmanuṣyakṛtebhyo jalasthalagatebhyaḥ samyak paritrāṇā dhyayānam /
SA20bsa034_u:484_7: daśasu dikṣu pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ samyaksaṃbodhanāya dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:485_1: tannavavidhaṃ draṣṭavyam / ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvānāṃ vinayāya dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:485_7: laukikānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāmarthopasaṃhitānāṃ sattvānugrāhakāṇāṃ lipigaṇananyasanasaṃkhyāmudrādīnāṃ mañcapīṭhacchatropānahādīnāñca vicitrāṇāṃ vividhānāṃ bhāṇḍopaskarāṇāmanupravartakaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:485_8: apāyabhūmyupapannānāñca sattvānāṃ tat kālāpāyikaduḥkhapratiprasrambhaṇatāyai raśmipramocakaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:486_5: dhyānavyāvartane punaḥ samādapanavaśitā-viśuddhyā viśuddhaṃ dhyānam abhijñāvikurvaṇavaśitā-viśuddhyā viśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:486_8: ityetaddhyānamaprameya bodhisattvānāṃ mahābodhiphalaṃ yadāśritya bodhisattvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambuddhavanto 'bhisaṃ[bhotsyante 'bhisaṃ]budhyante ca /
SA20bsa034_u:490_1: sarvajñeyapraveśāya ca sarvajñeyānupraviṣṭaśca yo dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ pañcavidyāsthānānyālambya pravartate adhyātmavidyāṃ hetuvidyāṃ śabdavidyāñcikitsāvidyāṃ śilpakarmasthānavidyāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:491_1: sā dvividhā draṣṭavyā / laukikī lokottarā ca / sā punaḥ samāsatastrividhā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:491_3: pañcasu ca yathānirdiṣṭeṣu vidyāsthāneṣu triṣu ca rāśiṣu kauśalyakriyāyai sattvārthakriyāyai ca /
SA20bsa034_u:491_4: yā bodhisattvānāmanabhilāpyaṃ dharmanairātmyamārabhya satyāvabodhāya vā satyāvabodhakāle vā satyābhisaṃbodhādvā urddhaṃ prajñā paramapraśamapratyupasthānā nirvikalpā sarvaṃprapañcāgatā sarvaṃdharmeṣu samatānugatā mahāsāmānyalakṣaṇapraviṣṭā jñeyaparyantagatā samāropāpavādāntadvaya vivarjitatvānmadhyamapratipadanusāriṇī /
SA20bsa034_u:491_6: pañcasu vidyāsthāneṣu kauśalyaṃ vistareṇa pūrvavadveditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:491_10: ityeteṣvaṣṭāsu sthāneṣu prajñāyāḥ kauśalyaparigraho mahāntaṃ niruttaraṃ jñānasambhāraṃ paripūrayatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
SA20bsa034_u:491_12: teṣveva sthāneṣu yā prajñā sā sattvārthakriyāyai prajñā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:492_1: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā gambhīrasya dharmanairātmyajñānāya duṣkarā /
SA20bsa034_u:493_2: sā caturvidyā draṣṭavyā / śrāvakapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ cārabhya śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:494_1: sā pañcavidhā draṣṭavyā / saddharmaśravaṇasamudāgatā pratyātmaṃ yoniśo manaskārasahagatā svaparārthaniścitā prajñā kleśavijahanā ca prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:494_2: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / sūkṣmā yathāvad bhāvikatayā jñeyapraveśāt /
SA20bsa034_u:495_1: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:495_4: iyaṃ tāvat ṣaḍvidhā prajñā / saptavidhā punaḥ dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamabhijñājñānaṃ lakṣaṇajñānaṃ daśabalapūrvaṅgamaṃ jñānaṃ catasṛṣu ca yuktiṣu yuktijñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:496_1: sā 'ṣṭavidhā draṣṭavyā / dharmāṇāṃ paryāyajñānamārabhya bodhisattvasya dharmapratisaṃvit /
SA20bsa034_u:496_8: rājanītilaukikavyavahāranītiṣu ca bodhisattvasya yā niścitā prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:497_1: sā navavidhā draṣṭavyā / adhyātmavidyāyāṃ suvyavadātā supratiṣṭhitā prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:497_2: hetuvidyāyāṃ śabdavidyāyāṃ cikitsāvidyāyāṃ laukikaśilpakarmasthānavidyāyāṃ suvyavadātā no tu pratiṣṭhitā prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:497_3: tāmeva ca suvyavadātāṃ pañcaprakārāṃ vidyāṃ niśritya yā bodhisattvasya [Dutt_148] pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ mūḍhānāṃ pramattānāṃ saṃlīnānāṃ samyak pratipannānāṃ yathākramaṃ saṃdarśanī samādāpanī samuttejanī saṃpraharṣaṇī ca prajñā /
SA20bsa034_u:498_2: tattvārthe dvividhā yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca tattvārthasya grahaṇāt /
SA20bsa034_u:498_6: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paścākārā daśaprabhedā prajñā viśuddhā paramayā viśuddhyā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:499_0: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ su-viniścitā cāprameyā ca prajñā mahābodhiphalā yāmāśritya bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:500_0: sa khalveṣa ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ teṣu-teṣu sūtrāntareṣu bhagavatā vyagrāṇāṃ nirdiṣṭānāmayaṃ samāsa-saṃgraha-nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:500_1: yasmiṃtathāgata-bhāṣite sūtre dānapāramitā vā yāvat prajñāpāramitā vā uddeśamāgacchati nirdeśaṃ vā sā svabhāva-dāne vā yāvat viśuddhe vā dāne 'vatārayitavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:500_3: evamanyeṣāṃ śīlādīnāṃ prajñāvasānānāṃ yathānirdiṣṭānāmavatāraḥ saṃgrahaśca yathāyogaṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:500_4: yāni ca tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvacaryā-janmāprameyāṇi jātakāni duṣkaracaryā-pratisaṃyuktāni tāni sarvāṇi dānapratisaṃyuktāni dānamārabhya veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:500_5: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvāṇiṃ prajñāpratisaṃyuktāni prajñāmārabhya veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:500_6: kāniciddānamevārabhya kānicidyāvat prajñāmevārabhya kāniciddvayasaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitrayasaṃsṛṣṭāni kāniciccatuḥsaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitpañcasaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitsarvā eva ṣaṭpāramitā ārabhya veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:500_7: ābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranuttarāyai samyak saṃbodhaye samudāgacchanto bodhisattvā mahāśukladharmārṇavā mahāśukladharmasamudrā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:500_9: asya punareṣāmevamapramāṇasya puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamasya nānyatphalamevamanurūpaṃ yathānuttaraivaṃ samyaksaṃbodhiriti /
SA20bsa034_u:504_1: iha bodhisattvo manāpāṃ satyāṃ dharmyāñcārthopasaṃhitāñca sattveṣu vācamudāharati /
SA20bsa034_u:505_1: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvasya yā vāksammodanī yayā vācā bodhisattvo vigatabhṛkuṭiḥ pūrvābhilāpī uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitamukha pūrvaṅgamaḥ kṣemasvastyayanaparipṛcchayā vā dhātusāmyaparipṛcchayā vā sukharātrindivaparipṛcchayā vā ehīti svāgata[vādi]tayā vā ityevamādibhirākāraiḥ sattvān pratisammodayati lokayātrāṃ nāgarakabhāvamanuvartamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:505_2: yā ca vāgbodhisattvasyānandanī yayā vācā bodhisattvaḥ putravṛddhiṃ [dāravṛddhiṃ] jñātivṛddhiṃ dhanavṛddhiṃ dhānyavṛddhiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā apratisaṃviditātmavṛddhikānāṃ sattvānāmāvedayannānandayati śraddhāśīlaśrutatyāgaprajñāvṛddhyā vā punarānandayati /
SA20bsa034_u:505_3: yā ca bodhisattvasya sarvākāraguṇopetadharmadeśanāpratisaṃyuktā vāk sattvānāṃ hitasukhāya satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitā parameṇopakāreṇopakāribhūtā /
SA20bsa034_u:505_4: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ priyavāditā prabhedaśaḥ sarvā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:506_0: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ sarvā priyavāditā /
SA20bsa034_u:506_1: sā dvividhā draṣṭavyā / lokayātrānugatā samyagdharmadeśanānugatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:506_2: tatra yā ca sammodanīvāg yā cānandanī iyaṃ lokayātrānugatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:506_3: tatra yeyaṃ vāgupakarā parameṇopakāreṇa pratyupasthitā nirdiṣṭā iyaṃ samyagdharmadeśanānugratā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:507_1: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā / yadbodhisattvo vadhakeṣu pratyarthiṣu pratyamitreṣu suviśuddhena niṣkaluṣeṇa cetasā pratisaṃkhyāya sammodanīṃ vā ānandanīṃ vā upakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ [Dutt_150] bodhisattvasya prathamā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:507_2: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ adhimātraṃ saṃmūḍheṣu sattveṣu dhandhendriyeṣvaparitasyamānaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati khedamabhyupagamya grāhayati nyāyaṃ dharmaṃ kuśalam iyaṃ dvitīyā bodhisattvasya duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:507_3: punaryadbodhisattvaḥ śaṭheṣu māyāviṣu sattveṣvācāryopādhyāyagurudakṣiṇīyavisaṃvādakeṣu mithyāpratipanneṣu anāghātacitto 'pratighacittaḥ sammodanīmānandanīmupakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:508_1: sā caturvidhā draṣṭavyā / nivaraṇa-prahāṇāya sugatigamanāya pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmadeśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:508_3: pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ gṛhi-pravrajitānāṃ samyaksaṃcodanā pramādacaryāyā utthāpya apramādacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:509_1: sā pañcavidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvabhūtāstathāgatabhūtāśca bodhisattvāḥ sanidānameva vineyānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti saniḥsaraṇaṃ sapratisaraṇaṃ saparākramaṃ saprātihāryam /
SA20bsa034_u:509_6: caturbhiḥ pratisaraṇaiḥ saṃgṛhītāmaviparītāṃ dharmavinaye 'smin pratipattiṃ prajñapayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:510_1: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:510_8: sammodanī priyavāditā / ānandanī priyabāditā / pareṣāṃ sarvopakaraṇairalpotsukatāyāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu ca samyaggateṣvalpotsukatāyāṃ viśadapravāraṇī priyavāditā /
SA20bsa034_u:510_11: akuśalāt sthānād vutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭa-śruta-pariśaṅkita-saṃcodanāvasādanī priyavāditā /
SA20bsa034_u:510_13: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ trayodaśākārā priyavāditā sarvākārā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:511_1: sā 'ṣṭavidhā draṣṭavyā / yā bodhisattvasya caturvidhāṃ vāgviśuddhiṃ niśrityāṣṭaskāryeṣu vyavahāreṣu vāk /
SA20bsa034_u:511_6: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātabāditā /
SA20bsa034_u:512_4: śīlasaṃpade dṛṣṭisaṃpade ācārasaṃpade ājīvasaṃpade ca yā priyavāditā saddharmadeśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:513_1: saḥ viṃśatividhā draṣṭavyā / viṃśatyākārairyā dharmadeśanā sā punaḥ pūrvavadveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:513_2: tadyathā balagotrapaṭale / tatrārthacaryā yathaiva priyavāditā tathaiva vistareṇa veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:513_4: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvaprakārayā 'nayā priyavāditayā tatra-tatropagamārthaṃ sattvānāmācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:513_6: evaṃ priyavāditayā yuktisaṃdarśitānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāyogaṃ śikṣāsvarthacaryāyāṃ dharmānudharmapraticaryāyāṃ kāruṇyacittamupasthāpya nirāmiṣeṇa [Dutt_152] cetasā samādāpanā vinayanā niveśanā pratiṣṭhāpanā /
SA20bsa034_u:514_1: sā dvividhā draṣṭavyā / aparipakvānāñca sattvānāṃ paripācanā /
SA20bsa034_u:514_7: tatra dhārmikaiḥ karmaguṇaiḥ bhogānāmarjana-rakṣaṇa-vardhana-samyak-samādāpanatayā dṛṣṭadhārmike 'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:514_8: yenāyaṃ parataśca praśaṃsāṃ labhate dṛṣṭe ca dharmai sukham /
SA20bsa034_u:514_12: yenāyaṃ niyataṃ saṃparāyasukhito bhavati na tvavaśyaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme /
SA20bsa034_u:514_13: tatra yā gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vānupūrveṇa vairāgya-gamana-samādāpanā /
SA20bsa034_u:514_15: yenāyaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme prasrabdha-kāya prasrabdha-cittaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:515_1: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā / pūrvakuśalamūlahetvacariteṣu sattveṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /
SA20bsa034_u:515_2: tathā hi te duḥkhasamādāpyā bhavanti kuśale /
SA20bsa034_u:515_3: mahatyāṃ bhogasaṃpadi vartamāneṣu sattveṣu tadadhyavasānagateṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /
SA20bsa034_u:515_4: tathāhi te mahati pramādapade pramādasthāne vartante /
SA20bsa034_u:515_5: ito bāhyakeṣu tīrthikeṣu pūrvaṃ [ca] tīrthika dṛṣṭicariteṣu sattveṣvarthaṃcaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /
SA20bsa034_u:515_6: tathā hi te svayaṃ saṃmūḍhāścābhiniviṣṭāścāsmin dharmavinaye /
SA20bsa034_u:516_1: sā caturvidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvaḥ aśrāddhaṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:516_2: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:517_2: sā pañcavidhā draṣṭavyā / iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvān bhūte 'rthe samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:518_1: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisakṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:518_2: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃgrahītavyāṃśca sattvān samyak saṃgṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:518_6: avatīrṇāśca sattvān samyak triṣu yāneṣu paripācayati /
SA20bsa034_u:518_10: yathā sambhārarakṣopacaye evaṃ praviveke cittaikāgratāyāmāvaraṇaviśudau manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ ca sanniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:519_2: yathā āhrīkyaparyavasthānamevamapatrapitavyeṣu anapatrāpyaparyavasthānaṃ middhaparyasthānamauddhatyaparyavasthānaṃ kaukṛtyaparyaṃvasthānamīrṣāparyasthānaṃ [mātsaryaparyavasthānaṃ] vinodayatyapanayati /
SA20bsa034_u:520_1: sā navavidhā draṣṭavyā / parasattvānāṃ kāyakarmapariśuddhimārabhya sarvākārā prāṇātipātāt prativiratisamānāpanatā /
SA20bsa034_u:522_0: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānna duścaritavyāmiśre duścaritapūrvagame sāvadye sakliṣṭe 'kuśale sanniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:523_0: punarbodhisattvo nāmokṣe cānekāntaviśuddhe cāyatane mokṣa eṣa ekāntaviśuddha eṣa iti sattvāṃstatraiva samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:524_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ pūrvaṃ bālaprajñānāṃ sattvānāmuttānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:524_2: madhyaprajñāṃścaināṃviditvā madhyāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ sūkṣmāmavavādānuśāsanīmanupravartayati anupūrveṇa kuśalapakṣasamudāgamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:525_1: hitasukhaṃ paryeṣate / tatraiva samādāpayati / imamasya marvatrḥgā sattveṣvarthacaryā /
SA20bsa034_u:526_0: punarbodhisattvo ye sattvā yasmin svārthe kuśale parītte madhye 'dhimātre vā śakyarūpāḥ samādāpayituṃ yena copāyena śakyarūpāḥ samādāyituṃ tān yathāyogaṃ tatra tathā samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:526_1: iyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā arthacaryā /
SA20bsa034_u:527_1: iha bodhisattvo vipulena sattveṣu kāruṇyāśayena pratyupasthitenārthamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:527_3: punarbodhisattvaḥ pravarāyāmagryāyāmapi saṃpadi vartamāno dāsavatpreṣyavadvaśyaputravaccaṇḍāladārakavannīcacitto nihatamadamānāhaṃkāraḥ nāmarthamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:527_4: [Dutt_155] punarbodhisattvo nirāmiṣeṇākṛtrimeṇa ca parameṇa ca premṇā sattvānāmarthamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:527_5: punarbodhisattva ātyantikenāpunaḥ pratyudāvartyena maitreṇa cetasā sattvānāmarthamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:527_7: yā ca pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā yā ca pañcavidhā 'ntaḥśuddhā tāṃ sarvāmekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhā bodhisattvānāṃ viśuddhā 'rthacaryetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:528_1: iha bodhisattvo yasminnarthe yasmin kuśalamūle parān samādāpayati tasminnarthe tasmin kuśalamūla samādāpane tulye vā 'dhike vā svayaṃ saṃśikṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:528_2: iti yaivaṃ bodhisattvasya paraistulyārthatā iyamucyate samānārthatā /
SA20bsa034_u:528_3: tāṃ samānārthatāṃ pare vineyā bodhisattvebhya upalabhya dṛḍhaniścayā bhavantyapratyudāvartyāstasmin kuśala[mūla]samādāpane /
SA20bsa034_u:528_4: tatkasya hetoḥ / teṣāmevaṃ bhavati / nūnametadasmākaṃ hitametatsukhaṃ yatrāyaṃ bodhisattvo 'smān samādāpitavān /
SA20bsa034_u:528_5: yasmādayaṃ bodhisattvo yatraivāsmān sanniyojayati tadevātmanā samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:528_6: tatrāyaṃ jānannahitamasukhaṃ nātmanā samudācarediti na cāsya samānārthasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavanti pare vaktāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:528_7: tvaṃ tāvat svayaṃ na kuśalaṃ samādāya vartase /
SA20bsa034_u:528_8: kasmāttvaṃ paraṃ kuśale 'tyartha samādāpayitavyaṃ vaktavyamavavaditavyaṃ manyase /
SA20bsa034_u:528_10: asti bodhisattvaḥ paraiḥ samānārtha eva saṃstāṃ samānārthatāṃ pareṣāṃ nopadarśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:528_14: tatra prathamā koṭi tulyaguṇaprabhāvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvamārge ācāryatvamabhyupagatānāṃ tulyaguṇaprabhāvo bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇatayā guṇān prabhāvañca nopadarśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:528_15: dvitīyā koṭī hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ gaṃbhīreṣu sthāneṣūttrastānāṃ pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ tenopāyena vinayanārthaṃ sahadhārmikamātmānamupadarśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:528_16: saṃcintya ā-caṇḍālānām ā-śunāmarthaṃ kartukāma upadravaṃ saṃśamitukāmo vinayitukāma ā-caṇḍālānām āśunāṃ [Dutt_156] sabhāgatāyāmupapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:528_17: tṛtīyā koṭī calakuśalamūlasamādānānāṃ vineyānāṃ sthirīkaraṇārthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samānārthaḥ adhikārtho vā samānārthatāmupadarśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:529_0: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yacca śīlaṃ vistareṇa yāvadyā ca samānārthatā tatra pāramitābhiradhyātmaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:529_3: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ pūrvavadyāvat samānārthatā ityeṣāmanekavidhānāmaprameyāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bodhipākṣikānāṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samudācāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:530_1: udāratvādasaṃkliṣṭatvācca śreṣṭhatā niruttaratā asādhāraṇatā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:530_3: tatra sattvābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānadhiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānārabhya tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati na kevalasyātmana evārthe /
SA20bsa034_u:530_4: tatra vastvabhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvāṇi sarvākārāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samādāya vartate /
SA20bsa034_u:530_5: tatra kālābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ satatasamitamanirākṛtaprayogo 'nikṣiptadhuro rātrau ca divā vā dṛṣṭe vā dharme tenaiva ca hetunā 'bhisaṃparāye 'pi tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:530_7: iha bodhisattvo muditacittaḥ tān kuśalān dharmānniṣevate na duḥkhī na durmanā avipratisārī bhavati tato nidānam /
SA20bsa034_u:530_8: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramanapahatya dṛṣṭigatānyanabhiniviśya duścaritenāvyāmiśrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:530_9: punarbodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya sarvātmanā teṣveva guṇadarśī sāradarśī śāntadarśī suniścito 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ tān kuśalān dharmān dānādīn samādāya vartate /
SA20bsa034_u:530_10: punarbodhisattvo na terṣā dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṃṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣate cakravartitvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ vā nāpi parataḥ pratikāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
SA20bsa034_u:530_11: na tatra niśrito bhavati / na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite 'pi niśrito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:530_12: iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛtya cāniśritaśca dānādīnāṃ samānārthatāparyavasānānāṃ [Dutt_157] kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:530_15: tatrāśaya śuddhibhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya uttaptānyacalāni caitāni kuśalamūlāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:530_16: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:530_17: tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate /
SA20bsa034_u:530_19: nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna [pari]hīyate bodhisattvaḥ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmibyavasthitasya punarbodhisattvasyaikajātipratibaddhasya caramabhavikasya vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:530_20: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:530_22: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām /
SA20bsa034_u:531_0: tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇāyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirvajrasāraśarīratā saddharmacirasthitikatā ca phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_1: tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_2: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_3: tatra satpuruṣadānasya satpuruṣaśīlasya yāvatsatpuruṣasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā 'rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_4: tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasyāprameyavicitrapuṇyaparigṛhītaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyatā phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_5: [Dutt_158] tatra vighātārthikadānasya vighātārthikaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvadvighātārthikasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇasya sarvamārapratyarthikavidhātāviheṭhāvikampanāpratibalanatā phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_6: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_7: tatra viśuddhasya dānasya viśuddhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadviśuddhāyāḥ samānārthaṃtāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇayāstathāgatasya sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiḥ phalamabhinirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:531_9: idamasya bodhisattvasya dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryantagataṃ phalaṃ niruttaram /
SA20bsa034_u:536_2: śarīra-pūjā caitya-pūjā sammukha-pūjā vimukha-pūjā svayaṃkṛta-pūjā para-kārita-pūjā lābha-satkāra-pūjā udāra-pūjā asaṃkliṣṭapūjā pratipatti-pūjā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:537_0: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ sākṣāt tathāgata-rūpa-kayameva pūjayati / iyamasyocyate śarīra pūjā /
SA20bsa034_u:538_0: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgatamuddisya stūpaṃ vā gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā purāṇacaitya vā abhinava-caityaṃ vā pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:539_0: yad bodhisattvastathāgata-kāya vā tathāgata-caityaṃ vā sammukhībhūtamadhyakṣa pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:540_0: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgate-caitye vā sammukha-pūjāṃ kurvannevamadhyāśaya-sahagataṃ prasāda-sahagataṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:540_1: yā ekasya tathāgatasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmatā /
SA20bsa034_u:540_2: yā ekasya tathāgata-caityasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgata-caityānāṃ dharmatā /
SA20bsa034_u:540_3: ityato 'hametañca sammukhībhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi sarvāṃśca tān atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca tathāgatān pūjayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:540_5: tadanyāni ca daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvāṇi stūpāni gahāni kūṭāgārāṇi purāṇa-caityāni abhinava-caityāni pūjayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:541_0: vimukhā ca tathāgata-pūjā tathāgata-caitya-pūjā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:541_1: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ asammukhībhūte tathāgate tathāgata-caitye vā tathāgatacittamabhisaṃskṛtya [Dutt_160] pūjāṃ prayojayati sarvabuddhānuddiśya sarvatathāgatacaityāni coddiśya /
SA20bsa034_u:541_3: yadapi bodhisattvaḥ parinirvṛte tathāgate tathāgatamuddiśya tathāgatasya śarīraṃ stūpaṃ vā kārayati gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā ekaṃ vā dvau vā sambahulāni vā yāvat koṭi-śatasahasrāṇi yathāśakti-yathābalam /
SA20bsa034_u:541_4: iyamapi bodhisattvasya tathāgateṣu vimukhā vipulā pūjā apramāṇa-puṇya-phalā 'nekabrāhmapuṇyaparigṛhītā /
SA20bsa034_u:541_6: na cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sambhāraṃ na paripūrayati tannidānam /
SA20bsa034_u:541_7: tatra yeyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaiva tathāgate tathāgatacaitye vā pūjā iyameva tāvadvipulapuṇyaphalā draṣṭavyā tato vipulatarapuṇyaphalā kevalaiva vimukhā draṣṭavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:542_0: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ svayameva svahastaṃ karoti na dāsīdāsakarmaṃkara-[pauruṣeya-]mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaiḥ kārayatyālasyakausīdyaṃ pramādasthānaṃ vā niśritya /
SA20bsa034_u:542_2: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmo na kevalaṃ svayeva karotyapi tu mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kārayati putradāreṇa dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyairmitrāmātyajñātisālohitaiḥ paraiśca rājabhiḥ rājamahāmātrairbrāhmaṇaigṛhapatibhirnaigamairjānapadairdhanibhiḥ śreṣṭhabhiḥ sārthavāhairantataḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhiḥ kṛpaṇaiduḥkhitaira ā-caṇḍālairapi kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:542_3: tathā 'cāryopādhyāyaiḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsibhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiśca pravrajitairapyanyatīrthyaistathāgate [vā tathāgata-]caitye vā pūjāṃ kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:542_4: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya sādhāraṇā pūjā svaparakṛtā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:543_0: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ parītte pūjākaraṇīye deyavastuni saṃvidyamāne karuṇāsahagatena cetasā saṃcintya pareṣāmeva tadvastvanuprayacchatyete duḥkhitāḥ sattvā alpapuṇyāścāśaktāśca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ kṛtvā sukhitā bhavantviti /
SA20bsa034_u:543_1: pare ca tena vastunā tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kurvanti na bodhisattvaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalā parakāritā pūjā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:544_1: tatra yā kevalā svayaṃkṛtā sā mahāpuṇyaphalā /
SA20bsa034_u:544_3: yā punaḥ sādhāraṇā yā mahattamapuṇyaphalā niruttarā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:545_0: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalikarmabhiśca dhūpagandhaiścūrṇagandhairanulepanagandhairvicitraiśca mālyairvicitrairvādyai rvicitraiśchatradhvajapatākāpradīpadānairvicitraiḥ stotrābhivyāhāraiḥ pañcamaṇḍalapraṇāmaiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartaiḥ pūjāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:545_2: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā lābhasatkārapūjā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:546_0: tatra yadbodhisattvo dīrghakālikīñca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā etāmeva lābhasatkārapūjāṃ karoti prabhūtavastukāñca praṇītavastukāñca sammukhavimukhāñca svayaṃkṛtaparakṛtāñca ghanarasena ca prasādena sammukhībhūtena tīvrayā cādhimuktyā pūjāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:547_0: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ svahastaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ karoti na parairavajñayā kārayati pramādakausīdyādvā /
SA20bsa034_u:547_2: na buddhābhiprasannānāṃ rājādīnāmudārasattvānāṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ kuhanārthaṃ pratirūpeṇa ca vastunā pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_0: tāṃ punaretāmudārāmasaṃkliṣṭāṃ lābhasatkārapūjāṃ bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā svabāhubalopārjitairbhogaiḥ karoti parato vā paryeṣitaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:548_2: tatra pariṣkāravaśitāprāpto bodhisattvaḥ dvau vā [Dutt_162] trīnvā saṃbahulān vā samucchrayān yāvat samucchryakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇyanekānyabhinirmāya sarvaistaiḥ samucchrayaistathāgateṣu praṇāmaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:548_3: teṣāñca samucchrayāṇāmekaikasya hastaśataṃ hastasahasraṃ vā tato vā pareṇa nirmāya sarvaistairdivyasamatikrāntaiḥ kusumaiḥ paramasugandhibhiḥ paramamanoramaiḥ tāṃstathāgatānabhyavakirati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_4: sarve ca te samucchrayā atyudārāṇi tathāgatabhūtaguṇopasaṃhitāni stotrāṇi bhāṣante /
SA20bsa034_u:548_5: sarvaireva ca taiḥ samucchrayairvicitrāṇyamātrāṇi [agrāṇi] praṇītāni keyūramaṇikuṇḍalāni chatradhvajapatākāśca tathāgateṣūtsṛjayattyāropayati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_7: na cāsya punarbuddhotpādaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ prārthayitavyo vā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_8: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathāhi tasyāvaivartikabhūmipraviṣṭatvāt sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvavyāhatā gatirbha vati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_9: no cāpi bodhisattvasya svabāhubalopārjitā bhogā bhavantināpi ca parataḥ paryeṣitalabdhā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:548_11: api tu yā kācit tathāgatapūjā jambūdvīpe [vā] cāturdvīpe vā sāhasre [vā dvisāhasre vā trisāhasra-]mahāsāhasre vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu mṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:548_12: tāṃ sarvāṃ śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ prasādasahagatenodārādhimuktisahagatena cetasā spharitvābhyanumodate /
SA20bsa034_u:548_13: iyamapi bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa mahatī apramāṇā tathāgatapūjā bodhāya mahāsaṃbhāraparigṛhītā yasyāṃ bodhisattvena satata-samitaṃ kalyāṇacittena hṛṣṭacittena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:548_14: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato godohamātramapi sarvasattva prāṇibhūteṣu maitracittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_16: tathā sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityasaṃjñāmanitye duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāṃ nirvāṇe cānuśaṃsasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_18: tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto nirvikalpena nirnimittena cetasā viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:548_23: itīyaṃ bodhisattvasya pratipattisahagatā tathāgata pūjā 'gryāvarā [Dutt_163] praṇītā niruttarā /
SA20bsa034_u:548_24: yasyāḥ pūjāyāḥ pūrvikā lābhasatkārapūjā sarvākārāpi śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti vistareṇa yāvadupaniṣadamapi nopaiti /
SA20bsa034_u:549_0: yathā tathāgatapūjā evaṃ dharmapūjā saṃghapūjā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:550_0: tatra triṣu ratneṣvetāṃ daśākārāṃ pūjāṃ kurvanbodhisattvastathāgatālambanaiḥ ṣaḍmiradhyāśayaiḥ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:550_1: guṇakṣetraniruttarādhyāśayatayā upakāriniruttarādhyāśayatayā 'padadvipadādisarvasattvāgryādhyāśayatayā udumbarapuṣpavat sudurlaṃbhā 'dhyāśayatayā ekākinastrisāhasrama sāhasre loka utpādātkevalādhyāśayatayā laukikalokottarasampatsarvārthaṃpratisaraṇādhyāśayatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:550_2: tasyaibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiradhyāśayaiḥ tathāgate tasya vā dharme tasya vā saṃghe pūjā prakalpitā parīttāpyaprameyaphalā bhavanti prāgeva prabhūtā /
SA20bsa034_u:551_0: tatra katibhirākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
