SA20bsa034_u:551_5: katyākārayā ca saṃjñayā kalyāṇamitrasyāntikādbodhisattvena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:551_6: katiṣu ca sthāneṣu kalyāṇamitrasyāntikād bodhisattvena dharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale 'manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:552_0: tatrāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:552_3: adhigamayuktaśca bhavati lābhī bhāvanāmayasyānyatamānyatamasya kuśalasya lāmī śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:552_4: anukampakaśca bhavati kāruṇikaḥ so 'dhyupekṣya svaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃsukhavihāraṃ pareṣāmarthāya parayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:552_5: viśārado bhavati na pareṣāmasya dharmaṃ deśayataḥ smṛtiḥ pratibhānaṃ - va śāradyabhayāt pramuṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:552_6: kṣamaśca bhavati parato 'vamānanāvahasanāvaspandana durukta-durāga-tādīnāmaniṣṭānāṃ vacanspathānāṃ vividhānañca sattvavipratipattīnām /
SA20bsa034_u:552_7: aparikhinnamānasaśca [Dutt_164] bhavati balavān pratisaṃkhyānabahulaḥ akilāsī catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:553_0: tatra pañcabhirākāraireva sarvākāraguṇayuktasya bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasyābandhyaṃ kalyāṇamitrakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:553_1: sa hi pareṣāmādita eva hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:553_4: yena copāyena yadrupayā dharmadeśanayā yaḥ sattvaḥ śakyarūpo bhavati vinetuṃ tatra śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:553_6: samakāraṇyaśca bhavati / sarvasattveṣu hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭeṣu na pakṣapatitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:554_0: tatra pañcabhirākāraistatkalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthitaṃ bhavati yenainaṃ pare 'tyarthamabhiprasīdantyanuśraveṇāpi śrutvā prāgeva sammukhaṃ nirīkṣya /
SA20bsa034_u:554_3: niṣkuhakaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ kuhanārthamīryāpathaṃ sthairyaṃ vā pratisaṃkhyāya kalpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:554_4: anīrṣukaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ dharmyaṃ kathāṃ lābhasatkāraṃ vā ārabhyāmarṣamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:554_5: api tu svayamadhyeṣyamāṇo 'pi dharmakathane paraiḥ labhamāno 'pi vipulaṃ lābhasatkāraṃ paramapadiśati aśaṭhena cetasā prasannena /
SA20bsa034_u:554_7: yathā svena lābhasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati tathā bhṛśataraṃ paralābhena parasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:555_0: tatra pañcabhirākārairayaṃ kalyāṇamitrabhūto bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ kalyāṇamitrakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:555_1: codako bhavati / smārako bhavati / avavādako bhavati / anuśāsako bhavati / dharmadeśako bhavati / eṣāñca padānāṃ vistareṇa vibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:555_2: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmāvavavādānuśāsanañca bhūyastata uttari veditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:556_3: niśritasya ca dhārmikeṣvarthasaṃyoga-viyogeṣu vaśavartanatayā avikampanatayā yathābhūtatvāviṣkaraṇatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:557_0: tatra kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śrotukāmena bodhisattvena pañcākārayā saṃjñayā dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:558_0: tatra bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale pañcasthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā 'vahitaśrotreṇa prasannamānasena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:558_11: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ paruṣavākyoyaṃ krodhano na ca madhuraṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:558_12: ityevaṃ pañcasu sthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvena sādareṇa saddharmaparigrahaḥ kāryo na jātu dharmaḥ pudgaladoṣeṇa duṣṭo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:558_13: tatra yo 'sau mandaprajño bodhisattvaḥ pudgaladoṣeṣūpahatacitto dharmaṃ necchati śrotuṃ sa ātmana evāhitāya prajñāparihāṇāya pratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:559_5: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ spharitvā sattvādhimokṣeṇa viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:559_7: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:559_11: yathā sattvālambanā dharmālambanā 'nālambanā maitrī evaṃ karuṇā muditopekṣā api veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:559_12: tatra bodhisattvo duḥkhitān sattvānārabhya duḥkhāpanayanādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣu karuṇāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:559_13: sāsya karuṇā / sukhitānvā punaḥ sattvānārabhya sukhānumodanādhyāśayo dasaśu dikṣu muditāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:559_14: sāsya muditā / sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:559_15: iyamasyopekṣā / tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:559_16: yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:559_19: maitrī karuṇā muditā ca / ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
SA20bsa034_u:560_1: tatra daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ sattvadhātau saṃpaśyanto bodhisattvāḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:560_3: ekavidhaṃ duḥkham / aviśeṣeṇa pravṛttiduḥkhamārabhya sarvasattvāḥ pravṛttipatitā duḥkhitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:560_4: dvividhaṃ duḥkham / chandamūlakaṃ yeṣāṃ [priyāṇāṃ] vastūnāṃ pariṇāmādanyathībhāvād duḥkhamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:560_5: sammohavipākañca duḥkhaṃ yaistīvraiḥ śārīrairveditaiḥ spṛṣṭastasminnātmabhāve ahamiti vā mameti vā sammūḍho 'tyarthaṃ śocati /
SA20bsa034_u:560_7: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:560_16: saptavidhaṃ duḥkham / jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ yadapīcchanparyeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:561_1: navavidhaṃ duḥkham / ātmavipattiduḥkhaṃ paravipattiduḥkhaṃ [jñātivipattiduḥkhaṃ bhogavipattiduḥkham] ārogyavipattiduḥkhaṃ śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭi-[vipattiduḥkhaṃ] dṛṣṭadhārmikaduḥkhaṃ sāmparāyikañca duḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:561_2: daśavidhaṃ duḥkham / bhojanakāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ pānayānavastrālaṅkārabhāṇḍopaṣkarapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ gandhamālyavilepanapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ nṛtyagītavāditrapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkham ālokapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhaṃ strīpuruṣaparicaryākāyapariṣkāravaikalyaduḥkhañca daśamam punaranyaṃ navavidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:561_3: sarvaduḥkhaṃ mahāduḥkhaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ pravṛttiduḥkhamakāmakāraduḥkhaṃ vighātaduḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvākārañca [Dutt_168] duḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:561_5: tatra mahāduḥkhaṃ yaddīrghaṃkālikaṃ pragāḍhaṃ citraṃ nirantarañca /
SA20bsa034_u:561_6: tatra sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yannārakaṃ tairyagyonikaṃ pretalaukikaṃ sugatiparyāpannañca /
SA20bsa034_u:561_7: tatra vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ yad dṛṣṭe vā dharme paravyatikramāt parāpakārakaraṇāllabhate samutthāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:561_9: anayena vātmadṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhopakramāt svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:561_12: tatra pravṛttiduḥkhaṃ yat ṣaḍākārādaniyamādutpadyate saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:562_0: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitāniyamāt mātāpitarau bhūtvā yāvadvistareṇa mitrāmātyajñātisālohito bhūtvā 'pareṇa samayena saṃsarato vadhako bhavati pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:562_1: bhogāniyamācca saṃsāre saṃsaran mahābhogo bhūtvā punarapareṇa samayena paramadaridro bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:563_7: yacca dukhaṃ durbhikṣopaghātādvā paracakropadhātādvā 'ṭavīdurgapraveśasambādha saṃkaṭopaghātādvā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:563_11: tatrānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadaṣṭāsu lokadharmeṣu duḥkhaṃ naśana dharmake naṣṭe kṣayadharmake kṣīṇe jarādharmake jīrṇe vyādhidharmake vyādhite maraṇadharmake mṛte 'lābhato vā punarayaśasto vā nindāto vā yaddaḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:563_14: tatra sarvākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ [Dutt_169] yatpañcākāraṃ yathoddiṣṭasukhavipakṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ sukhābhāvamātraduḥkhaṃ veditayānupacchedaduḥkhaṃ naiṣkramyapravivekopaśamasaṃbodhisukhavipakṣeṇa vāgārikakāmadhātusaṃyogaja-vitarka-pṛthagjanaduḥkhaṃ pañcamaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:563_17: ityetat pañcavidhaṃ pūrvakaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhaṃ dukhaṃ sarvākāramityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:564_0: iti pūrvakañca [pañcapañcāśadākāramidañca] pañcapañcāśadākāramaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ yenālambanena bodhisattvānāṃ karuṇotpadyate vivardhate bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:565_2: sammohavipākaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāsaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhamātyantikaṃ duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ jātiduḥkhaṃ svayaṃkṛtaupakramikaṃ duḥkhaṃ śīlavipattiduḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭivipattiduḥkhaṃ pūrvahetukaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ sugatisaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvavipratipattijaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvapravṛttiduḥkhamajñānaduḥkhamaupacayikaṃ duḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhañceti /
SA20bsa034_u:566_0: tatra caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karuṇā mahākaruṇetyucyate gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durvijñeyaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamālamvyotpannā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:566_2: tīvreṇa cābhogenālambane pravṛttā bhavati yadrūpeṇābhogenāyaṃ karuṇāviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ svajīvitaśatānyapi parityajet prāgevaikaṃ jīvitaṃ prāgeva ca kāyapariṣkāram /
SA20bsa034_u:566_4: suviśuddhā ca bhavati tadyathā niṣṭhāgatānāśca bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiviśuddhyā tathāgatānāñca tathāgatabhūmiviśuddhyā /
SA20bsa034_u:567_0: anena khalu daśottareṇākāraśatena ye bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti sattveṣu te sarvāṃ bodhisattvakaruṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:567_2: sattveṣu cātyarthaṃ snigdhacittāśca bhavanti premacittāśca kartukāmacittāścākhinnacittāśca duḥkhodbahanacittāśca karmaṇyavaśyacittāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:567_3: na ca tathā duḥkhasatyamabhisamitavata āryaśrāvakasya niṣṭhāgatasya dūrībhūtā [Dutt_170] nirvit-sahagatā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate yathā bodhisattvasyura sattveṣu karuṇāpūrvaṅgamena cittena daśottarākāraśatapatitametaṃ mahāntaṃ duḥkhaskandhaṃ saṃpaśyataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:567_4: na ca bodhisattva evaṃ karuṇāparibhāvitamānasaḥ kiñcidādhyātmikabāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajet /
SA20bsa034_u:567_10: tasmāttathāgatāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ-kutra pratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti-samyak vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti karuṇāpratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti /
SA20bsa034_u:568_0: tatraikaikamatra yathānirdiṣṭamapramāṇa[mapramāṇayā] samṛddhyā samṛddhiṃ bodhisattvasya pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:574_0: avadyasamudācāre ātmana evāpratirūpatāṃ viditvā bodhisattvasya lajjā hrīḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:574_2: sā punarllajjā bodhisattvasya prakṛtyaiva tīvrā bhavati prāgevābhyastā /
SA20bsa034_u:575_2: idaṃ prathamamadhiṣṭhānam / tathā bodhisattvākaraṇīyasyānuṣṭhāne yā lajjā /
SA20bsa034_u:575_3: idaṃ dvitīyamadhiṣṭhānam / tathā bodhisattvasyātmanaḥ praticchannapāpatāyāṃ yā lajjā /
SA20bsa034_u:575_4: idaṃ tṛtīyamadhiṣṭhānam / tathā bodhisattvasya kaukṛtye samutpanne sapratisaraṇe ānuṣaṅgike yā lajjā /
SA20bsa034_u:577_0: kliṣṭacittasanniyacchanatā kleśavaśā[na]nuyāyitā duḥkhādhivāsanaśīlatā vicitraprabhūtodriktairapi bhayabhairavairāmukhaiḥ samyak prayogāvikampanatā prakṛtisattvayogāt pratisaṃkhyānādvā dhīratā /
SA20bsa034_u:578_1: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānāṃ dhṛtibalādhānatāyāḥ samāsataḥ pañcavidhamadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:579_0: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairaparikhinnamānasatā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasamyak prayogeṣu veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:579_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:579_2: punaḥ saivākhinnamānasatā 'nena punaḥ punarabhyastā bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:579_3: punarupāyaparigṛhītenavīryāṃrambheṇa prayukto bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣaṃ samanupaśyan na parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:579_4: tīvreṇa ca prajñāpratisaṃkhyānabalena samanvāgato bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:579_5: tīvrañcāsya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇyacittamanukampācittaṃ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:580_1: iha bodhisattvena pañcavidhāsthānānyārabhya nāmakāya-padakāya-vyañjanakāya-pratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ parataḥ sugṛhīto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:580_2: vacasā ca suparicitaḥ / tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthaḥ parato vā suśruto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:580_4: evamapi ca dharmajñenārthajñena bodhisattvena tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthasyāvismaraṇāya prayogo 'nirākṛto bhavatyanyasya cābhinavasyābhinavasyottarottarasya dharmārthaviśeṣasya jñānāya /
SA20bsa034_u:580_5: śrutacintāniṣṭhāgatenāpi cānena kālāntarakṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmindharme cārthe ca pratilabdho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:580_6: ebhirākārairbodhisattvasyāpramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstrajñatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:581_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhyaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti-kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka āpanno yaduta jāyate 'pi jīryate 'pi mriyate 'pi cyavatepyupapadyatepyatha ca punaramī sattvā jarāmaraṇasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ [na] prajānantīti /
SA20bsa034_u:581_3: niṣkaṣāyānutsadakaṣāyakālatāñca yaduta pañcakaṣāyānārabhya āyuṣkaṣāyaṃ [sattvakaṣāyaṃ] kleśakaṣāyaṃ kalpakaṣāyam /
SA20bsa034_u:581_4: tadyathā etarhyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yaściraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam /
SA20bsa034_u:581_5: tadyathaitarhi sattvā yadbhūyasā [a]mātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā na kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyakā nārthakarā na kṛtyakarā na iha loke na paraloke avadye bhayadarśino na dānāni dadati na puṇyāni kurvanti nopavāsamupavasanti na śīlaṃ samādāya vartante /
SA20bsa034_u:581_6: tadyathaitarhi yadbhūyasā 'dharmarāgāśca viṣamalobhāśca śastrādānadaṇḍādānakalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaśāṭhyavañcananikṛtimṛṣāvādamithyādharmasaṃgṛhītā anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prajñāyante /
SA20bsa034_u:581_7: tadyathaitarhi saddharmapralopāya saddharmāntardhānāya saddharmapratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharmārtha-santīraṇāpūrvikāṇi /
SA20bsa034_u:582_1: na tu tathā pūrvamāsīt / evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhya lokajño bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_2: punarbodhisattvo bhājanalokasya saṃvartavivartaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathā bhājanalokaḥ saṃvartate vivartate ca /
SA20bsa034_u:582_3: punarbodhisattvo lokañca [loka]samudayañca lokanirodhañca lokasamudayagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokanirodhagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokasyāsvādamādīnavañca niḥsaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:582_4: punarbodhisattvaḥ cakṣuryāvanmanaḥ arūpiṇaśca skandhāṃścāturmahābhautikañca puruṣasya samucchrayametāvanmanuṣyatvamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:582_5: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvo veti saṃjñāmātramevaitat /
SA20bsa034_u:582_6: tatra yā pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvanmanasā dharmāna vijānāmīti pratijñāmātrameva tat /
SA20bsa034_u:582_7: tatra yo vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evaṃjātīya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīryāyurevaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣparyanta iti vyavahāramātramevaitaditi sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:582_8: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokapravṛttiñca bhājanalokapravṛttiñca aṣṭākāralokopaparīkṣārthañca [lokaparamārthaṃ ca] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:582_9: tasmāllokajñaityucyate / punarbodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇaprativiśiṣṭatarakaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayatyutthāyāsanenopanimantrayati [Dutt_174] abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalisāmīcīkarma pravartayati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_10: tulyaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā samyagālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇairmadhurairvacanapathaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:582_12: hīnaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇādhānamārabhya protsāhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_16: na cainamavamanyate / nāpyarthikaṃ kenaciddharmāmiṣeṇa taṃ jñātvā vimukho bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:582_19: tathā sarveṣāmeva hīnatulyaviśiṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvābhibhāṣī ca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_20: ehi svāgatavādī samyak pratiśāmakaśca samyagdharmāmiṣābhyāṃ yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:582_21: nāpi ca sattveṣu kuṭilagāmbhīryopeto bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacidevocchrayaviśeṣeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:582_22: yathopāttaṃ sattvaṃ sarvopakaraṇairapi nādhyupekṣate glānaṃ vā svasthaṃ vā ānulomikena ca kāyavākkarmaṇā /
SA20bsa034_u:582_23: yathā saṃstutaṃ tathaivāsaṃstutaṃ sarvaṃ mitrasakhā ca bhavati vigatapratyarthikaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:582_24: sarveṣāñcānāthānāmapratisaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ cārthakriyāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:582_25: na ca kenacit paryāyeṇa pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamupasaṃharati kaccideṣāṃ muhūrtamapyasparśavihāro bhavatviti /
SA20bsa034_u:582_26: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā parihasannapi paraiḥ saha yuktaparihāso bhavati nāyuktaparihāsaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:582_27: asatyavacanāni ca na kathayatyapi niratyayaiḥ paramaviśrambhopagatairvayasyakaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:582_29: kroddho 'pi ca pareṣāṃ na marmāṇi kīrtayati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_30: paraiśca kāyena vācā vāhataḥ san pratisaṃkhyāya dharmatāṃ vā pratisarati ātmānameva vā 'parādhikaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_36: dṛṣṭadharmahitārthaṃ vā bhogapratisaṃyuktamārabhya utthānasaṃpanno bhavatyārakṣāsaṃpannaḥ samajīvī /
SA20bsa034_u:582_41: nikṣiptasya viśvāsena paradraviṇasya na drogdhā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_42: upāttasya parata ṛṇasya na visaṃvādayitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_44: ratnaṃ vā ratnasammatamupādāya yāvat kārṣāpaṇe 'pi sammūḍhānāṃ na vipralambhayitā bhavati vipralobhyainām /
SA20bsa034_u:582_46: teṣu ca teṣvarthakaraṇīyeṣu parairāyācitaḥ san sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati na vikampate nānyenānyaṃ pratisarati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_48: rājyaṃ vā punaḥ kārayan dharmeṇa kārayati nāgharmeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:582_49: na ca daṇḍarucirbhavati / dauḥśīlyācca mahājanakāyaṃ vyāvartayitvā śīlesu samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:582_51: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditayā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditayā adṛṣṭe 'dṛṣṭavāditayā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte avijñātavāditayā ityebhirevaṃ bhāgīyairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo yathā loke vijñātavyo yathā loke vartitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tasmāllokajña ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:583_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ arthārthī parato dharmaṃ śruṇoti na vyañjanābhisaṃskārārthī /
SA20bsa034_u:583_2: so 'rthārthī dharmaṃ śuṇvan na vyañjanārthī prākṛtayāpi vācā dharmaṃ deśayamānamarthapratisaraṇo bodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:583_4: prajānan yuktipratiśaraṇo bhavati na sthavireṇābhijñātena vā pudgalena tathāgatena vā [saṃghena vā] ime dharmā bhāṣitā iti pudgalapratisaraṇo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:583_5: sa evaṃ yuktipratisaraṇo na pudgalapratisaraṇastattvārthāt na vicalati /
SA20bsa034_u:583_6: a-parapratyayaśca bhavati dharmeṣu punarbodhisattvastathāgate viviṣṭaśraddho niviṣṭaprasāda ekāntiko vacasyabhiprasannastathāgata-nītārthaṃ sūtraṃ pratisarati na neyārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:583_8: tathāhi neyārthasya sūtrasya nānāmukhaprakṛtārthavibhāgo 'niścitaḥ saṃdehakaro bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:583_9: sacetpunarbodhisattvo nītārthe 'pi sūtre 'naikāntikaḥ syādevamasau saṃhāryaḥ syādasmāddharmavinayāt /
SA20bsa034_u:583_11: sa yadbhāvanāmayena jñānena jñātavyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ śrutacintāvijñānamātrakeṇa vijñātumiti [Dutt_176] viditvā paramagambhīrānapi tathāgatabhāṣitāndharmān śrutvā na pratikṣipati nāpavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:583_14: tatraiṣu caturṣu pratisaraṇeṣu samāsataścaturṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃprakāśitam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_1: yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvaparyāyeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_2: iyameṣāṃ dharmapratisaṃvit / yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvalakṣaṇeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_3: iyameṣāmarthapratisaṃvit / yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvanirvacaneṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_5: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvaprakārapadaprabhedeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_7: etāścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityo 'prameyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:584_9: ebhiścaturbhirākāraiḥ / sarvadharmā bodhisattvena svayañca svabhisaṃbuddhā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:584_10: pareṣāñca suprakāśitāḥ / ata uttari svayamabhisaṃbodho nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ pareṣāṃ prakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:585_3: tadyathā svaparārthapaṭale / sa punaḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvasya prathame kalpāsaṃkhyeye mṛdurveditavyo dvitīye madhyastṛtīye 'dhimātro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:586_0: kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yogaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:586_1: iha bodhisattvaścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityopāya-parigṛhītena jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāndharmānyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:586_2: na caitān sākṣātkaroti / sa [Dutt_177] dvividhenāpi yānanayena tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti śrāvakayānanayena ca mahāyānanayena ca /
SA20bsa034_u:586_4: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:586_7: iha bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśī viharan naiva kāyaṃ kāyabhāvato vikalpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:586_12: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ evamavaśiṣṭāni smṛtyupasthānāni aviśiṣṭāśca bodhipakṣyā dharmā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:586_13: sa naiva kāyādīndharmān duḥkhato vā vikalpayati samudayato vā /
SA20bsa034_u:586_16: nirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatayā ca duḥkhadharmatāṃ samudayadharmatāṃ nirodhadharmatāṃ mārgadharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:587_0: tatra yā bodhisattvasyaiṣā dharmāṇāmevamavikalpanā so 'sya śamatho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:587_1: yacca tadyathābhūtajñānaṃ pāramārthikaṃ yacca tadapramāṇa-vyavasthānanayajñānaṃ dharmeṣu iyamasya vipaśyanā draṣṭavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:588_1: pāramārthikasāṅketika-jñānapūrvaṅgamaḥ pāramārthikasāṃketika-jñānaphalaṃ sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāsu anābhogavāhanaḥ tasmiṃśca nirabhilāpye vastumātrai nirnimittatayā ca nirvikalpacittāśāntyā sarvadharmasamataikarasagāmī /
SA20bsa034_u:589_1: etaccaturākāra-śamathapūrvaṅgamā sarvadharmeṣu samāropāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apavādāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apramāṇadharmaprabhedavyavasthāna-nayānugatā ca vipaśyanā /
SA20bsa034_u:591_1: yā bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāsahagatā apekṣā yacca sarvasaṃskāreṣu yathābhūtasarvaparijñānaṃ yā cānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhijñāne spṛhā /
SA20bsa034_u:591_2: yacca sattvāpekṣāṃ niśritya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ yā ca saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśrityāsaṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtī /
SA20bsa034_u:593_0: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
SA20bsa034_u:593_1: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate 'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃmbodhau pariṇāmayati /
SA20bsa034_u:593_2: evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto 'pi kṣetrato 'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati
SA20bsa034_u:594_0: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati /
SA20bsa034_u:594_4: tathā ātmaklamathayogamanuyuktānāṃ mokṣakāmānāṃ mithyāprayuktānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] [Dutt_179] madhyamāṃ pratipadamantadvayavigatāṃ vyapadiśati tasyāṃ cāvatārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:594_5: tathā svargakāmānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mithyāprayuktānāmagnipraveśātaṭaprapātā 'naśanasthānādibhiḥ samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena svargopapattaye vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:594_7: punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti tīvraṃ ca prasādam /
SA20bsa034_u:594_8: tadekakṣaṇikamapi saṃvegaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ vipula[kuśamūla]saṃgrahe saṃkhyāṃ gacchati prāgeva prābandhikam /
SA20bsa034_u:594_9: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni taiḥ prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena buddhadharmasaṃgha[tri]ratnapūjāmadhimucyate parāṃścādhimocayati daśasu dikṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:594_10: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:594_11: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim /
SA20bsa034_u:594_12: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:594_16: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:594_18: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:594_19: punaḥ prabhūtairvicitraiśca nirmāṇaiḥ sarvadikṣu buddhadharmasaṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānañcāprameyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśiprāptaḥ puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:594_22: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo 'lpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyaprameyaphalāni kuśalamūlānyabhinirharati samudānayati /
SA20bsa034_u:595_1: madhyasthāṃścāvatārayati / avatīrṇāṃśca paripācayati / parikvāṃśca vimocayati / [Dutt_180] atrāpi bodhisattvasya caturvidhasyāpyasya sattvārthasyābhiniṣpattaye samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidha evopāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:595_2: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:596_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ ślakṣṇairmadhuraiḥ kāyavāksamudācārairupapradānānuvṛttisamudācāraiścātmagataṃ teṣāṃ pratighātamapanayati /
SA20bsa034_u:596_5: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:596_6: vimardasahiṣṇuśca bhavati / sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:596_7: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā 'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati /
SA20bsa034_u:596_8: saṃkṣiptānāñcārthopasaṃhitānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pravistaraṇatayā ativistṛtānāṃ cābhisaṃkṣepaṇatayā tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā sarvālambanasamādhyavatāramukheṣucānulomikyā avavādānusāsanyā sattvānanugṛhṇāti sattvānāmarthamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:596_9: ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā kāśasamatāṃ māyāsvapnopamatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti teṣāṃ yathāvadarthamavijñāyotrastamānasāḥ tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti /
SA20bsa034_u:596_10: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati /
SA20bsa034_u:597_0: tāṃśca sattvān grāhayati / evañca punaranulomayati / yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_1: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:597_2: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te 'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa [Dutt_181] sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_3: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_4: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_5: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_7: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_8: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_9: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_10: yadā ca punarbodhisattvairjñānenāryeṇa te 'bhilāpasamutthitā mithyāsaṃjñāvikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ tenāryajñānena tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastu sarvābhilāpyasvabhāvābhāvamātramākāśopamaṃ pariśuddhaṃ khyāti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_11: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_13: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_14: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam /
SA20bsa034_u:597_15: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:597_16: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā /
SA20bsa034_u:597_17: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat /
SA20bsa034_u:597_18: tasmānmāyopamā ityucyante / evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:597_20: tathaiva ca saṃprakāśayati / ayaṃ bodhisattvasyānulomika upāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:598_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:598_1: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:598_2: anyathā na dāsyāmīti / tathā kṣetravastugṛhavastvāpaṇavastu-rājyavastu-deśavastu-dhanavastu-dhānyavastu arthikānāṃ [Dutt_182] tathā śilpakarmasthānavidyārthikānāṃ tathā tena saha sakhyārthikānāmāvāhavivāhārthikānāmābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇārthikānāṃ kṛtyasahāyārthikānāñca sattvānāṃ kāryavipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:598_3: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:598_4: punarbodhisattvaḥ aparādhiṣu duṣiṣvapakāriṣu sattveṣu parairvadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanapravāsanāyopātteṣvādhamanabandhana-vikrayāya copātteṣu vipratibandhe nāvatiṣṭhate śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:598_5: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:598_7: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato 'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:598_9: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:598_11: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:598_12: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:599_0: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ tāni vastūni nānuprayacchati hitakāmatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:599_1: na cādātukāmāśayo bhavati / vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:599_3: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:599_4: ye ca sattvā nāpyarthino [Dutt_183] bodhisattvasya nāpi ca vyasanasthā nāpi vistareṇa yāvadvyādhitāste cāsya saṃstutāḥ sapraṇayāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:599_5: tānapi bodhisattvastasminneva kuśala-[mūle] samādāpayati yaduta mātṛjñatāyāṃ vistareṇa yāvacchīlasamādānānuvartanāyām /
SA20bsa034_u:599_6: ta evaṃ bodhisattvena samādāpyamānāḥ sa cedvikampanena [na] pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kupitamapyātmānamupadarśayati hitakāmatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:599_12: visabhāgo 'sya bodhisattvasya teṣu [sattveṣu] tasyāśceṣṭāyāḥ sa āśayo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:599_13: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:600_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:600_2: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā 'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya vartiṣyate tasyāhamucitaṃ vā bhaktācchādanaṃ samucchetsyāmi vārayiṣyāmi vā tāḍayiṣyāmi vā sarvasvena vā viyojayiṣyāmi sarveṇa vā sarva vijitāt pravāsayiṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:600_3: tatra ca karmaṇi kuśalān dakṣān pauruṣeyānviniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:600_4: te ca sattvāstasmānmahato daṇḍakarmaṇo bhītāḥ pāpañca prajahati kuśalañca samādāya vartante /
SA20bsa034_u:600_5: akāmakā api tena balāvaṣṭambhena kuśale sanniyojyante te sattvā anenopāyena /
SA20bsa034_u:601_1: saha bodhisattvena yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvamevopakāraḥ parīttaḥ prabhūto vā kṛto bhavati dānena vā vyasanaparitrāṇatayā [Dutt_184] vā bhayaparitrāṇatayā vā priyāpriyasaṃyogavisayogopasaṃharaṇatayā vā vyādhisaśamanatayā vā teṣāṃ kṛtajñānāṃ kṛtavedināṃ pratyupakāra-kāmānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ kuśalasamādānameva pratikārato yācate saṃpratīcchati /
SA20bsa034_u:601_2: na kiñcidanyallokāmiṣam / evaṃ cāha / ayameva me bhavatāmantikānmahāpratyupakāro bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:601_3: sa cedyūyameva mātṛjñā bhavatha pitṛjñā vistareṇa yāvacchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ kuśalasamādānaṃ parataḥ pratyāsaṃśate tena copāyena parāṃstatra kuśale samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:602_1: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bodhisattvabhūmi-sthito bodhisattvaḥ suviśodhitabodhisattvamārgastuṣite devanikāye upapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:602_3: sa na cirasyedānīṃ jambūdvīpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
SA20bsa034_u:602_6: punarbodhisattvastuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā ucce vā sammate vā kule upapadyate yaduta rājakule vā purohitakule vā /
SA20bsa034_u:602_14: nāvaramātrakametaddharmākhyānaṃ bhavati yatredānīṃ brahmā [svayaṃ] dharmadeśanāyai bhagavantamadhyeṣata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:602_17: paravyāpāritena na tu svena sattveṣu kāruṇyacittena nātmana eva pratirupatāṃ viditveti /
SA20bsa034_u:602_20: tathā dharmaṃ deśayati / śikṣāpadāni ca prajñapayati /
SA20bsa034_u:602_22: yasmādupāyādanya upāya uttari atikrāntataraśca praṇītataraśca nāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:603_1: itīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsavyāsanirdeśataḥ pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāya nayanāya madhyasthānāmavatārāyāvatīrṇānāṃ paripākāya paripakkānāṃ vimocanāya /
SA20bsa034_u:604_2: dharmadhāraṇī / arthadhāraṇī / mantradhāraṇī / bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya ca dhāraṇī /
SA20bsa034_u:605_0: tatra dharmādhāraṇī katamā / iha bodhisattvastadrūpāṃ smṛtiprajñābalādhānatāṃ pratilabhate yathā śrutamātrakeṇaivānāmnātān vacasā 'paricitān nāmapadavyañjanakāyasaṃgṛhītānanupūrvacaritānanupūrvasamāyuktān pramāṇān granthānapramāṇaṃ kālaṃ dhārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:606_0: tatrārthadhāraṇī katamā / pūrvavat / tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmapramāṇamarthamanāmnātamaparicitaṃ manasā 'pramāṇaṃ kālaṃ dhārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:607_0: tatra mantradhāraṇī katamā / iha bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ samādhivaśitāṃ pratilabhate yathā yāni mantrapadānīti saṃśamanāya sattvānāmadhitiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:608_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pragāḍhahetucaritaḥ prajñāvān praviviktavihārī vācamapyanudīrayan darśanapathamapyanāgacchan kenacit saha tathā mātrābhojī asaṃkīrṇabhojī ekaprakārāśanabhojī pradhyānaparataḥ alpaṃ rātrau svapan bahu jāgran yānīmāni tathāgatabhāṣitāni bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya mantrapadāni tadyathā iṭi miṭi kiṭibhiḥ kṣāntipadāni svāhā /
SA20bsa034_u:608_3: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmevaṃ samyak pratipanna evamarthaṃ svayamevāśrutvā kutaścit pratividhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:608_4: tad yathā nāstyeṣāṃ mantrapadānāṃ kācidarthapariniṣpattiḥ nirarthā evaite /
SA20bsa034_u:608_7: iyatā tena teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaḥ supratividdho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:608_8: sa [Dutt_186] teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaṃ samyak pratividhya tenaivārthānusāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmatyarthaṃ samyak pratividhyati svayamevāśrutvā parataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:608_12: sa evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvārthaṃ samyak pratividhya tasmātparamarthaṃ na samanveṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:608_14: tena bodhisattvena pratilabdhā tāni dhāraṇīpadānyadhiṣṭhāya bodhisattvakṣāntirvaktavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:608_15: tasyāśca lābhāt sa bodhisattvo na cirasyedānīmadhyāśayaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:609_0: tatra dharmadhāraṇīmarthadhāraṇīñca bodhisattvaḥ prathamasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayācchuddhādhyāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo labhate niyatāṃ sthirāmudārāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:609_1: tataḥ punararvāg labhate praṇidhānavaśena vā dhyānasanniśrayeṇa vā natu niyatāṃ na sthirāṃ nodārām /
SA20bsa034_u:609_3: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya tu dhāraṇī yathaiva vyākhyātā tathaiva labhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:610_0: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:610_3: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā
SA20bsa034_u:615_0: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:616_1: tat punardaśaviṃdham / āyatyāṃ sarvākārāprameya-tathāgata-pūjopasthānatāyai prathamaṃ praṇidhāna bodhisattvasya mahāpraṇidhānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:616_2: buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ saddharma-parigrahārakṣaṇatāyai dharmanetrīsandhāraṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
SA20bsa034_u:617_1: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:618_1: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu mithyāvikalpasamutthāpitena kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:619_0: animittaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ / iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:619_3: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca /
SA20bsa034_u:619_4: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:619_7: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:619_10: evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:619_12: tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:620_0: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:620_1: katamāni catvāri / anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti dharmoddānam /
SA20bsa034_u:620_5: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:621_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_2: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_5: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_9: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:621_13: tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ [Dutt_189] paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:621_14: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_16: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo 'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_18: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_19: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:621_21: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:622_0: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa[svabhāva]syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya saṃskārāṇāṃ samāsato dvayāvasthā-prabhāvitāni /
SA20bsa034_u:622_2: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:622_4: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:622_5: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:622_7: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /
SA20bsa034_u:622_8: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:622_10: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:622_12: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:622_13: tathaiva so 'pyutpadyeta / evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:622_16: [Dutt_190] atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:622_18: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:622_19: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /
SA20bsa034_u:622_20: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:622_21: evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:622_22: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:622_23: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:622_24: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:622_25: ato viparyayeṇa tu yujyate / ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:623_0: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ sanniśrayabhāvena paśyati saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:623_1: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:624_0: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:624_2: tatredaṃ pudgalanairātmyam / yannaivate vidyamānā dharmāḥ pudgalāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:624_4: tatredaṃ dharmanairātmyam / yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:624_5: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:625_1: idamucyate nirvāṇam / tacca śāntaṃ kleśopaśamāt duḥkhopaśamācca veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:625_2: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:625_4: na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ [Dutt_191] pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:625_6: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:625_7: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:625_8: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /
SA20bsa034_u:625_10: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:625_11: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:625_12: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet /
SA20bsa034_u:625_13: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /
SA20bsa034_u:625_14: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake adhimokṣaḥ pravṛtta iti /
SA20bsa034_u:625_16: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:625_17: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /
SA20bsa034_u:625_18: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:625_20: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:625_23: asti pratibhāsamātrakam / te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa [Dutt_192] ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya /
SA20bsa034_u:625_24: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet /
SA20bsa034_u:625_25: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:625_26: teṣveva sāradarśī bhavet / atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /
SA20bsa034_u:625_27: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam /
SA20bsa034_u:625_28: sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /
SA20bsa034_u:625_29: evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāśca veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:625_30: ye vyādhitapuruṣā eva kleśagrastā mahāvaidyasya tathāgatasyottarāduttaratarāmuttamatamāmuttānāduttānatarāṃ gambhīrād gambhīratarāṃ gambhīratamāṃ hīnādudārāmudāratarāmudāratamāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
SA20bsa034_u:625_31: tatra śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvako vā na kasmiṃścittathāgatabhāṣite vimatisandehamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:625_32: sa punaḥ sarvāṅgapariṣkārasusamāyuktamivājanyarathaṃ taṃ tathāgatabhāṣitaṃ dharmarathamabhirūhya kuśala iva sārathiryāvatī tena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghuladhveva gantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:630_0: pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:630_5: acintyaprabhāvatā ca / ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:631_0: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:631_1: katamāni pañca / yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:631_2: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:631_3: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:631_5: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:631_7: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /
SA20bsa034_u:631_8: na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:631_10: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:631_11: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:632_3: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:632_5: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:632_6: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:632_7: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu pratītyasamutpanneṣu ca [sarva]saṃskāreṣu sattvasaṃjñeti viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu samacitto viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:632_9: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:634_0: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:634_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ / ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:634_2: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:634_3: tathāgatān pūjayanti / tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:635_1: katamāni pañca / buddhotpādārāgaṇatā / teṣāmeva ca buddhānāmantikāt ṣaṭe pāramitā-bodhisattvapiṭakaśravaṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:636_2: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ / iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:636_4: aviparyastabuddhirbhavati / iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:639_0: pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:640_0: tatra bodhisattvo 'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:640_1: smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:640_6: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:640_9: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:641_1: katame pañca / agauravatā dharme dharmabhāṇake ca /
SA20bsa034_u:641_3: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:642_2: te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:643_1: katame pañca / raudraduḥśīleṣu sattveṣu tato nidānamapakārakriyā /
SA20bsa034_u:644_1: katame pañca / raudraduḥśīleṣu sattveṣu viśeṣeṇa kāruṇyacittatā /
SA20bsa034_u:644_4: paṇḍitasaṃkhyāgamanatā ca / anavadyasya ca dānādikasya kuśalasya kriyā /
SA20bsa034_u:644_5: saddharmasya ca prakāśanā saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca pratikṣepaṇatā /
SA20bsa034_u:645_0: daśasu sthāneṣu samāsato bodhisattvā vineyān sattvān samyageva vinayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:648_1: katamaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ / gotrasthamanutpāditacittam / tathotpāditaṃ cittam sammukhāvasthitam /
SA20bsa034_u:648_2: viparokṣāvasthitam / parimitaṃ kālamiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyata iti /
SA20bsa034_u:648_3: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:649_2: katame trayaḥ / gotrastha eva bodhisattvo niyatipatita ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:649_3: tatkasya hetoḥ / bhavyo 'sau pratyayānāsādya niyatamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:649_4: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:649_5: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:649_8: tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:650_0: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:652_0: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:652_3: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam /
SA20bsa034_u:654_0: prajñapteḥ syādvyavasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmeṣaṇā tathā / yathābhūtaparijñānamaprameyāstathaiva ca //
SA20bsa034_u:655_0: catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:655_1: na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā /
SA20bsa034_u:655_2: katamāni catvāri / dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ satyaprajñaptivyavattthānaṃ yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ yānaprajñaptivyavasthānañca /
SA20bsa034_u:656_0: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:657_3: trividhaṃ satyam / lakṣaṇasatyaṃ vāksatyaṃ kriyāsatyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:657_5: pañcavidhaṃ [satyam /] hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:657_6: ṣaḍvidhaṃ [satyam] / satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:657_7: saptavidhaṃ satyam / āsvādasatyaṃ ādīnavasatyaṃ niḥsaraṇasatyaṃ dharmatāsatyaṃ adhimuktisatyaṃ āryāṇāṃ satyaṃ anāryāṇāṃ satyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:657_8: aṣṭavidhaṃ [satyaṃ] / saṃskāraduḥkhatāsatyaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ pravṛttisatyaṃ nivṛtisatyaṃ saṃkleśasatyaṃ vyavadānasatyaṃ samyakprayogasatyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:657_9: navavidhaṃ [satyam] / anityasatyaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyatāsatyaṃ nairātmyasatyaṃ [bhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ] [Dutt_199] vibhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ tatprahāṇopāyasatyaṃ sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ [ca] /
SA20bsa034_u:657_10: daśavidhaṃ satyam / aupakramikaduḥkhasatyaṃ bhogavaikalyaduḥkhasatyaṃ dhāturvaiṣamyaduḥkhasatyaṃ priyavipariṇāmaduḥkhasatyaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhasatyaṃ karmasatyaṃ kleśasatyaṃ tathā śravaṇayoniśomanaskārasatyaṃ samyakdṛṣṭisatyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiphalasatyaṃ ceti /
SA20bsa034_u:658_0: catasro yuktayo yuktiprajñaptivyavasthānamityucyate / tāsāṃ punaḥ pravibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:659_2: caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ sākalyena veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:659_4: nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā nirvikalpasamatā niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yatphalam /
SA20bsa034_u:659_6: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ samyakprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā punaḥ sarve ta ebhiścatubhirvastubhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:660_1: katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇā / vastuparyeṣaṇā / svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā / viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:660_2: eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:661_1: katamāni catvāri / nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:662_5: daśasu dikṣuprameyā aprameyanāmalokadhātavastadyathā iyaṃ sahā nāma lokadhāturyasya nāmnā brahmā sahāṃpatirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:662_7: syādekavidho vineyaḥ sarvasattvā vineyā iti kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:662_11: pañcavidhaḥ / rāgacarito dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:662_12: ṣaḍvidhaḥ / gṛhī pravrajitaḥ aparipakvaḥ paripakvo ['vimuktaśca] vimuktaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:662_13: saptavidhaḥ / pratihato madhyasthaḥ vipañcitajñaḥ uddhaṭitajñaḥ tadātvavineyaḥ āpattivineyaḥ pratyayahāryaścavineyo yādṛśān pratyayān labhate tathā tathā pariṇamati /
SA20bsa034_u:662_14: aṣṭavidhaḥ / aṣṭau pariṣadaḥ / kṣatriyapariṣadamādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadbrahmapariṣat /
SA20bsa034_u:662_15: navavidhaḥ / tathāgatavineyaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavineyaḥ bodhisattvavineyaḥ kṛcchrasādhyaḥ [akṛcchrasādhyaḥ] ślakṣṇasādhyaḥ avasādanā-sādhyaḥ dūre vineyaḥ antike ca vineyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:662_16: daśavidhaḥ / nārakaḥ tairyakyonikaḥ yāmalaukikaḥ kāmāvacaro divyamānuṣyakaḥ āntarābhavikaḥ rūpī arūpī sajñī asaṃjñī naivasajñīnāsaṃjñī ca /
SA20bsa034_u:662_19: tatra [Dutt_201] sattvadhātu vineyadhātvoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam sattvadhāturaviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvā gotrasthāścāgotrasthāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:662_20: ye purnagotrasthā eva tāsu tāṣvavasthāsu vartante /
SA20bsa034_u:662_21: sa vineyadhāturityucyate / vineyopāyaḥ punaḥ pūrvavadyathā nirdiṣṭo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:663_1: tatkasya hetoḥ / iha bodhisattvo yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthe prayujyate sa prathamo 'prameyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:663_3: sa dvitīyo 'prameyaḥ tānpunaḥ sattvāṃsteṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu yairdharmaiḥ saṃkliśyamānāṃśca viśudhyamānāṃścopalabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:663_4: sa tṛtīyo 'prameyaḥ / tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:663_5: sa caturtho 'prameyaḥ / yaścopāyasteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ vimokṣāya sa pañcamoprameyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:664_0: pañceme buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:664_1: katame pañca / tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ tasminneva saddharme deśyamāne virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūtpādayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:664_2: tadekatyāḥ sattvā deśyamāna eva saddharmataḥ āsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:664_5: śrutamātra eva tasminsaddharme deśitaśca saddharmo buddhairbodhisattvaiśca uddeśasvādhyāyasaṃpratipattipāraṃparyayogena saddharmanetryāścirasthitikatāyai saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:664_6: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:665_0: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:665_1: katamāni sapta / dharmamahattvam / tadyathā dvādaśāṅgādvacogatād bodhisattvapiṭakavaipulyam /
SA20bsa034_u:665_3: adhimuktimahattvam / tadyathaikatyaḥ tasminneva ca dharmamahattve 'dhimukto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:665_5: sambhāramahattvam / yasya puṇyasambhārasya jñānasambhārasya samudāgamādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:665_10: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya /
SA20bsa034_u:666_0: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:666_1: bodhisattvapiṭakadeśanā / tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:666_2: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:666_8: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
SA20bsa034_u:667_0: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:667_2: gotrasthaḥ / avatīrṇaḥ / aśuddhāśayaḥ / śuddhāśayaḥ / aparipakvaḥ / paripakvaḥ / aniyatipatitaḥ / niyatipatitaḥ / ekajātipratibaddhaḥ / caramabhavikaśceti / tatra gotrastho bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaścittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:667_3: so 'vatīrṇa ityucyate / sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:667_5: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:667_7: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau [Dutt_203] vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaniyata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:667_8: praviṣṭastu niyato bhavati / sa eva punaḥ paripakvau dvividhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:667_11: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:667_12: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:667_13: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:668_0: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:668_1: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
SA20bsa034_u:668_2: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:668_3: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:668_4: no tu bhūtāḥ / bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:674_0: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:674_1: katamāni pañca / anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:674_2: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:675_3: pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:675_4: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:675_6: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:675_9: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:676_1: katamāni pañca / duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:676_2: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate /
SA20bsa034_u:676_4: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritamadhyācaranti /
SA20bsa034_u:676_7: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:676_8: ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:676_9: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:676_10: ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:676_11: ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak prayuktāḥ pṛthagjanā kalyāṇakā ye ca śaikṣāḥ etāvadanukampādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yenādhiṣṭhānena yenālambanenānukampā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:677_1: katamāni pañca / samyagālapanā samyagānandanā samyagāśvāsanā samyakpravāraṇā nyāyopadeśaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:678_1: katamāni pañca / yaireva pañcabhirākārairbodhipakṣapaṭale dhṛtibalādhānatā bodhisattvānāmuktā tānyeva bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni ve ditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:679_2: katamāni pañca / abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:680_1: katamāni pañca / ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntāḥ gambhīrāgambhīrāvabhāṣāḥ śūnyatā-pratisaṃyuktā idaṃpratyayatā /
SA20bsa034_u:680_2: pratītyasamutpādānulomāḥ / idaṃ prathamamadhiṣṭhānam / vinaye vā punarāpattikauśalyamāpattivyutthāna-kauśalyaṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:680_3: idaṃ dvitīyamadhiṣṭhānam / mātṛkāyāṃ vā punaraviparītaṃ dharmalakṣaṇavyavasthānam /
SA20bsa034_u:680_6: idaṃ pañcamamadhiṣṭhānam / yenādhiṣṭhānena yenālambanena bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:681_0: anukampā bodhisattvasya sattveṣvādita eva tāvadvairaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:681_3: anukampā tad-bahulavihāritā cāsyānavadyadṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya parānugrahāya ca saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:681_4: ye ca bhagavatā maitryā anuśaṃsā uktānāsya kāye viṣaṃ krāmati na śasramityevamādayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:682_0: priyavādī bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme caturvidhaṃ vāgdoṣaṃ vijahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśūnyaṃ ṣāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpañca /
SA20bsa034_u:682_1: sā cāsya bāgātmānugrahāya parānugrahāya ca pravṛttā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:682_2: dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme āyatyāṃ ca priyavādī bodhisattvaḥ ādeyavacano bhavati grāhyavacanaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:683_0: dhīro bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe [tāvata] dharme sarveṇa sarvamālasyakausīdyāpagato bhavati pramuditacittaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:683_4: āyatyāṃ ca sarvabodhisattvakṛtyasamārambheṣu prakṛtyā dṛḍhasamāraṃbho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:683_5: nākṛtvā vinivartate / itīme bodhisattvānāṃ vairyaphalānuśaṃsā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:685_0: kaścaiṣāmanukramaḥ / pūrvaṃ tāvadbodhisattvo 'nukampayā sattvānanugṛhṇāti teṣu ca sāpekṣo bhavatyarthakāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:685_1: tataścākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya yuktiṃ bhāṣate grāhayati vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:685_2: evamavatīrṇeṣu ca sattveṣu sattvavipratipattiṣu [ca] kleśaviprakṛtāsvarthavidhāsu vimardasaho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:685_4: sa evaṃ dhīraḥ ekatyānsattvānāmiṣasaṃgraheṇa paripācayati ekatyāndharmasaṃgraheṇa tadekatyāṃstadubhābhyāṃ dharmābhiṣasaṃgrahābhyām /
SA20bsa034_u:686_1: āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ katamayā pāramitayā katamadbodhisattvaliṅgaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:686_4: vairyaṃ vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:686_6: gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā evamimāni [pañca bodhi]sattvaliṅgāni pañcaparivartena veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:690_0: sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanaṃ ca paścimam /
SA20bsa034_u:691_0: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:691_1: yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:691_2: katame catvāraḥ / sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:692_1: yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:692_2: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:692_3: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā 'vaśyaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:692_4: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā 'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:692_5: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nipuṇakārī bhavati yadut dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:692_6: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:692_7: nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam /
SA20bsa034_u:692_8: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:692_9: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:692_10: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ anavadyakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:692_11: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:692_12: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:692_13: yathā dāne evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsu [Dutt_212] yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:692_14: eta eva catvāra ākārā niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:693_1: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam /
SA20bsa034_u:693_6: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:693_7: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:693_14: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:694_1: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:695_2: iha bodhisattvo yatkiñcidebhistribhirmukhairupacitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sukṛtakarmāntatayā kauśalyena parānugraheṇa ca tatsarvamatītānāgatapratyutpannamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ghanarasena prasādena pariṇāmayati /
SA20bsa034_u:695_3: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya[trā]nuttarāmeva samyaksaṃbodhim /
SA20bsa034_u:695_4: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:695_5: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:695_6: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto 'bhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve te ebhireva caturbhirdharmaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:695_7: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:695_8: api tu gṛhiṇo bodhisattvasyāntikātpravrajitasya bodhisattvasya sumahān viśeṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:695_10: tathāhi pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavatyādita eva tāvanmātāpitṛputtadārādikalatraparigrahadoṣāt /
SA20bsa034_u:695_12: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavati tasyaiva parigrahasyārthe kṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi-parikleśe vyāsaṅgaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:695_14: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattva ekāntasaṅkalīkṛtaṃ brahmacaryaṃ śaknoti carituṃ [na tu] gṛhī bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:695_15: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:695_16: yadyadeva kuśalamārabhate tatra tatraiva laghuladhveva niṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:695_18: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vrataniyame sthitatvād ādeyavacano bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:700_0: saptākāraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu vātsalyaṃ pravartate yena vātsalyenopetā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:700_4: ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca /
SA20bsa034_u:700_5: na ca punarbodhisattvasya sattveṣu yogarahitaṃ vātsalyaṃ pravartate tadyathā adharme 'vinaye 'satyasamudācāre asthāne samādāpanatāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:700_6: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:700_7: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:700_8: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:700_9: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam /
SA20bsa034_u:700_10: tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:700_12: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:700_13: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:701_1: tatra śraddhāpūrvaṃko dharmavicayapūrvakaśca buddhadharmeṣu yo 'dhimokṣaḥ pratyavagamo niścayo bodhisattvasya so 'dhyāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_2: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:701_3: katame pañcadaśa / agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ nigṛhītāśayaḥ sahajaścāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:701_4: tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so 'gryāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_7: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_8: buddhabodhisattvānāmacintye 'bhijñāprabhāve sahaje vā prabhāve yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ prabhāvāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_11: sattveṣveva nirāmiṣacittatā iṣṭe ca vipāke niṣpratibaddhacittatā vinirmuktāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_12: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yā citaikāntikatāyaṃ dṛḍhāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:701_17: tatra yo hi [a]śuddhāśayaḥ sa eva nigṛhī[tāśaya] ityucyate pratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:701_18: yaḥ punaḥ śuddhaḥ suśuddhaścādhyāśayaḥ sa sahajo 'dhyāśaya ityucyate prakṛtyā tanmayatayā āśrayasusaṃniviṣṭatayā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:702_0: ityebhirbodhisattvāḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayaiḥ sarvabhūmigataiḥ samāsato daśakṛtyāni kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:702_1: katamāni daśa / agryāśayena ratnapūjāṃ sarvākārāṃ prayojayanti sarvabodhisambhārāṇāmagryabhūtām /
SA20bsa034_u:702_4: pāramitāśayena kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāsātatyakriyayā 'pramādavihāriṇo bhavanti paramāpramādavihāriṇaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:702_7: prabhāvādhyāśayena ghanarasaṃ ca śāsane prasādaṃ pravedayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:702_8: bhāvanāyāṃ ca sārasaṃjñinaḥ spṛhājātā bahulaṃ viharanti /
SA20bsa034_u:702_10: hitāśayena sukhāśayena vinirmuktāśayena ca sarvākarāsu sattvārthakriyāsu prayujyante /
SA20bsa034_u:702_13: na śithilaprayogāḥ / na chidraprayogāḥ / avisaṃvādanādhyāśayena kṣiprābhijñā bhavanti teṣu teṣu kuśaladharmābhinirhāreṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:702_16: sahajena punaradhyāśayena kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:702_17: tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ prajñaptāḥ prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:702_18: tasmādatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto 'bhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve ta ebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:702_19: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / evamete pañcadaśa bodhisattvādhyāśayā mahāphalānuśaṃsāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:707_0: evaṃ gotrasaṃpadamupādāya yathoktāyāṃ bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ yathokteṣu ca bodhisattvaliṅgeṣu saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ bodhisattvapakṣyaprayogeṣu ca samyak prayuktānāṃ bodhisattvādhyāśayāñca yathoktāṃ viśodhayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dvādaśabodhisattvavihārā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:707_2: trayodaśaśca tathāgato vihāro yo 'sya bhavatyabhisaṃbodherniruttaro vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:707_4: [gotravihāraḥ /] adhimukticaryāvihāraḥ / pramuditavihāraḥ / adhiśīlavihāraḥ / adhicittavihāraḥ / adhiprajñavihārāstrayaḥ / bodhipakṣyapratisaṃyuktaḥ / satyapratisaṃyuktaḥ / pratītyasamutpādapravṛttinivṛttipratisaṃyuktaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:707_5: iti yena [ca] bodhisattvastattvaṃ paśyati yañca tattvaṃ paśyati tasya ca tattvasyājñānād yathā pravṛttirduḥkhasya jñānācca punarapravṛttirduḥkhasya bhavati sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:707_6: tadetadbodhisattvasya tribhirmukhaiḥ prajñayā vyavacārayataḥ trayoradhiprajñavihārā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:707_12: tāthāgataḥ [Dutt_218] punarvihāro yaḥ sarvabodhisattvavihārasamatikrāntasyābhisaṃbuddhabodhervihāraḥ tatra tathāgatasya paścimasya vihārasya pratiṣṭhāyogasthāne paścime sākalyena nirdeśo bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:708_0: dvādaśānāṃ punarbodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ yathā vyavasthānaṃ bhavati tathā nirdekṣāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:709_2: iha bodhisattvo gotravihārī prakṛtibhadrasantānatayā prakṛtyā bodhisattvaguṇairbodhisattvārhaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:709_3: tatsamudācāre saṃdṛśyate / prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate /
SA20bsa034_u:709_4: api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:709_5: sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:710_1: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:710_2: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:710_3: no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:710_5: adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti [Dutt_219] no tu pratilabdhā na viśodhitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:710_12: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvatparamaḥ paraniṣpanno bodhisattvavihāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:710_13: parame pariniṣpanne bodhisattvavihāre pariśuddhe 'nantaraṃ pūrvārabdhasya tātathāgatasya vihārasya sakṛtpratilambho viśuddhiśca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:711_7: yo laukikaṃ jñānaviśuddhisanniśrayabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ niśrṛtya satyāvabodhāya samyak smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravicayavihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:713_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:713_1: yastameva trividhamapyadhiprajñavihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā 'bhisaṃskāreṇābhogena niśchidranirantaraḥ sarvadharmeṣu tathatā-nirvikalpaprajñābhāvanā sahagato vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:714_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:714_1: [Dutt_220] yastasyaiva pūrvakasya nirnimittasya vihārasya bhāvanā-bāhulyāt svarasenaiva niśchidranirantara-vāhirmārgānugato vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:715_1: yastameva supariśuddhaṃ niścalaṃ prajñāsamādhiṃ niśritya mahāmativaipulyamanuprāptasya pareṣāṃ dharmasamākhyānānuttaryamārabhya dharmāṇāṃ paryāyārtha-nirvacanaprabhedapravicayavihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:716_1: yatra sthito bodhisattvo bodhisattvamārganiṣṭhāgato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahādharmābhiṣekaprāpta ekajātipratibaddho vā bhavati caramabhaviko vā /
SA20bsa034_u:716_2: yasya vihārasyānantaraṃ saṃhitamevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:716_3: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāre [bodhisattvo] bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ parīttakārī bhavati cchidrakārī aniyatakārī punarlābhaparihāṇitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:716_4: pramuditavihāre bodhisattvastasyāmeva bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ vipulakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī yathāpratilabdhāparihāṇitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:716_6: pratharma nirnimittaṃ vihāramupādāya yāvatparamādbodhisattvavihārādbodhisattvo bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ apramāṇakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī ca /
SA20bsa034_u:716_8: pramuditavihāre 'ghiśīlādhicittādhiprajñavihāreṣu ca tasyā bodhisattva-nirnimittabhāvanāyāḥ pratilambho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:716_10: pratisaṃvidvihāre parame ca vihāre tasyā eva bodhisattva-nirnimitta-bhāvanāyāḥ phalapratyanubhāvanā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_0: adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṃgāni kāni nimittāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:717_3: no tu prakṛtyā tanmayatayā / dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:717_7: pratisaṃkhyāya ca sattvārtheṣu prayujyate na prakṛtyanukampā-prematayā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_8: ekadā ca sattveṣu mithyāpi pratipadyate kāyena vācā manasā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_12: no tu pratyātmaṃ tattvajño bhavati yaduta tathāgataṃ vā ārabhya dharmaṃ vā saṃghaṃ vā tattvārthaṃ vā buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā prāptavyaṃ vā 'rthaṃ prāptyupāyaṃ vā gocaraṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_13: parīttena ca śrutamayacintāmayena jñānena samanvāgato bhavati nāpramāṇena /
SA20bsa034_u:717_16: duḥkhayā ca dhandhābhijñayā bodhisattva-pratipadā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:717_25: ekadā na tathā / ekadā smṛtimān bhavati / ekadā muṣitasmṛtijātīyaḥ / na ca sattvānāṃ yathāvadvinayopāyābhijño bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:717_29: sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya /
SA20bsa034_u:717_33: ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_34: ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto 'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:717_35: āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:717_37: no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā /
SA20bsa034_u:717_40: bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:717_41: sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:717_42: alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:717_43: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:717_45: na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:717_47: na ca tathā nirvāṇe 'syādhyāśayaḥ sanniviṣṭo bhavati yathā saṃsārasaṃsṛtau /
SA20bsa034_u:717_49: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni liṅgāni nimittānīme ākārā adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:717_50: adhimukticaryāvihāre mṛddhyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāṃ yathā nirdiṣṭānāmākāraliṅga-nimittānāmadhimātratā veditavyā /
