SA20bsa034_u:717_52: adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāṃ mṛdutā tanutvaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:717_53: adhimātrāyāmeva kṣāntau vartamānasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāmaśeṣaprahāṇāmanantarañca pramuditavihārapraveśo bodhisattvasya veditavyaḥ pratilambhayogena /
SA20bsa034_u:717_54: tasyāsya pramuditavihāravihāriṇa ete [sarva]dharmāḥ sarvena sarvaṃ na bhavanti ye 'dhimukticaryāvihāra-vihāriṇa ākhyātāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:717_55: etadviparyayeṇa ca sarve śuklapakṣyā dharmāḥ saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:717_59: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi so 'dhimokṣa ebhiranekavidhairupakleśairupakliṣṭaḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:717_60: pramuditavihārasthitasya tu bodhisattvasya sarveṣāmeṣāmadhimokṣopakleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirūpakleśaḥ śuddho 'dhimokṣaḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:718_0: tatrapramuditavihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:718_1: iha bodhisattvo 'dhimukticaryāvihārāt pramuditavihāramanupraveśana-pūrvakañca bodhisattvapraṇidhānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asupratividdhabodhya supratividdhabodhyupāyaṃ yadbhūyasā parapratyayagāsuniścitaṃ [Dutt_223] prahāyānyadabhinavaṃ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ su[vi]niścitaṃ pratyātmaṃ bhāvānāmayaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:718_5: ekakṣaṇa[mātraṃ] samutpanne api tasmin praṇidhāne dharmaprakṛtiḥ sā tādṛśī yā 'prameyaśulkadharmeṣṭaphalā bhavati bodhisattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:718_7: nāsya pratilabdhasya kenacitparyāyeṇa parihāṇiranyathābhāvo vā upalabhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_2: katamaiścaturbhiḥ / ādita eva tāvatkīdṛśānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_3: kiñcālambyotpadyate / kīdṛśañca kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kenātmanā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_6: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāriṇāṃ sarvākārasūpacitakuśalamūlānāṃ samāsataḥ samyagbodhisattvacaryāniryātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_7: āyatyāṃ samyagāśu sarvabodhisambhāraparipūriṃ sarvabodhisattva-sattvārthakriyāparipūrimanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhi sarvākāra-sarvabuddhadharmaparipūriṃ buddhakāryakriyāparipūriṃ ca samāsataḥ ālambanīkṛtya tadbodhisattvānāñcittamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_8: samyagāśu ca sarvākārasarvabodhisaṃbhārānukūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu sarvākārabodhisattvakṛtyānukūlamanuttara-samyaksaṃbodhisvayaṃbhūjñānapratilambhānukūlaṃ sarvākārabuddhakṛtyakaraṇānukūlaṃ taccittamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:719_11: jāto bhavati tathāgatakule / tathāgatasyaurasaḥ putro bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:719_14: asaṃrambhāvihiṃsākrodhabahulaḥ [Dutt_224] pareṣāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisattva-sattvārthakriyāṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhisaṃbhāraparipūriṃ sarvākārāṃ bodhiṃ buddhadharmāṃśca buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ ca śuddhenādhyāśayenālambanīkurvan adhimucyamāno 'vataran etaddharmāśu-samudāgamo 'nukūlatāñcātmanaḥ sampaśyan pratyavagacchan prāmodyabahulo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:719_15: kuśalenodāreṇa naiṣkramyopasaṃhitena nirāmiṣeṇāpratisamena kāyacittānugrāhakeṇa prāmodyena uttaptairacalairasmi kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:719_20: tathā hyasya [suvi]niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:719_22: kutaḥ punarasya ātma[sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:719_25: evaṃkāmaśca bhavati / mayaivaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvārthā upasaṃhartavyā iti /
SA20bsa034_u:719_29: maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:719_32: kutaḥ punaruttarataramiti / ato 'sya pariṣacchāradyabhayaṃ na bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:719_33: sa evaṃ sarva bhayāpagataḥ sarvagambhīṃranirdeśatrāsāpagataḥ sarvocchrayamānastaṃbhāpagataḥ sarvaparāpakāravipratipattiṣu dveṣāpagataḥ sarvalokāmiṣa harṣāpagataḥ akliṣṭatvādanupahatena uttaptatvādaprakṛtenāśayena sarvakuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvākāraṃ bodhisattvavīryamārabhate śraddhādhipateyaṃ pūrvaṅgamāṃ kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:719_34: āyatyāñca yāni tāni pūrvanirdiṣṭāni bodhipakṣyapaṭale daśamahāpraṇidhānāni tānyasmin pramuditavihāre 'bhinirhṛtyāśaya-śuddhitāmupādāya agrayasattvadakṣiṇīyaśāstṛdharmasvāmipūjāyai mahāpraṇidhānaṃ tatpraṇīta-[sad]-dharmasandhāraṇāya dvitīyamanupūrvasaddharmapravartanāya tṛtīyaṃ tadanukūla-bodhisattvacaryācaraṇatāyai caturthaṃ tadbhājanasattvaparipācanatāyai [Dutt_225] pañcamaṃ buddhakṣetreṣūpasaṃkramya tathāgatadarśanaparyupāsanasaddharmaśravaṇatāyai ṣaṣṭhaṃ svabuddhakṣetra-pariśodhanatāyai saptamaṃ sarvajātiṣu buddhabodhisattvāvirahitatāyai bodhisattvaiśca sahaikāśayaprayogitāyai aṣṭamaṃ sarvasattvārthakriyāmoghatāyai navamamanuttarasamyaksambodhyabhisaṃbudhyanatāyai buddhakṛtyakaraṇatāyai ca daśamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānabhinirharati pāramparyeṇa ca sattvadhātvanupacchedavallokadharmānupacchedavadeṣāmeva [me] mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ janmani janmani yavadbodhiparyantagamanādavigamaścāsaṃpramoṣaścāvisayogaśca syāditi samyak cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
SA20bsa034_u:719_35: pūrvakaṃ praṇidhātavye 'rthe praṇidhānaṃ paścimakaṃ praṇidhānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:719_36: etānyeva ca mahāpraṇidhānāni pramukhāni kṛtvā tasya bodhisattvasya daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyutpadyante samyak praṇidhānānām /
SA20bsa034_u:720_0: tasyaivamāyatyāñca praṇidhānavataḥ dṛṣṭe ca dharme ārabdhavīryasya daśavihārapariśodhanā dharmāḥ pramuditavihārapariśuddhaye saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:720_2: pratītyasamutpādayogena kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhasamudāgamaṃ paśyataḥ karuṇā /
SA20bsa034_u:720_3: mayaite sattvā asmātkevalād duḥkhaskandhādvimocayitavyā iti saṃpaśyato maitrī /
SA20bsa034_u:720_13: yaduta śraddhā karuṇāmaitrītyāgaḥ akhedaḥ śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hrīvyapatrāpyatā dhṛtibalādhānatā tathāgatapūjopasthānatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:721_1: sa ca bodhisattva etāṃśca dharmāṃ samādāya vartate bahalīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:721_2: tadanyeṣāñca navānāmadhiśīlādīnāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ sarvākāramārgaguṇadoṣān paryeṣate buddhabodhisattvānāmantikāt /
SA20bsa034_u:721_5: yairākāraiḥ praveśati ta ākārāḥ yaḥ praveśaḥ sa pratilambhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:721_6: praviṣṭasya yā [mahā]phalānuśaṃsaniṣpattiḥ samudāgamaśca sa niṣyando veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:721_7: tasyāsminvihāre vyavasthitasya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanasya /
SA20bsa034_u:721_8: ye ca tena śrutā bhavanti bodhisattvapaṭike /
SA20bsa034_u:721_10: santi daśasu dikṣu nānā-nāmasu lokadhātuṣu nānā-nāmānastathāgatā iti /
SA20bsa034_u:721_14: evañca cittaṃ praṇidadhāti / tatra buddhotpādastatra me janma bhavediti /
SA20bsa034_u:721_16: sa evamaudārikaprasādadarśanatayā praṇidhānabalādhānatayā ca tāṃstathāgatān dṛṣṭvā sarvākārāṃ pūjāṃ sukhopadhānatāmupasaṃharati yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ saṃghasammānanāṃ ca karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:721_17: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmantikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti udgṛhaṇāti dhārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:721_19: tāni ca sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni mahābodhau pariṇāmayati /
SA20bsa034_u:721_21: tasyaibhistribhirviśuddhikāraṇaistāni kuśalamūlāni [yad] bhūyasyā mātrāyā viśudhyanti tathāgatadharmasaṃghapūjā-parigraha[ṇa]tayā saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvaparipācanatayā kuśalamūlānāṃ bodhipariṇamanatayā ca yāvadanekāni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi /
SA20bsa034_u:721_22: tadyathā suvarṇaṃ prakṛtisthitaṃ yathā yathāgnau prakṣipyate dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa tathā tathā viśuddhataratāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:721_23: evamevāsyāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni taiviṃśuddhikāraṇairviśuddhitaratāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:721_24: tatrasthaścāsāvupapattito yadbhūyasā cakravartī bhavati janmani [Dutt_227] janmani jambudvīpeśvaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:721_26: yacca kiñciccaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ karmārabhyate tatsarvamavirahitaṃ ratnasarvākārabodhisamudāgama-manaskāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:721_28: ākāṃkṣamāṇaśca tadrūpaṃ vīryamārabhate yatsarvagṛhakalatrabhogānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena śataṃ bodhisattvasamādhīnāṃ samāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:721_37: kāyaśataṃ ca nirmimīte / kāyañca kāyaṃ bodhisattvaśataparivāramādarśayati ataḥparaṃ praṇidhānabalenāpramāṇā prabhāvavikurvaṇā bodhisattvānāṃ veditavyā asmin pramuditavihāre sthitānām /
SA20bsa034_u:721_39: teṣāṃ samyak praṇidhānāṃ na sukarāṃ saṃkhyā kartu yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
SA20bsa034_u:721_40: evamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pramuditavihāraḥ suviniścita[taḥ] caturākāraḥ cittotpādataḥ samyak praṇidhānavīryārambhābhinirhārataḥ vihārapariśodhanatastadanyavihāravyutpattitaḥ kuśalamūlapariśodhanataḥ upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:721_42: yāśca daśabhūmike sūtre daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ ta iha bodhisattvapiṭake mātṛkānirdeśa-daśa-bodhisattvavihārā yathākramaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvatparamavihārādveditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:722_0: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlavihārasya ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittani veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:722_1: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva pramuditavihāre daśākāreṇa [Dutt_228] cittāśayenāśayaśuddhiḥ pratilabdhā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:722_16: daśasu ca paripūrṇeṣu [kuśaleṣu] karmapatheṣu prakṛtyā saṃdṛśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:722_17: sa evaṃ prakṛtiśīlī prajñayā kliṣṭākliṣṭānāṃ karmapathānāṃ durgatisugatiyāneṣu karmasamudācāre hetuphalasamudāgamavyavasthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:722_20: parāṃśca tatraiva samādāpayitukāmo bhavati samādāpayati ca viṣamakarmasamācāradoṣaduṣṭañca sattvadhātuṃ sarvamaviśeṣeṇa sampattivipattigataṃ paramārthato duḥkhitaṃ vyasanasthaṃ vicitrairvyasanākārairanukampamāno 'nukampāvaipulyamanuprāptaḥ pratyavekṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:722_21: tasyāsmin adhiśīlavihāre vyavasthitasya buddhadarśanaṃ kuśalamūlaviśuddhiḥ pūrvavadveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:722_22: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa kāsīsaṃ grakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā viśuddhataraṃ bhavatyagnau prakṣipyamāṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:722_25: yadbhūyasā bāhulyena ca dauḥśīlyādakuśalebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ sattvān vyāvartayati /
SA20bsa034_u:722_29: prakṛtiśīlataśca sarvākāradauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣataśca sarvakarmapathasarvākārahetuphalajñānaprativedhataśca śubhe karmaṇī parasamādāpanakāmaścānukampāvaipulyapratilambhataśca [Dutt_229] sattvadhātukarmajaduḥkhavyasanālocanataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca upapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:722_30: vistaranirdeśataḥ punaryathā sūtrameva yathā daśabhūmike vimalāyāṃ bhūmau dauḥśīlyamalāpagatatvāt vimalā bhūmirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:722_32: yā tatra vimalā bhūmiḥ sehādhiśīlavihāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:723_0: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni adhicittavihārasya /
SA20bsa034_u:723_1: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhiśīlavihāre te daśa śuddhāśayā manasikṛtā bhavanti juṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:723_5: sarvāsravasāsraveṣu me dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandati pratikūlatāyāṃ ca santiṣṭhata iti manasikāreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:723_6: tatpratipakṣabhāvanāyāṃ ca me vijñānaṃ saṃsthitamiti manasikāreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:723_9: asaṃlīnaṃ ca me mānasaṃ pravartate sarvabuddhadharmeṣviti manasikāreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:723_10: sarvaduṣkaracaryāsu ca me nāsti vyatheti manasikāreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:723_11: adhimuktaṃ ca me mahāyāne cittamekāntena na tadanyahīnayāneṣviti manasikāreṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:724_3: tatra ca spṛhājāto bhavati ghanarasena cchandena /
SA20bsa034_u:724_6: sarvasaṃskāreṣvapramattaḥ / bodhāyottaptavīryaḥ / sattveṣu vipulakaruṇāśayaḥ / teṣāṃ sattvānāmatyantaduḥkhavimokṣopāyaṃ sarvakleśānāvaraṇajñānameva paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:724_7: [Dutt_230] tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau sarvavikalpapracāra-saṃlkeśotpattipratipakṣaṃ prajñāṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:724_8: tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:724_11: saddharmaśravaṇahetornāsti taddraviṇaṃ pariṣkāramādhyātmika-vāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati /
SA20bsa034_u:724_15: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā /
SA20bsa034_u:724_18: evamahamidaṃ [dharmapadaṃ] samyaksaṃbuddhopanītaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhakaṃ te 'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti /
SA20bsa034_u:724_19: śrutvāsyaivaṃ bhavet / utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām /
SA20bsa034_u:724_21: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:724_22: yathā dharmānnudharmapratipattiṃ buddhadharmānugatāṃ na vyañjanasvaramātraviśaddhimiti viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni pañca cābhijñā upasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:724_23: sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:724_25: tasya kāmavītarāgatvātkāmabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti dhyānasamādhisamāpattivyāvartanatvād [Dutt_231] bhavabandhanāni /
SA20bsa034_u:724_26: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:724_29: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam /
SA20bsa034_u:724_33: prabhāve 'pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasramākhyātaṃ tatreha śatasahasraṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:724_34: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāmadhicittavihāraścittamanaskāra-pariniṣpa[tti]praveśataśca saṃsārasattvadhātumahābodhisamyak-prativedha[ta]śca sattvaduḥkhavimokṣopāya-samyak-paryeṣaṇataśca mahāgauravadharmaparyeṣaṇataśca dharmānudharmapratipatti-laukikadhyānasamādhisamāpattyabhijñābhinirhāra-vihārataśca tadvyāvartanaṃ praṇidhāya yatra kāmopapattitaśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:724_35: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau /
SA20bsa034_u:724_37: adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:725_1: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:725_3: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:725_4: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ yasya ca saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena saṃkliśyante yayā cānuttarayā viśuddhyā [Dutt_232] viśudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:725_7: abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-]paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati tathāgatakule tadātmaka-dharmapratilambhāt /
SA20bsa034_u:725_8: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva /
SA20bsa034_u:725_9: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante /
SA20bsa034_u:725_10: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:725_12: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:725_14: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:725_18: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇālaṃkāravidhikṛtamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavatyakṛtābharaṇairjātarupaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:725_26: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:725_28: dharmālokapraveśaniṣpattiṃ pratilābhataśca jñānaparipācanataśca bodhipakṣyadharmaniṣevaṇataśca satkāyadṛṣṭyādi-sarvābhiniveśeñjitaprahāṇataśca pratiṣiddhānujñātakarmavivarjana-niṣevaṇataśca tannidānaṃ cittamārdavataśca tadanukūlaguṇasamṛddhitaśca [Dutt_233] bhūmipariśodhaka-karmaparyeṣṭimārabhya mahāvīryārambhataśca tannidānamāśayādhyāśayādhimuktiviśodhanataśca tannidānaṃ sarvaśāsanapratyarthikāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:725_29: vistaranirdeśaḥ punastadyathādaśabhūmike 'rciṣmatī bhūminirdeśe bodhipakṣyā dharmāstasyāṃ bhūmau jñānārcibhūtāḥ samyagdharmadeśanā prajñāvabhāsakarakālokānām /
SA20bsa034_u:726_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake 'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati /
SA20bsa034_u:726_5: yaiśca dharmairyathā samāḥ / ityayaṃ samāsārtho viśuddhāśayasamatānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_7: bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:726_11: pratyupannaduḥkhātmakatāṃ hetu[ta]ścānāgataduḥkhaprabhāvatāṃ hetukṣayāt [tat]kṣayānutpāda[na]tāṃ tatprahāṇopāyaniṣevaṇatāṃ cārabhya yathā deśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:726_13: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:726_19: anya manasikārāpagataḥ / citraiḥ paripācanopāyai sattvān paripācayati /
SA20bsa034_u:726_20: yāni ca sattvānugrāhakāni laukikāni lipiśāstramudrāgaṇanādīni yathāsūtrameva śilpakarmaṃsthānāni tāni sarvāṇyābhinirharati sattvakaruṇa[ta]yā /
SA20bsa034_u:726_21: [Dutt_234] anupūrveṇa yāvat bodhipratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ laukikavyavahārānukūlatayā dāridrya-nāśopāyatayā dhātuvaiṣamyamanuṣyāmanuṣyopasaṃhṛtopadravapraśamanatayā 'navadyakrīḍārativastūpasaṃhārato dharmarativyāvartanatayā sannivāsopakaraṇārthināmalpakṛcchreṇa sannivāsopakaraṇopasaṃharaṇatayā rājacaurādyupadravaparitrāṇatayā sthānāsthānaprayogānujñāpratiṣedhanatayā maṅgalyāmaṅgalyavastvādānatyāgasanniyojanatayā dṛṣṭe dharme parasparānabhidrohasamparāyāviparītābhyudayamārgopadeśanatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:726_22: ityayaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānugrāhakānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāṃ samāsārtho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_23: sarvamanyatpūrvavat / tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva svarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇa musāragalva-mṛṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamatulyatayā 'saṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ suvarṇaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_24: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tadanyabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_25: tadyathā candrasūryanakṣatrāṇāmābhā asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sarva vātamaṇḍalaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_27: evamevāsya bodhisattvasya sā prajñā asaṃhāryā bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_33: śuddhāśayasamatā-niṣpatti-praveśataśca upāyasatyavyavacāraṇā-prativivardhanataśca sarvasaṃskāravidūṣaṇataśca kārūṇyavivardhanataśca tadarthaṃ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayapraṇidhānaprayogataśca smṛtimatigatyādiguṇavivṛddhitaścānanyamanasikāra-sarvākāra-sattvaparipācanābhiyogataśca laukikaśilpābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaścopapattitaśca prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726_34: vistaranirdeśataḥ punastadyathā daśabhūmike sudurjayāyāṃ bhūmau sattveṣu niścayajñānaṃ sudurjayam /
SA20bsa034_u:727_1: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva satyapratisaṃyukte adhiprajñavihāre daśa dharmasamatāḥ pratilabdhaḥ [Dutt_235] bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:727_4: sarvadharmeṣu pāramārthikasya sataḥ svabhāvasya nirnimittasamatayā abhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasyālakṣaṇasamatayā tasyaivālakṣaṇatvāt svayamajātasamatayā hetuto 'nutpannasamatā svayaṃ hetu[ta]ścānuptannatvādatyantamādiśāntasamatayā vidyamāna[sya] vastugrāhakasya jñānasya niṣprapañcasamatayā ādānatyāgābhisaṃskāravigamasamatayā ca tasyaiva kleśaduḥkhasaṃkleśa-visaṃyogād viviktasamatayā vikalpitasya jñeyasvabhāvasya māyānirmitopamasamatayā nirvikalpajñānagocarasya svabhāvasya bhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:727_6: so 'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu saṃvṛddhakaruṇo bodhau tīvracchandābhilāṣajātaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:727_7: lokānāṃ saṃbhavañca vibhavañca sarvākārayā pratītyasamutpāda-samyagvyavacāraṇatayā vyavacārayati prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:727_10: sa evaṃ paramārthakuśalaḥ sattvasāpekṣaḥ yoniśaḥ pratividhyati kleśasaṃyogāt /
SA20bsa034_u:727_11: pratyayasāmagryācca saṃskṛtaṃ prakṛtidurbalamātmātmīyavirahitamanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ pravartate na vinā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīm /
SA20bsa034_u:727_12: tena mayā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīṃ ca vikalīkartavyā cātmarakṣārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:727_13: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ sattvānugrahārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:727_14: tasyaivaṃ jñānakārūṇyānugatasyāsmin vihāre 'saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāraḥ abhisaṃmukhī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:727_16: sa ca vihāro yā tīkṣṇā saptamyāṃ bhūmau prāyogikacaryāparyantagatā bodhisattvakṣāntiḥ tayānulomikyā kṣāntyā saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:727_20: na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate / tasyaivamupāya-prajñājñānānugata-syāvatāra-śūnyatāsamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyāmukhī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:727_24: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa vaidūryamaṇiratnamuṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamasaṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ sarvajātarūpaiḥ evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇi bhavantyasaṃhāryāṇi pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:727_25: tadyathā candraprabhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahalādayatyanācchedyaprabhā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalikābhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:727_26: evamasya bodhisattvasya sā prajñābhā sarvasattvakleśaparidāhañca praśamayati /
SA20bsa034_u:727_32: dharmasamatā-pariniṣpattipraveśataśca pratītyasamutpādāvabodhavimokṣamukhasambhavataśca sarvamithyāsaṃjñāsamudācārataśca upāyasaṃsāraparigrahataśca asaṅgajñānābhimukha-prajñāpāramitāvihārābhimukhataśca apramāṇa-samādhipratilambhataśca abhedyāśayapratilambhataśca śāsanādāsaṃhāryataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:728_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:728_1: iha bodhisattvenānantare 'dhiprajñavihāre daśopāyena prajñayā cābhinirhṛtāḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇā laukikāḥ sarvalokāsādhāraṇāśca mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣāḥ pratilabdhā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:728_4: laukikasampattisaṃvartakaṃ puṇyaparigraha mārabhya sattveṣu hitasukhāśayamārabhya bodhāya puṇyasambhārabodhipakṣya-dharmottarotkarṣamārabhya śrāvakāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya pratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇatāmārabhya sattvadharmadhātumārabhya lokadhātumārabhya tathāgatakāyavākcittajñānamāramya /
SA20bsa034_u:728_7: tatsamutthānāya [Dutt_237] cānābhoganirnimittākalpāvikalpanatayā 'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:728_9: tasya cittakṣaṇe daśapāramitāḥ pramukhāḥ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ paripūryante viśeṣeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:728_11: prathame pramuditavihāre praṇidhānādhyālambanatayā dvitīye cittadauḥśīlyamalāpakarṣaṇatayā tṛtīye praṇidhānavivardhanadharmālokapratilābhatayā caturthe mārgāvatāraṇatayā pañcabhe laukikakriyāvatāraṇa yā ṣaṣṭhe gambhīrapraveśanatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:728_12: āsmin punaḥ saptame vihāre sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā bodhaṅgāni paripūryante bodhisattvaprāyogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahādasya vihārasya jñānābhijñācaryāviśuddhāṣṭamavihārākramaṇācca /
SA20bsa034_u:728_13: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo 'sya vihārasyānantaramaṣṭamaṃ viśuddhaṃ vihāraṃ praviśati /
SA20bsa034_u:728_18: tasmādasmin vihāre sarve rāgādipramukhāḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante /
SA20bsa034_u:728_19: sa ca na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśo veditavyaḥ asamudācārād buddhajñānābhilāṣācca /
SA20bsa034_u:728_21: sa yāni tathāgatavivarṇitāni karmāṇi pūrvavat tasya pañcamavihārābhinihṛtāni laukikāni śilpajñānānīha paripūryante ācāryasammataśca bhavati trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthāpayitvā ūrdhvavihārasthān bodhisattvāṃstathāgatāṃśca /
SA20bsa034_u:728_23: sarve ca dhyānādayo bodhipakṣyā dharmā āmukhī bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:728_26: tadyathā aṣṭhame vihāre / sa tathā prayuktaḥ suniścitaviṣayasamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇyabhinirharati bodhisattvasamādhīnām /
SA20bsa034_u:728_28: sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena sarvavikalpapracārāpagatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:728_31: [Dutt_238] asminvihāre svabuddhiviṣayatayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaviṣayasamatikrāntāstadanyeṣu tu ṣaṭṣu buddhadharmādhyālambanatayā ṣaṣṭhe ca vihāre bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:728_34: yad bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:728_35: sa tamevopāyajñānābhinihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāṃ bodhisattvacaryāñcarati laukikapratibhāsāñcātanmayīṃ ca yathāsūtrameva /
SA20bsa034_u:728_36: tasya tu piṇḍārthaḥ / puṇyakriyāmārabhya kaḍatrapariṣatparigrahamabhinirvṛttiviśeṣaprārthanā-samārambhaṃ vimokṣatrayavihāratāṃ hīnayānādhimuktopāyavinayanatāṃ kāmaparibhogaṃ kāmaviśeṣaprārthanāṃ tīrthikavyāvartanatāṃ paracittānuvartanatāṃ mahājanakāyānuvartanatāṃ cārabhya śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:728_37: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa sarvamaṇiratnamṛṣṭuṃ pratyarpitamatyarthaṃ bhrājate /
SA20bsa034_u:728_40: tadyathā sūryābhā jambūdvīpe yadbhūyasā snehaśca pariśoṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:728_41: asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sa ca tadanyaprabhābhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:728_42: evamasya bodhisattvasya prajñābhā sattvānāṃ sarvakleśaviṣāṇi ca śoṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:728_47: ayaṃ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ upāyaprajñābhinihṛtamārgāntarārambhaviśeṣaniṣpattipraveśataśca tathāgataviṣayasamutthāna-prativedha-nirantaraprayogataśca pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvabodhipakṣyadharmasamudāgamataśca kliṣṭākliṣṭa-vyavasthānataśca prayogikacaryāparipūrisaṃgrahataśca āśayaśuddhikarmapravṛttim adhikṛtya sarvalaukikaśilpakarmādiparipūraṇataśca aprameyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāsādhāraṇasamādhi-pratilambhataśca pratikṣaṇanirodhasamāpattitaśca sarvasattvāsādhāraṇalokacaryācaraṇataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhitaśca upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsa-nirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:729_0: tatra katamo bodhisattvānām anābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:729_1: iha bodhisattvena prathame 'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:729_2: triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya paramārthato nirabhilāpyasvabhāve vastunyabhilāpābhisaṃskārapratibhāsasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇena hetubhāvena cāvidyamānasya tasyaiva saṃkleśātmanāpravṛttitāñcānivṛttitāñcārabhya tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya tathatā-samyakpraveśanirvikalpasamatayā ca tatsaṃkleśāpanayanamārabhya /
SA20bsa034_u:730_0: ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate /
SA20bsa034_u:730_1: sā punaḥ katamā / catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:730_2: tadā sarvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśeṣvapanīteṣu sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:730_3: samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva pūrvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśahetusamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:730_4: tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:730_5: catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni tānyadhimukticaryāvihāramupādāya yāvatsābhoganirnirmittādvihārān na suviśuddhāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:730_7: tasmāt sa bodhisattvaḥ anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti-pratilabdha ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:730_8: sa tasyāḥ kṣānterlābhād gambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:730_9: tasya ye pūrvake nirnimitte vihāre catvāro 'pakṣālāste prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:730_11: uttari ca viśuddhavihāre autsukyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:731_0: tasya ca tasmin gambhīre vihāre 'bhiratasya tasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgata-saṃcodanā-samādāpanā-abhinirhāramukha-jñānābhijñā-karmopasaṃhāro 'prameyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:731_1: tathā saṃcoditasya cāpramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānābhinirhāro daśavaśitā-prāptiśca yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:731_6: sarvopapattisaṃvartanīyeṣu ca karmasu sarvopapattyāyataneṣu cāsya kāmakāmopapattitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:731_9: yad yadeva vastu yathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
SA20bsa034_u:731_10: yañca jñeyaṃ jñātukāmo bhavati tadapi jānīte yathāvat /
SA20bsa034_u:731_13: evaṃ vaśitāprāptasya bodhisattvasyātaḥ pareṇa vaśitāprāptakṛto 'nuśaṃso vistareṇa yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:731_14: audārikañca buddhadarśanaṃ vihāya satatasamitamavirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /
SA20bsa034_u:731_19: paramārthavatārajñānaniṣpattipraveśataśca anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhataśca sarvāpakṣālāpagata-gambhīra-bodhisattvavihāraprāptitaśca dharmamukhasrotasi buddhairaprameyābhinirhāramukhajñānābhijñākarmopasaṃhārataśca apramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānapraveśataśca vaśitāprāptitaśca vaśitānuśaṃsapratyanubhavanataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattiḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:732_1: iha bodhisattvastenāpi vihāreṇa gambhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviśeṣatāmanugacchan yaiśca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo yacca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tatredaṃ dharmasamākhyānakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:732_2: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśudhyante ca /
SA20bsa034_u:732_3: yena ca saṃkliśyante yena ca viśudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:732_4: yacca saṃkleśavyavadānam / yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā / yā ca tasyaikāntikatā / yā ca tasyaikāntikatā 'naikāntikatā /
SA20bsa034_u:732_5: tasya yathābhūtajñānam / evañca dharma-deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharma-bhāṇakatvam aprameyadhāraṇīprāptasya sarvasvarāṅgavibhaktikuśalasyākṣayapratibhānasya /
SA20bsa034_u:732_9: yatra yeṣu ca dharma deśayataḥ yāvadbhirmukhaiḥ yayā sattva-vijñāpana santoṣaṇa-kṛtyasaṃniyojana-śaktyā samanvāgatasya /
SA20bsa034_u:732_12: ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pratisaṃvidvihāraḥ śāntavimokṣasantuṣṭipraveśataśca dharmasamākhyānābhisaṃskārajñānataśca tatkṛtyajñānataśca acintyamahādharmabhāṇakatvapratilambhataścakaśalamūlaviśuddhita upapattitaḥ prabhāvataśca samāsanirdeśato veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:732_15: sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāśayapariśuddhyā bodhisattvapratisaṃvinmatyā dharmasamākhyānādhikāratvāt sā bhūmiḥ sādhumatītyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:733_1: iha bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-vihāre sarvākārapariśuddhe dharmarājatvārhasya dharmābhiṣekasamāsannasya vimalādisamādhi-aprameyapratilambha-tatkṛtyakaraṇataḥ sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekapaścimasādhisammukhībhāvācca [Dutt_242] sarvabuddhebhyasyadanurūpāsanakāyaparivārapratilābhinaḥ svaraśmigamanapratyāgamanaiḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekapratilambhataśca abhiṣiktasya ca sarvavineya-samudānayana-tadvimokṣopāya-buddhakṛtyajñānataśca aprameya-vimokṣa-dhāraṇī abhijñā pratilambhataśca tadādhipateya mahāsmṛtijñā nābhinirhāranirvacanavyavasthānataśca mahābhijñābhinirhārataśca kuśalamūlaviśuddhi-upapattiprabhāvaviśeṣataśca samāsanirdeśataḥ paramo vihāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:733_3: paripūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ suparipūrṇa-bodhisambhāraśca sa bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatā nāmantikāt dharmamedhabhūmyāmatyudārāṃ duḥsahāḥ tadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ saddharmaṃvṛṣṭi sampratīcchati /
SA20bsa034_u:733_4: mahāmedhabhūtaśca svayamanabhisambuddhabodhi-abhisambuddhabodhiścāprameyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharma-vṛṣṭayā nirapamayā kleśarajāṃsi praśamayati /
SA20bsa034_u:733_5: vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamulaśasyāni virohayati vivardhayatī pācayatī tasyāṃ bhūmāvavasthitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:734_0: na ca yānyuttarottareṣu vihāreṣvaṅgāni nirniṣṭāni tāni pūrvakeṣu vihāreṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA20bsa034_u:734_1: api tu mṛdutvān na saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:734_3: ekaikaścātra vihāro 'nekairmahākalpakoṭīśatasahasraistato vā prabhūtataraiḥ pratilabhyate niṣpadyate ca /
SA20bsa034_u:734_4: te tu sarve vihārāstribhirmahākalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ samudāgacchanti mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenādhimukticaryā-vihāraṃ samatikramya pramuditavihāro labhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:734_6: dvitīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyena pramuditavihāraṃ yāvatsābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ vihāramatikramyānābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:734_7: tacca niya meva / tathā hi sa śuddhāśayo bodhisattvo niyataṃ vyāyacchate /
SA20bsa034_u:734_8: tṛtīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenānābhogañca nirnimittaṃ pratisaṃvidvihārañca samatikramya paramaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:735_1: yo 'pi mahākalpaḥ so 'pi rātrindivasamāsārdhamāsagaṇanāyogena kālāprameyatvādasaṃkhyeya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:735_2: yāpi [Dutt_243] teṣāmeva mahākalpānāṃ gaṇanāyogena sarvagaṇanā samatikrāntā saṃkhyā so 'pyasaṃkhyeyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:735_5: yastvadhimātrādhimātreṇa vīryārambheṇa prayujyate tataḥ kaścidantarakalpān prabhūtān vyāvartayati kaścit yāvanmahākalpān /
SA20bsa034_u:736_1: tatra triṣu vihāreṣu kleśāvaraṇapakṣyadauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:736_2: pramudite [vihāre] āpāyikakleśapakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ samudācāratastvadhimātramamyasya sarvakleśapakṣyasya anābhoge nirnimitte vihāre 'nutpattikadharmakṣānti-viśuddhivibandhakleśa pakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:736_5: tacca tathāgataṃ vihāramanupraviśataḥ jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyamapi dauṣṭhulyaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:736_8: phalgugatasyānābhoge nirnimitte sāragatasya tathāgate vihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:736_9: sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānatā ca teṣu triṣu vihāreṣu tasya kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇasya tadanye vihārā yathānukramaṃ saṃbhārabhūtā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:737_0: eṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣu samāsata ekādaśavidhā viśuddhirveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:737_2: tṛtīye 'dhyāśayaviśuddhiḥ / caturthe śīlaviśuddhiḥ / pañcame cittaviśuddhiḥ / ṣaṣṭhe saptame 'ṣṭame ca samyak jñānasamārambhaviśuddhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:737_4: daśame tattvajñānābhinirhāraviśuddhiḥ ekādaśe tadarthasamyak parasamākhyānāya pratirsavidviśuddhiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:738_4: tataścordhvaṃ triṣu bodhisattvavihāreṣu pariśuddhacaryā saṃgṛhīteṣu bhāvanāphalaniṣpattiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_0: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_3: yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_4: yathā tasyāvetyaprasādalābhinaḥ āryakāntādhiśīlavihāra uttari āsravakṣayāya tathāsya caturtho vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_5: yathā tasyādhiśīlaṃ niśrityādhicittaśikṣānirhāravihāraḥ tathāsya pañcamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_6: yathā tasya yathā pratilabdhasatyajñānādhipraśikṣāvihāraḥ tathāsya ṣaṣṭha saptamāṣṭamā vihārā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:739_7: yathā tasya suvicārita jñeyasyānimittasamādhiprayogavihāraḥ tathāsyanavamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_8: yathā tasya pariniṣpanno nirnimitto vihāraḥ tathāsya daśamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_9: yathā tasya vyutthitasya vimuktyāyatanavihāraḥ tathāsyaikādaśo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:739_10: yathā tasya sarvākāro 'rhatvavihāraḥ tathāsya dvādaśo vihāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:744_0: samāsato bodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidhā upapattiḥ sarvatraṃ sarvavihāreṣu ca sarveṣāñca bodhisattvānāmanavadyā parvasattvahitasukhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:745_1: iha bodhisattvo durbhikṣeṣu kṛcchreṣu mahākāntāreṣu kāleṣu praṇidhāya sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa yātrānimittaṃ mahāmatsyādiyoniṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:745_3: vyādhibahuleṣu ca sattveṣu praṇidhāya siddhavidyādhara-mahāvaidyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti teṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ praśamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:745_4: bhṛśa-paracakropadraveṣu ca sattveṣu balavān bhūmipatirbhavati dharmeṇa śamenopāyakauśalyena paracakropadravapraśamanārthaṃ paraspara-viruddheṣu ca sattveṣvādeyavacano bhavati sandhikriyāyai vairāśayaprahāṇāya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:745_5: daṇḍabandhanacitrapīḍāpravṛtteṣu ca prajānāṃ rājasu teṣāmeva sattvopadravāṇāṃ prahāṇāya tadrūpeṣu rājakuleṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:745_7: ye ca sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayaśca pāpakāriṇaśca kasmiṃściddevāyatane 'dhimuktāḥ teṣāmanukampayā mithyādṛṣṭiduściritaprahāṇāya tasmindevāyatane upapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:745_8: praṇidhānavaśitābalābhyāñca iyamupapattiranukampā-pūrvikā aprameyā veditavyā vistaranirdeśatastāsu tāsu vicitrāsu yoniṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu samāsa-nirdeśastvayamāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:746_1: iha bodhisattvaḥ praṇidhāya vā vaśitāprāptito vā vicitreṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu devanāgayakṣāsurādiṣu cānyonyadrugdha viruddheṣu tathā mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu tathā duścaritacāriṣu tat [Dutt_248] ājīveṣu tadabhirateṣu tathākāmeṣvatyarthādhyavasiteṣu kāmādhimukteṣu [sattveṣu] teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sabhā[gatā]yāmupapadyate prāmukhyena tasya doṣasya vinivartanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:746_2: sa pramukho bhūtvā yatte sattvāḥ samudācaranti tadasā na samudācaranti /
SA20bsa034_u:746_3: yatte na samudācaranti kuśalaṃ tadasau samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:746_5: te tayā [ca] dharmadeśanayā [tayā] ca visabhāgasamudācāratayā tebhyo doṣebhyastenopāyakauśalyena vinivartante /
SA20bsa034_u:747_2: tena ca vipākena yathoktaṃ svaparārthapaṭale karma karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:748_1: yā bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvaddaśamādvihārādupapattirvarṇitā sā 'syādhipattyopapattirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:748_2: jambūdvīpeśvaratvamupādāya yāvanmaheśvaratvādakaniṣṭhānatikramya sarvopapattyāyatanapraviṣṭaṃ yatra paramavihāraprāptā eva bodhisattvā upapadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:749_1: yasyāmupapattau paripūrṇabodhisambhārī bodhisattvaḥ purohitakule vā rājakule vā upapadyānuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:749_4: ye kecid bodhisattvā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu śubhāsu bhadrāsu kalyāṇāsu upapattiṣūpapannā upapatsyante upapadyante ca sarve te āsveva pañcasu /
SA20bsa034_u:749_5: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ sthāpayitvā bālabhūmyupapattīḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:749_6: tathā hi vijñairbodhisattvaiḥ upapattaya etāḥ pañcābhipretāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:752_0: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:753_0: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:753_1: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti /
SA20bsa034_u:753_2: tathaiva ca karoti / ayaṃ bodhisattvasya sakṛt sarvasattvaparigrahaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:754_1: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:754_11: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:754_13: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:755_2: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:755_6: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:755_7: na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim /
SA20bsa034_u:755_9: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:755_13: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:755_15: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:755_17: kālena ca nyāyenāvasādakaḥ / vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:755_19: kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:755_22: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:755_28: kuśalapakṣe / pramādakausīdyāpagataḥ / tathaiva pariṣado 'nu śikṣaṇārthamātmaviśeṣatā-gamanatāyai ca /
SA20bsa034_u:755_29: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:756_0: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:757_1: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:758_0: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:758_2: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:759_2: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā 'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya kleśārakṣāsambādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_3: alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_4: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_7: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_8: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_10: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_11: ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_12: evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:759_20: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /
SA20bsa034_u:760_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:762_0: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:762_3: caryāpratipattibhūmiḥ / niyatā bhūmiḥ / niyatacaryābhūmiḥ / niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiśca itīmāḥ sapta bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:762_4: āsāṃ paścimā vyāmiśrā / tatra gotravihāro 'dhimukticaryāvihāraśca dve bhūmī /
SA20bsa034_u:762_11: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:763_0: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:763_1: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi sambhāro daśottareṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭenākāraśatena sattveṣvanukampāṃ bhāvayapyananyamanasikāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:763_2: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:763_4: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:763_7: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:763_9: acireṇa tasya prahāṇādāśrayo 'sya bodhisattvasya parivartate pāpakasyāpāyikasya karmaṇo 'tyantamakaraṇatāyai apāyāgamanatāyai [Dutt_254] ca /
SA20bsa034_u:764_0: ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /
SA20bsa034_u:764_1: śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_4: tatra daśeme / eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_6: katame daśa / sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_7: yasya pratipakṣeṇa śraddhā / sattveṣu vihiṃsācittaṃ karuṇāvipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_8: yasya pratipakṣeṇa karuṇā / sattveṣu vyāpādo maitrīvipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_10: yasya pratipakṣeṇa tyāgaḥ / sattvebhyo 'pakāra-vipratipattilābho bahukartavyatā cākhedavipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:764_19: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:765_0: kaḥ punareṣāṃ samāsārthaḥ / samāsena daśabhirebhirdharmairāśayaśuddhiḥ prayogaśuddhiśca paridīpitā /
SA20bsa034_u:765_8: śāstrajñaśca yathā loke [Dutt_255] pravartitavyamanena tathā jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:765_9: evaṃ lokajño bhavati / svayañca kleśasamudācāreṇa jehrīyate vyapatrapate /
SA20bsa034_u:765_11: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:766_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:768_0: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:768_3: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:768_15: smṛtyupasthānānyupādāya sarve saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāścatasraśca paryeṣaṇāścatvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭānyabhisamasya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipakṣyacaryetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:768_17: dvau ca pūrvanirdiṣṭāvaprameyau vineyāprameyaśca vinayopāyāprameyaśca [sarvasattvaparipāko yathānirdiṣṭaḥ] sattvaparipākapaṭale bodhisattvasyābhisamasya sattvaparipākacaryetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:769_1: tatrāsaṃkhyeyatraya-dīrghakālasamudāgamātsvabhāvaviśuddhiviśeṣāttadanyebhyaḥ sarvalaukikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakuśalamūlebhyaḥ paramabodhiphalaparigrahāccaite daśa [Dutt_257] dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:771_0: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:771_2: eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:772_0: kathamupapattitaḥ / ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:772_2: no tu paraṃ viheṭhayati / samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:772_4: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:773_0: kathaṃ phalavipākataḥ / iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:774_2: iyaṃ prathamā sampat / sahajā cakuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:774_3: iyaṃ dvitīyā sampat / sahajā sarvārambheṣu dṛḍhavyavasāyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:774_4: iyaṃ tṛtīyā sampat / sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:774_5: iyaṃ caturthī sampat / sahajañca mativaipulyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ [Dutt_258] vicakṣaṇatā ca sarvārtheṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:774_6: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:775_0: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha]sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:776_3: sattvaparipācanatā ca / etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:777_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:779_0: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:779_1: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyunuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā 'sammoṣadharmatā vāsanā-samuddhātaḥ sarvākāra-varajñānañca /
SA20bsa034_u:780_3: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
SA20bsa034_u:780_4: dīrghāṅgulimaṃhāpuruṣaḥ / āyatapādapārṣṇiḥ / mṛdutaruṇapāṇipādaḥ / jālapāṇipādaḥ / ucchaṅgacaraṇaḥ / eṇeyajaṅghaḥ / anavanatakāyaḥ / kośagatavastiguhyaḥ / nyogradhaparimaṇḍalaḥ / vyāmaprabhaḥ / ūrdhvāṅgaromā / ekaikaromā / ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
SA20bsa034_u:780_5: kāñcanasannibhatvak / ślakṣṇavatk / ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:780_6: saptotsadakāyaḥ / saptāsyotsadāḥ / kāye jātāḥ-dvau hastayordvau pādayordvāvasaṃyoreko grīvāyām /
SA20bsa034_u:780_7: siṃhapūrvārdhakāyaḥ / susaṃvṛttaskandhaḥ / citāntarāṃśaḥ / bahadṛjugātraḥ / catvāriṃśatsamadantaḥ / aviraladantaḥ / suśukladantaḥ / siṃhahanuḥ / prabhūta-tanujihvaḥ / prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam /
SA20bsa034_u:780_8: rasarasāgraprāptaḥ / brahmasvaraḥ / kalaviṅka-manojñabhāṇī / dundubhisvaranirghoṣaḥ / abhinīlanetraḥ / gopakṣmā / [Dutt_260] uṣṇīṣaśīrṣā / ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā /
SA20bsa034_u:781_2: viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni / hastapādayorevāṣṭau talāni / dvayorhastayoścatvāri dvayoḥ pādayoścatvāryaṣṭāvanuvyañjanāni /
SA20bsa034_u:781_5: jaghanam / sīvanī ca / vṛṣṇe 'nuvyañjanadvayaṃ / upastham / dve sphicau anuvyañjanadvayam /
SA20bsa034_u:781_6: trikam / udaram / nābhiḥ / dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:781_7: uraḥ hṛdayaṃ grīvā pṛṣṭham / ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:781_10: suparipūrṇaṃ kapolam / dve gaṇḍe paripūrṇe susaṃskṛte anuvyañjanadvyam /
SA20bsa034_u:781_14: lalāṭam / dve śaṅkhe dvau ca karṇāvanuvyañjana-catuṣṭam /
SA20bsa034_u:781_16: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:781_17: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:781_18: ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:781_21: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya /
SA20bsa034_u:781_22: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:782_1: bodherdūraścāsannaśca / tatra dūraḥ / yaḥ pratilabdheṣu vipākato lakṣaṇānuvyañjaneṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:782_2: āsannaḥ / yaḥ pratilabdheṣu tatprathamato vipākato lakṣaṇānuvyañjaneṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:783_3: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya mahataḥ phalānuśaṃsasya spṛhyamānarūpāratasmācca pāpādvirameyuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:783_6: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_7: paravihiṃsāmadattādānañca prahāya gurūṇāṃ cābhivādanavandana-pratyutthānāñjali-sāmīcī-karma kṛtvā pareṣāṃ manastuṣṭipriyabhogāhrasvīkaraṇān nihatamānatvācca dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_8: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_9: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_11: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_12: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_14: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_15: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_16: kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ saṃvṛtātmā pratigraha-bhojane ca mātrajñaḥ glāneṣu bhaiṣajyapradaḥ viṣame karmaṇi pratigraha-paribhogavaiṣamye cāpravṛttatvāt [Dutt_262] [dhātuvaiṣamyānu]lomanācca nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatvaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_17: yenaiva ca karmaṇā utsaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate tenaivordhvaṅgaromatām /
SA20bsa034_u:783_18: svayaṃ kuśalamīmāṃsakaḥ paṇḍitavijña-sevī sūkṣmārthacintakaḥ gurūṇāṃ sthānaśodhakaḥ utsādakaḥ snāpakaśca ekavihāritvādekamitra-saṃśrayatvātsūkṣmārthapraveśāt tṛṇaparṇādyāvilāpakarṣaṇādāgantukamalāpakarṣaṇācca ekaikaromatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_20: yenaiva ca karmaṇā ekaikaromatoktā tenaiva sūkṣmaślakṣṇatvacatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:783_21: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_23: nāhaṃ mānī na ca niṣṭhuraḥ / ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt /
SA20bsa034_u:783_24: anenaiva ca karmaṇā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā citāntarāṃśatā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:783_25: yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_26: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_27: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_28: arthimyaḥ sattvebhyo yathābhipretaṃ dhanaṃ samyagvisṛjya siṃhahanutāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_29: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca /
SA20bsa034_u:783_30: pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva samādāpayitvā karuṇācittatāmupādāya mahatī dharmasamādāne pratipannatvāduṣṇīṣaśiraskatāñca prabhūta-tanujihvatāṃ ca pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_31: satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_32: kṛtsnaṃ jaganmaitreṇa cetasā 'nukampya mātṛvatpitṛvadabhinīlanetratāṃ gopakṣmanetratāñca pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:783_33: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām /
SA20bsa034_u:783_34: [Dutt_263] sarveṣu ca dvātriṃśatsu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvaviśeṣeṇa śīlaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratilambhāya veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:783_35: tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi śīlavipanno bodhisattvo manuṣyatvameva tāvadāsādayet kutaḥ punarmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:783_36: tatroṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anava lokitamūrdhatā caikaṃ mahāpuruṣakṣaṇaṃ veditavye tadvyatirekeṇānupalambhāt /
SA20bsa034_u:784_2: nipuṇakāritayā cakracaraṇatā ucchaṅgacaraṇatā jālapāṇipādatā sūkṣmatvacatā citāntarāṃśatā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā vṛhadṛjugātratā prabhūtatanujihvatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:784_3: nityakāritayā dīrghāṅga litvaṃ āyatapādapārṣṇitā anavanatakāyatā nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā aviraladantatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:784_7: prāmodyaprītiprabhāsvareṇa cittena kuśalasamācārād vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:784_9: bodhāya kuśalamūlapariṇamanādūrdhvāṅga-romatā catvāriṃśatsamadantatā rasarasāgratā uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:784_10: kuśale atṛptālīnaprayogāt siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā siṃhahanutā ca nirvartaṃte /
SA20bsa034_u:784_11: sattveṣu hitacittatayā samadarśanāt samadantatā abhinīlanetratā gopakṣmamā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:784_13: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:785_3: tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ [Dutt_264] veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:785_4: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni /
SA20bsa034_u:786_0: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:786_4: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:786_7: yāvānūrṇā-praviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:786_9: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto 'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:786_10: yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:787_0: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:788_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:791_0: tatrāśrayaviśuddhiḥ katamā / savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:792_1: nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā /
SA20bsa034_u:793_0: tatra cittaviśuddhiḥ katamā / pūrvavatsarvacittadauṣṭhulyāpagamāccitte ca sarvākāra-kuśalamūlopacayātsarvākārā cittaviśuddhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:794_0: tatra katamā jñānaviśuddhiḥ / pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:795_1: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalam indriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānā dhātujñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ cyutyupapattijñānabalam āsravakṣayajñānabalañca /
SA20bsa034_u:795_2: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:796_0: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti tasmāttathāgata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:796_1: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo 'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:796_5: eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:796_12: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:796_13: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapi /
SA20bsa034_u:796_15: evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati /
SA20bsa034_u:796_17: agraprajñaptipatitasya niruttaraśāstṛsaṃpatparigṛhītasya cātmano vikhyāpanāt tanmārgadeśanayā ca sarvatadanyapāṣaṇḍapratikṣepaṇāt tanmārgavipratyanīkavādiṣu ca pratyupasthiteṣu asaṃkocātsarvaparavādābhibhavāya codāraniruttaravāgabhyudoraṇātpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadatītyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:796_19: teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:796_21: tasya cābhyupāyasya sarvajanyatāyo [yaḥ] kaścidākāṃkṣati devabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] sarveṇa tena mamaivāntikāllabhya eṣo 'bhyupāya iti /
SA20bsa034_u:796_24: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:797_1: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ /
SA20bsa034_u:797_3: yāni punaḥ karmāṇi naiva kṛtāni na niruddhānyapi tu kartumeva praṇihito vyavasitaḥ tāni pratyutpannānītyucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:797_4: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
SA20bsa034_u:797_9: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:797_11: tatteṣāṃ heturityucyate / yadiṣṭāniṣṭamādīnavānuśaṃsaṃyuktaṃ phalamabhinivartayanti tatteṣāṃ vipāka ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:797_12: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:798_0: catvāri dhyānāni / aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ / dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:798_2: yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva /
SA20bsa034_u:798_5: evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:798_6: tatradhyānavimokṣābhyāṃ cittavaśitayā ca cittādhīna-sarvepsitārthasamṛddhiḥ etāvacca sarvadhyāyīnāṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:798_7: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / taccaitad dhyāyikaraṇīyaṃ [sarvākāraṃ] tathāgatānāṃ tasmād dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattaya evocyante /
SA20bsa034_u:798_13: teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:798_14: eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā 'kṛcchreṇānavarakalābhitā saiṣāṃ viśuddhirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:798_15: tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:799_0: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:800_0: paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:800_1: nānāgotravyavasthānam / śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:801_0: teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:801_2: aparaḥ paryāya / parasparaviruddheṣu nānāpakṣāśriteṣvanyonyarucidṛṣṭivipratyanīkavādiṣu pṛthagito bāhyakeṣu śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu yā pratipatsarvaprakārairihāmutrānavadyagāminītyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:802_0: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu aṣṭāsu vyavahārapadeṣvanugataṃ pūrvakeṣvabhyatītevātmabhāveṣu ṣaḍvidhaṃ samāsataścaritamanusmaratyanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāse samanusmaran /
SA20bsa034_u:802_2: evaṃ nāmā / evaṃ jātyaḥ / evaṃ gotraḥ / evamāhāraḥ / evaṃ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī /
SA20bsa034_u:803_2: āhvānāya saṃketaḥ kṣatriyādayo varṇā mātāpitaraṃ bhojanapānavidhiḥ sampattivipattiḥ āryurvaicitryañca /
SA20bsa034_u:803_3: tathā hi loke etānyaṣṭau vyavahārapadāni upaniśritya ṣaṭ caritāni pareṣāmātmano vyapadiśanto vyapadiśanti /
SA20bsa034_u:803_4: idaṃ me nāmāsyedaṃ nāmeti / kṣatriyo 'hamayaṃ vā / brāhmaṇo vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'hamayaṃ vā ayaṃ me pitā 'sya va /
SA20bsa034_u:803_5: yathā pitā evaṃ mātā / evaṃ rūpamahamāhāramāharāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:803_6: manthān vā apūpān vā odānakulmāṣān vā pare vā /
SA20bsa034_u:803_7: evaṃ rūpe 'haṃ vyasane sampadi vā varte 'yaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:803_8: evaṃrūpe 'haṃ vayasi vyavasthito nave vā madhye vā vṛddhe vā /
SA20bsa034_u:803_9: ayaṃ vā / ityetāni ṣaḍ[aṣṭa]vyavahāra padānugatāni caritāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:803_11: tasmādetāvadevānusmarati / nāto bhūyaḥ / tatra vyavahāracaritāni ākāro vyavahārapadānyuddeśaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:804_3: tadyathā kṛṣṇasyakutapasya nirbhāsaḥ andhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:804_4: tasmād durvarṇā ityucyante / ye punardvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ jyotiḥ parāyaṇāsteṣāmayamevaṃrūpo manomayo 'ntarābhavo nirvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:804_5: tadyathā jyotsnayā rātryā vārāṇaseyakasya vā sampannasya vastrasya /
SA20bsa034_u:804_6: tasmātsuvarṇā ityucyante / tatra ye durvarṇāste hīnāḥ / ye survarṇāste praṇītāḥ / ye hīnāste durgatigāminaḥ / ye praṇītāste sugatigāminaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:804_7: sa samutthānayā śīlavipattyā kāyavāṅma noduścaritena samanvāgatā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:804_8: dvividhayā mithyādarśanadṛṣṭivipattyā samanvāgamāt [Dutt_270] sarvāpavādikayā tanmatavipakṣāvasthitāryapavādikayā ca mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ āryāṇāmapavādakā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:804_19: tatrāpayānamityucyante / adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca tayā tatra yānaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:804_20: tasmādapāyā ityucyante / duḥkhasaṃsparśatvāddīrghakālika vicitra tīvranirantaraduḥkhopabhogasamudgatatvād durgataya ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:804_23: iti yena copapadyante upapannāśca yadupabhuñjate tadupabhogācca punaryadanyat svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkhāntaramabhinirvartayanti tadetadābhiḥ saṃjñābhiḥ paridīpitam /
SA20bsa034_u:804_27: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:804_28: tāṃ punaścetovimuktiṃ [prajñāvimukti] tasminneva carame bhave pratyātmaṃ ṣaṣṭhābhijñayā darśanamārgasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāmārga-sanniśrayeṇa cādhigamya svañcādhigamaṃ yathāvatprajānanti /
SA20bsa034_u:804_30: tasmād dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya [Dutt_271] pravedayantītyucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:804_31: kṣīṇāṃ me jātirityevamādīnāṃ padānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:807_1: prabhedo veditavyaḥ / kaivalyaṃ veditavyam / samatā veditavyā / karmakriyā veditavyā / anukramo veditavyaḥ / viśeṣo veditavyaḥ / ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ samāsato daśa tathāgatabalāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:808_2: tathā hyucyate / sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ na tu śraddhābalaṃ vā tadanyadvā balamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:808_4: tatra ka eṣāṃ prabhedaḥ / samāsatasrividhena prabhedenaiṣāmapramāṇatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:808_14: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_0: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ tathāgataḥ kena kiṃ karmaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_1: sthānāsthānajñānabalena tathāgataḥ hetuñca hetutaḥ phalañca phalato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_3: karmasvakatājñānabalena tathāgataḥ svayaṃkṛta-phalopabhogatāñca karmaṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_7: indriyaparāparajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sattvānāmindriyamṛdumadhyādhimātratāñca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_11: aśubhāñca tyājayati / nānādhātujñānabalena tathāgato hīnamadhyepraṇotadhātukatāśca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_12: yathendriyān yathāṣayān yathānuśayāṃśca sattvāṃsteṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādakriyayā samyagyathāyogaṃ saṃniyojayati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_13: tatra yathā tathāgatāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ prajñaptaṃ prakāśitam /
SA20bsa034_u:809_14: kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe 'vasthitañcittasthitikāmaṃ cittasthitaye 'vavadanti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_15: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_16: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:809_17: evañca punarmanasikuru-asti me [sa] kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:809_18: yatredaṃ nāma [Dutt_273] saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase /
SA20bsa034_u:809_21: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:809_24: etacca vastumātram / yatredaṃ nāma saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:809_25: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ / tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:809_26: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:809_27: tatkasya hetoḥ / na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:809_29: yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:809_30: nānyatra prakṛtyaivāśruto 'parikalpita-nāmakānāmapi tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:809_31: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī /
SA20bsa034_u:809_33: yathā cakṣuṣyevaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyeṣu vistareṇa yāvaddṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu prāpteṣu paryeṣiteṣu manasā 'nuvitarkiteṣvanuvicāriteṣu samāsataḥ sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñā utpannā bhaviṣyati pratilabdhā /
SA20bsa034_u:809_34: evaṃ [te] svātmani yā saṃjñā [avasthā] tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_35: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_36: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā sarvadharmeṣu sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāmapanīyāpanīya nirvikāreṇa cetasā nirnimittenārthamātragrahaṇapravṛttenāsmin vastuni bahalaṃ vihara /
SA20bsa034_u:809_38: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /
SA20bsa034_u:809_39: sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyanamapramāṇa-bodhisattva dhyānābhijñā-samādhisamāpattīrmanasikaroṣi /
SA20bsa034_u:809_41: evaṃ te 'yaṃ bodhisattva manaskāro 'nupūrveṇa yāvadanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye niryāsyatīti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_46: śrāvako 'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:809_47: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:809_49: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:809_53: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:810_1: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:810_3: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:810_4: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:810_11: tataścānurūpeṇālambanāvatāramukhaprayogena cittasthitiñca grāhayitvā [Dutt_275] caritāni ca viśodhayitvā satkāyadṛṣṭimūla-śvāśatocchedāntagrāhavivarjitāṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ vyapadiśati sarvakleśaprahāṇāya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena cyutyupapattijñānabalena ca /
SA20bsa034_u:810_12: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /
SA20bsa034_u:811_0: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:811_1: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
SA20bsa034_u:811_3: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā /
SA20bsa034_u:811_4: āhośvit nāstīti / sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:811_6: santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti /
SA20bsa034_u:811_8: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:812_0: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:812_1: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:812_2: amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
SA20bsa034_u:812_3: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:812_4: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
SA20bsa034_u:813_1: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:813_2: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /
SA20bsa034_u:813_3: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:813_4: idaṃ karmasvakajñānabalāt / yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:813_5: nānyasya / idaṃ karmasvakajñānabalāt / yatpunastāneva dhyānādīnāśritya vineyāṃsribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:814_12: idaṃ nānādhātujñānabalāt / sa punardhātupravibhāgaḥ samāsataścatuṣprakāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:814_13: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam /
SA20bsa034_u:814_17: idaṃ nānādhātujñānabalāt / yatpunastāmeva pratipadaṃ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ pravibhajati /
SA20bsa034_u:814_22: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:814_31: idamāsravakṣayajñānabalāt / ayameṣāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāmanyonyaṃ viśeṣaścāviśeṣaśca veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:815_1: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:815_4: idaṃ dvitīyaṃ sthānam / vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:815_5: idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānam / tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:815_6: idaṃ caturthaṃ sthānam / yathārthapratijñaśca tathāgataḥ eṣu caturṣu sthāneṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:815_7: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ cādivyadṛśāñca paracittavidāmaparicittavidāṃ ca pratijñānasthānapratipakṣeṇa saṃcodanāyāṃ nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado 'līnacitto nirāśaṅko nirbhīḥ pratijānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:815_8: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca /
SA20bsa034_u:815_9: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:815_15: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:816_1: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti /
SA20bsa034_u:816_2: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
SA20bsa034_u:817_1: tisraḥ pariṣadā katamāḥ / ekāntena samyak pratipadyante sarva eva /
SA20bsa034_u:817_2: iyamekā pariṣat / ekāntena mithyā pratipadyante sarva eva /
SA20bsa034_u:817_3: iyaṃ dvitīyā pariṣat / tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:818_2: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /
SA20bsa034_u:818_7: tadekatyān pravāsayati / api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:818_8: mā haiva me śrāvakāḥ saṃvāsānvayādapariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥ-samudācāratāṃ viditvā tena vastunā 'nāttamanaskā anabhirāddhyāścodayiṣyanti /
SA20bsa034_u:819_1: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:819_3: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati] yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:819_4: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā /
SA20bsa034_u:820_0: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā 'samudācāra-pracāratā /
SA20bsa034_u:820_2: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva /
SA20bsa034_u:821_1: katame trayaḥ / arthopasaṃhitā dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā naivārthopasaṃhitāḥ nānarthopasaṃhitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:821_6: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:822_1: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:822_2: yadā tu bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati suparipūrṇa-bodhisaṃbhāramārgo bodhisattvaḥ paścime bhave tadāsāvanācāryakaṃ saptatriṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayannekakṣaṇānāvaraṇajñānadaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:822_3: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāra-varajñāna-paryavasānānāṃ suviśuddhatāṃ niruttaratāṃ sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:822_4: teṣāñca lābhāt sarvasmin jñeye 'saktamanāvaraṇaṃ suviśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate ābhogamātra-pratibaddham /
SA20bsa034_u:822_8: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:822_10: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:822_11: tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo 'vagantavyo jñānāntaram /
SA20bsa034_u:822_12: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya] pelavapaṭāntaritaṃ yathācakṣuṣmato rūpadarśanam /
SA20bsa034_u:822_13: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:822_16: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā 'pariśodhitam /
SA20bsa034_u:822_22: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:822_23: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā suviśuddha-cakṣuṣaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:822_24: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:822_26: yathārhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya cittapracārastathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:822_27: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:822_28: tadyathā pradīpasyāviśuddhasya svabhāvaḥ tathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:822_29: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:823_0: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:823_1: tatra buddhakāryaṃ katamat / samāsato daśemāni tathāgatasya tathāgatakṛtyāni tathāgatakaraṇīyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:823_4: katamāni daśa / sve mahāpuruṣabhāve [Dutt_281] ādita eva cittaprasādakārakamahāpuruṣa[bhāva]saṃpratyayajananā prathamaṃ tathā[gata]kṛtyaṃ tacca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ sampādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:823_8: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:823_9: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:823_11: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:823_12: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:823_13: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:823_16: yattathāgato 'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:823_17: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:823_18: yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato 'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:823_19: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
SA20bsa034_u:824_0: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:824_1: tatkasya hetoḥ / etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthān sāmpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:825_1: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām /
SA20bsa034_u:825_4: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:825_7: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:826_2: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:826_6: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā[surā]llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāsyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau dṛḍhāmadhimuktimutpādyemāṃ śroṣyatyudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyati pūjāsatkārañca prayokṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:826_7: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:826_8: tatkasya hetoḥ / tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni /
SA20bsa034_u:826_9: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti saddharmāntarddhānāya /
SA20bsa034_u:826_10: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:827_0: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:830_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /
SA20bsa034_u:830_1: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
